name: Savory Steak and Potato Soup
ingredients:
2 Tablespoons Olive Oil
1 cup Yellow Onion, Diced
4 cloves Garlic, Minced
2 whole Carrots, Peeled, And Cubed
5 whole Russet Potatoes, Peeled And Cubed
2 cups Leftover Grilled Steak, Diced
1 teaspoon Salt
1 teaspoon Cracked Black Pepper
½ cups Tomato Sauce
1 teaspoon Worcestershire Sauce
4 cups Beef Stock
½ loaves Ree Drummond's "The Bread"
description: This soup is really simple to make, is packed full of flavor, and goes perfect with a lobster tail. Serve with Ree Drummond’s “The Bread” to make it a perfect dinner.

name: DIY Vanilla Extract
ingredients:
4 whole Vanilla Bean Pods, Split Lengthwise
8 ounces, fluid Vodka
description: Homemade Vanilla Extract—simple to make, no additives, and just darn awesome!

name: Coffee-Rubbed Flank Steak with Parmesan Acorn Squash
ingredients:
1 Tablespoon Chili Powder
½ Tablespoons Freshly Ground Coffee
½ Tablespoons Brown Sugar
½ teaspoons Salt
½ teaspoons Black Pepper
1 pound Flank Steak
1 whole Acorn Squash
2 Tablespoons Olive Oil
¼ cups Grated Parmesan
description: A wonderful coffee rub creates a delicious crust on the flank steak. Served with roasted acorn squash topped with nutty Parmesan.

name: Roasted Carrot & Coconut Milk Soup
ingredients:
2-½ pounds Carrots, Peeled And Cut Into 3" Pieces
1-½ whole Onions, Peeled And Cut Into Wedges
4 whole Roma Tomatoes, Sliced In Half
3 Tablespoons Olive Oil, Divided
1 head Garlic
6 cups Chicken Or Vegetable Stock
1 piece (1 Inch Size) Ginger, Peeled And Grated
2  Limes, Zested
3 ounces, fluid Lime Juice
2 cups Coconut Milk
8 whole Lime Wedges, For Garnish (optional)
1 whole Greek Yogurt To Garnish (optional)
description: Roasting the vegetables intensifies and deepens the flavors in this soup. The tomatoes add complexity and the coconut milk pulls it all together.

name: Sugar-Free Granola
ingredients:
1 cup Sliced Almonds
1 cup Raw Sunflower Seeds
1 cup Raw Pumpkin Seeds
½ cups Ground Flax Seeds
¼ cups Melted Coconut Oil
½ cups Raisins
1 cup Gluten Free Oats
1 teaspoon Almond Extract
2 teaspoons Cinnamon
description: Cinnamon spice granola with zero sugar!  Sweetened naturally with raisins, coconut oil and almond extract.

name: Rosemary Roasted Potatoes with Bacon
ingredients:
2 slices Thick Bacon
½ Tablespoons Fresh Rosemary Leaves
¾ pounds Fingerling Potatoes
½ teaspoons Garlic Powder
1 pinch Salt (add More To Taste)
description: Perfectly crisp potatoes roasted with bacon and rosemary.

name: Roasted Squash Seeds
ingredients:
2  Winter Squash (pumpkin, Spaghetti Or Acorn---I Used Spaghetti Squash)
1 Tablespoon Olive Oil
2 teaspoons Salt
1 teaspoon Black Pepper
½ teaspoons Paprika
1 teaspoon Dried Herbs (sage, Thyme, Rosemary)
description: A delicious, healthy snack of roasted winter squash seeds with herbs and spices.

name: The Best Chewy Vanilla Sugar Cookies
ingredients:
4-½ cups All-purpose Flour
1 teaspoon Baking Soda
2 teaspoons Baking Powder
1 teaspoon Salt
3 cups Granulated Sugar, Plus More For Rolling
12 Tablespoons Butter, Melted
⅔ cups Vegetable Oil
4 ounces, weight Cream Cheese, At Room Temperature
2  Eggs
2 Tablespoons Milk
4 teaspoons Pure Vanilla Extract
½ teaspoons Lemon Extract
description: After a few attempts, I believe I’ve perfected these addictive little cookies. They almost melt in your mouth. The combination of butter, cream cheese, lemon and vanilla produces a cookie that is super flavorful with a dense, chewy texture.

name: Homemade Cracker Jack
ingredients:
12 cups Freshly Popped Popcorn (remove Un-popped Kernels)
2 cups Mixed Deluxe Nuts
1 cup Dark Brown Sugar (packed)
½ cups Light Corn Syrup
¼ cups Unsalted Butter, Plus More For The Pan
1 Tablespoon Molasses
2 teaspoons Vanilla Extract
½ teaspoons Baking Soda
½ teaspoons Salt
description: Any time you have a craving, make a batch of homemade Cracker Jack. Great as a Halloween gift, this snack made of peanuts, popcorn and caramel will have you howling with delight!

name: Peanut Butter Oatmeal Smoothie
ingredients:
1 whole Banana, Peeled (plus Extra Sliced Banana For Garnish, If Desired)
¼ cups Old Fashioned Oats (plus Extra For Garnish, If Desired)
2 Tablespoons Creamy Peanut Butter
½ cups Soy Milk
description: A thick and creamy smoothie loaded with creamy peanut butter, old-fashioned oats, bananas and vanilla soy milk.

name: Baked Tater Tots with Smoked Gouda & Green Apple
ingredients:
4 whole Russet Potatoes
3 whole Green Apples, Peeled, Cored And Grated
1 teaspoon Salt
1-½ cup Shredded Smoked Gouda Cheese
description: Easy homemade tater tots with smoked Gouda cheese and green apple!

name: Roasted Salmon Pasta Salad
ingredients:
2 whole Salmon Fillets With Skin Removed
5 Tablespoons Extra-virgin Olive Oil, Divided
2 bunches Dill, Washed, Dried And Chopped
8 ounces, weight Pipette Pasta, Or Pasta Of Choice
3 stalks Celery, Split In Half Lengthwise, Then Sliced Thinly In The Other Direction
1 whole Fresno Red Chile, Sliced Thinly, Discarding The Stalk End That Contains The Majority Of The Seeds
¾ cups Cooked Peas, Room Temperature
1 Tablespoon Mayonnaise
1 whole Large Lemon, Juiced
1 teaspoon Salt, Or To Taste
½ teaspoons Black Pepper, Or To Taste
description: Fresh, bright, flavorful and delicious pasta salad!

name: 3-Pepper Dip
ingredients:
½ cups Softened Cream Cheese
½ cups Shredded White Cheddar Cheese
1 whole Green Chili Pepper (remove Seeds If Desired) Diced Finely
1 whole Jalapeno Pepper (remove Seeds If Desired) Diced Finely
¼ cups Diced Bell Pepper (Any Color)
2 Tablespoons Whole Milk
description: A flavorful dip that’s great for game day or any time!

name: Caramel Apple Snack Cake
ingredients:
½ cups Butter, Softened
¾ cups Brown Sugar
¼ cups Egg Substitute (or Use 1 Egg For The 1/4 Cup Of Egg Substitute)
½ cups Whole Wheat Pastry Flour
½ cups All-purpose Flour
½ teaspoons Baking Powder
½ teaspoons Salt
1 whole Apple, Peeled, Cored, And Diced (I Used Honey Crisp)
description: A light and fluffy cake. Chock-full of apples and drizzled with caramel sauce.

name: Pear and Bourbon Ginger Snap
ingredients:
1 cup FOR THE GINGER SYRUP:
1 cup Sugar
2 whole Water
1 pinch Hands Of Ginger (large Root With Fingers), Sliced
1-½ ounce, fluid Salt
1-½ ounce, fluid FOR THE COCKTAIL:
1 ounce, fluid Bourbon
½ ounces, fluid Pear Juice
description: Fresh ginger syrup makes this drink delicious (and it also makes your house smell heavenly)!

name: Sweet Potato Fruit Juice
ingredients:
1 whole Pomegranate
1 whole Apple, Cored And Quartered
1 whole Large Carrot, Washed
1 whole Orange, Skin Removed
1 whole Grapefruit, Skin Removed
½ whole Lemon, Skin Removed
1 whole Sweet Potato, Chopped
1 cup Chopped Fresh Pineapple
description: Loaded with great fall fruits and vegetables such as pomegranate, sweet potato and other awesome citrus fruits. This is a real winner.

name: Baked Lemon Pasta
ingredients:
1 pound Thin Spaghetti
4 Tablespoons Salted Butter
2 Tablespoons Olive Oil
2 cloves Garlic, Minced
1 whole Lemon, Juiced And Zested
2 cups Sour Cream
½ teaspoons Kosher Salt, Or More To Taste
description: Lemon is an unlikely flavoring for pasta, but oh…is it ever refreshing and good, especially in the spring and summer. There’s something about this baked version, though, that I just love. I use sour cream instead of cream or half and half—I like the “noodle kugel” quality of the finished dish, (I should have been Jewish, I love kugel so much.) and I love the smell of lemon and garlic emanating from the oven.

name: Warm Middle Eastern Quinoa Salad
ingredients:
1 dash FOR THE SALAD:
1 can Truffle Infused Olive Oil
1 pound (28 Oz. Size) Chickpeas, Drained But With Half The Liquid Reserved
3 cups Butternut Squash, Diced
1 cup Packed Kale Leaves, Roughly Chopped
1 cup Dried Apricots
½ teaspoons Currants
2 pinches Minced Garlic
½ teaspoons Truffle Sea Salt
½ teaspoons Cinnamon
½ teaspoons Nutmeg
½ teaspoons Turmeric
1 cup Coriander
1 dash Chopped Walnuts
¼ cups Blueberry Balsamic Vinegar
¼ cups Apple Cider Vinegar
2 cups Vegetable Stock
¼ teaspoons Chopped Fresh Cilantro, For Garnish (optional)
¼ teaspoons FOR THE QUINOA:
¼ teaspoons Vegetable Stock
¼ teaspoons Cinnamon
1 pinch Nutmeg
1 cup Turmeric
description: A warm Middle Eastern-inspired quinoa salad with lots of chickpeas, butternut squash, kale, dried apricots, currants and warm spices. Such a satisfying and tasty vegan delight!

name: Easy Fried Rice
ingredients:
½ Tablespoons Butter
2  Eggs, Whisked
1 Tablespoon Minced Garlic
¼ teaspoons Minced Onion
2-½ cups Frozen Peas And Carrots (can Find A Combination Bag In The Frozen Food Section Of Grocery Store)
2-½ cups Cooked White Rice
4 Tablespoons Soy Sauce
2  Tablespoons Sesame Oil
description: Fast, easy and flavorful, this tastes like your favorite Chinese take-out!

name: Golden Breakfast Porridge with Cinnamon and Sugar
ingredients:
½ cups Butter
1 cup Flour, Heaping
6 cups Water
1-½ Tablespoon Turmeric Powder (or Until Color Of Mixture Starts To Change To A Golden Yellow-orange)
4 Tablespoons Sugar Plus Extra To Sprinkle On Top Of Each Bowl
2 pinches Cinnamon For Sprinkling On Top Of Each Bowl, Or To Taste
description: A simple, warm and comforting Persian breakfast porridge topped with cinnamon and sugar. It’s just way too good.

name: Apple Cider Margaritas
ingredients:
2 Tablespoons Sugar
2 teaspoons Cinnamon
3 ounces, fluid Apple Cider
2 ounces, fluid Silver Tequila
1 ounce, fluid Ginger Liqueur
½ ounces, fluid Grand Marnier
description: Classic margaritas get a serious autumn twist with the help of delicious, fresh apple cider!

name: Jerusalem Artichoke Soup
ingredients:
1 pound Jerusalem Artichokes
½ pounds Sweet Potatoes
1  Large Onion
½ teaspoons (smoked) Paprika Powder
2 cups Vegetable Stock
¾ cups Salt And Pepper
description: A smokey and creamy winter soup. Great for breezy fall days.

name: Sweet Potato Foil Packet Tacos
ingredients:
½ pounds Ground Beef Or Turkey
2 Tablespoons Taco Seasoning
½ cups Tomato Sauce
1 can (15 Oz. Can) Black, Kidney, Or Pinto Beans, Drained
6 cups Sweet Potatoes, Peeled And Cut Into 1/2-inch Cubes
2 Tablespoons Butter
½ teaspoons Salt
1-½ cup Chopped Fresh Spinach
1-½ cup Shredded Cheddar Cheese
description: Taco – tortilla + sweet potato cubes = a gluten-free alternative to tacos that your kids will adore!

name: Holiday Bacon Appetizers
ingredients:
1 package Club Crackers
1 pound Thin Sliced Bacon (or More Depending On Number Of Crackers)
description: These treats, while almost vintagy and prosaic in their ingredients, are so flavorful, crisp and delightful, and whoever tries one is always instantly transformed.

name: [Perfect] Chocolate Chip Cookies
ingredients:
⅔ cups Shortening
⅔ cups Margarine, Softened
1 cup Sugar
1 cup Packed Brown Sugar
2 whole Large Eggs
2 teaspoons Vanilla
3 cups Flour
1 teaspoon Baking Soda
1 teaspoon Salt
2 cups Semi-Sweet Chocolate Chips
description: My husband won’t let me bake any other recipe for chocolate chip cookies!  These are always a hit!

name: Zwiebelkuchen
ingredients:
6 slices Bacon
1 cup White Onion, Sliced
2 whole Eggs
1 cup Sour Cream
⅓ cups Emmental Or Gouda Cheese, Grated
¼ cups Parsley, Chopped
¼ teaspoons Nutmeg
¼ teaspoons Pepper
¾ teaspoons Salt
1 whole (12") Prepared Pizza Crust, Thin Type
description: Authentic recipe from southwestern Germany. A great fall meal with a glass of new wine.

name: Zwieback Pie
ingredients:
4 ounces, weight FOR CRUST
1 Tablespoon Biscotti, Finely Crushed (or Use Zwieback If You Have It)
¼ cups Cinnamon
¼ cups Butter, Melted
¾ cups Sugar (optional)
3 whole FOR FILLING:
1-½ Tablespoon Sugar
1 cup Egg Yolks
description: This was my Mother’s recipe, and a real comfort food.  When the Nabisco Company discontinued Zwieback teething biscuits, a graham cracker crust, although good, was just not the same.  Crisper plain biscotti crumbs make a better substitute. (The King Arthur website has a recipe for making Zwieback.)

name: Zwetschgenkuchen (Italian Prune Plum Cake)
ingredients:
5-⅓ ounces, weight FOR THE CAKE BASE AND FILLING:
6 ounces, weight Butter, At Room Temperature
½ whole Sugar
1 whole Lemon, Zest Only
¾ pounds, 2-⅛ ounces, weight Egg, At Room Temperature
1-½ teaspoon Flour
¾ teaspoons Baking Powder
6 tablespoons, 2 teaspoons, 4-⅝ pinches Salt
3 pounds Milk, At Room Temperature
3-⅝ ounces, weight Italian Prune Plums, Pitted And Cut Into Sixths
3-⅝ ounces, weight Whipped Cream (Sweetened With Sugar And Vanilla), To Serve
7 ounces, weight FOR THE STREUSEL:
1 pinch Sugar
description: A classic plum cake from my grandfather’s bakery in Bavaria.

name: French Breakfast Puffs
ingredients:
3 cups Flour
3 teaspoons Baking Powder
1 teaspoon Salt
½ teaspoons Ground Nutmeg
1 cup Sugar
⅔ cups Shortening (Crisco)
2 whole Eggs
1 cup Milk
1-½ cup Sugar
3 teaspoons Cinnamon
2 sticks Butter
description: Truth be told, there’s really nothing French about these.   What are they? They’re flavorful tinged-with-nutmeg muffins with a buttery-cinnamony-sugary-crusty-decadent outer layer, and each one means 750 more fat cells on your bottom. But who’s counting?

name: Smouldered Shrimp and Tomatoes
ingredients:
12  Large Shrimp, Peeled And Deveined
1  Plum Tomato, Cut Into Slices
2 teaspoons Olive Oil
2 teaspoons Unsalted Butter
3 Tablespoons Dry Vermouth
description: I made this recipe using Smoulder Pepper Seasoning from Kalk Bay Spices & Chelsea Market Baskets.

name: Smashed Sweet Potato Bake
ingredients:
4 whole Sweet Potatoes (Washed, Do Not Peel)
4 Tablespoons Sweet Cream Butter, Softened
2 Tablespoons Brown Sugar
1 Tablespoon Granulated Sugar
1-½ teaspoon Cinnamon
⅓ cups Mini Marshmallows
description: If you like sweet potatoes I think you’ll love these. They are a family favorite!

name: Maple Bacon Butter Cookies
ingredients:
2 slices Bacon
17 Tablespoons Butter, Room Temperature
¼ cups Sugar
3 Tablespoons Bacon Grease
¼ cups Maple Syrup
1 teaspoon Vanilla
½ teaspoons Salt
2 cups Flour
description: By adding bacon and maple syrup to a basic butter cookie, you elevate its deliciousness!

name: Skillet Baked Stuffed Apples
ingredients:
3 Tablespoons Sweet Cream Butter, Melted
6 whole Large Baking Apples
¼ cups Instant Oats
¼ cups Brown Sugar
2 Tablespoons Granulated Sugar
1-½ teaspoon Cinnamon
½ teaspoons Nutmeg
½ teaspoons Pure Vanilla Extract
1 teaspoon Pure Almond Extract
¼ cups Chopped Pecans
1 cup Pure Apple Juice (Divided Use)
description: My family loves the smell of these while they are baking. They are so flavorful. A real treat during the cool fall months.

name: DIY Herbes de Provence
ingredients:
2 Tablespoons Dried Rosemary
1-½ teaspoon Fennel Seeds
1 teaspoon Dried Marjoram
1 teaspoon Dried Thyme
1 teaspoon Dried Tarragon
1 teaspoon Dried Basil
1 teaspoon Dried Oregano
½ teaspoons Dried Dill Weed
1 Tablespoon Lavender Buds (dried) I Got Mine At Whole Foods
1 teaspoon Chervil (got Mine At Whole Foods)
description: A wonderful spice/herb blend used in a multitude of recipes. Remember a little goes a long way!

name: Chex Party Mix
ingredients:
3 cups Corn Chex
3 cups Wheat Chex
3 cups Rice Chex
2 cups Pretzel Sticks
2 cups Mixed Nuts
1 stick (to 1 1/2 Sticks) Butter)
3 Tablespoons Worcestershire Sauce
6 dashes (to 12 Dashes) Tabasco Sauce
3 cloves (to 5) Garlic, Mashed
1 teaspoon Lawry's Seasoned Salt
¼ teaspoons Onion Powder
description: Now listen, folks. I know what you’re thinking. It’s Chex Party Mix, yada yada yada, ya seen one batch of Chex Party Mix, ya seen ‘em all. But I truly believe that if you try this Chex Party Mix, if you open your mind and your heart, you’ll become addicted overnight.

name: Sylvia’s Perfect Pie Crust
ingredients:
1-½ cup Crisco (vegetable Shortening)
3 cups All-purpose Flour
1 whole Egg
5 Tablespoons Cold Water
1 Tablespoon White Vinegar
1 teaspoon Salt
description: I really love flaky pie crust, and it’s always been a difficult quality for me to achieve, despite most people’s claims that their recipe is THE flakiest pie crust in existence.  This recipe, sent to me by my friend Sylvia, is absolutely, positively a keeper.

name: Scrumptious Apple Pie
ingredients:
1 whole Pie Crust
6 cups (to 7 Cups) Peeled And Sliced Granny Smith Apples
½ whole (juice Of) Lemon
½ cups Sugar
4 Tablespoons Flour
¼ teaspoons Salt
½ cups Flour
1-½ stick Butter
1 cup Brown Sugar
½ cups Quick Oats
¼ teaspoons Salt
½ cups Pecans, Chopped
½ jars (or More) Caramel Topping
description: The apple pie you must, must try.

name: Key Lime Pie
ingredients:
18 whole Crust
⅓ cups Graham Crackers (the 4-section Large Pieces)
⅓ cups Sugar
1 Tablespoon Butter, Melted
½ cups _____
2 whole Filling
1 can (heaping) Lime Zest
description: Strict Key Lime Adherents: Please look away. I haven’t got time for the pain. Everyone else: Let’s make Key Lime Pie! Using regular limes! Because that’s all I have available in my small town! And I don’t live in Florida! So I can’t grow my own! Key limes! (I’m still calling it Key Lime Pie, though—no one can stop me. Not even you Strict Key Lime Adherents.)

name: Mystery Rolls
ingredients:
¾ cups Blue Cheese
2 sticks Butter
2 cans Refrigerator Biscuits, Flaky
description: This is one of my mother’s “Recipe Binder” recipes, and as soon as I read it I cracked up and howled. On a sheet of aged, yellowed paper, someone had typed: “Mystery Rolls: 1 can flaky biscuits. 4 ounces crumbled blue cheese. 1 stick butter. Cut biscuits into fourths. Melt butter and cheese on a pan. Roll biscuits in cheese and butter. Bake ’til done.” I chuckled when I read it, but they wound up being delicious!

name: Springy Shells
ingredients:
16 ounces, weight Pasta Shells (medium) Or Other Short Pasta
1 pound Asparagus, Cut Into 1 1/2 Inch Pieces, Discard Tough Pieces
½ pounds Broccoli, Cut Into Small Florets
½ pounds Zucchini (about 1 Medium Zucchini) Diced
½ cups Frozen Peas
3 whole Green Onions Sliced (white & Light Green Parts)
3 cloves Garlic, Minced
4 Tablespoons Butter
2 Tablespoons Olive Oil
20 ounces, weight Ricotta Cheese (20 - 22 Ozs.)
½ teaspoons Salt
2 whole Eggs
1-½ cup Parmesan Cheese
description: The quintessential chick dish: fresh green spring vegetables sauteed in butter and layered with pasta shells and cheese. This is a yummy springtime delight!

name: African Brownies
ingredients:
¾ cups Cocoa
2 sticks Butter
⅛ gallons Sugar
4 whole Eggs
⅜ quarts All-purpose Flour
⅓ Tablespoons Baking Powder
⅓ Tablespoons Salt
¼ quarts Chocolate Chips
description: We got this recipe for brownies while in Africa for several months working in a mission hospital.  The missionaries used this recipe because it called for cocoa, which they had in abundance, rather than baking chocolate.  I have made hundreds of pans over the years!

name: Whole Wheat Chocolate Chip Banana Oat Muffins
ingredients:
1-½ cup Whole Wheat Flour
1 cup Rolled Oats
½ cups Brown Sugar (lightly Packed)
1-½ teaspoon Baking Powder
½ teaspoons Baking Soda
½ teaspoons Salt
½ cups Semi-Sweet Chocolate Chips
2 whole Large Eggs
¼ cups Canola Oil
¼ cups Milk
3 whole Bananas, Peeled And Mashed
description: Quick and easy whole wheat chocolate chip banana oat muffins. Healthy, easy and tasty!

name: Spiced Cider Bars
ingredients:
2-½ cups Cups All-purpose Flour, Divided
½ cups Confectioners Sugar Plus More For Sprinkling On Top
¾ cups Butter, Melted
½ teaspoons Baking Powder
1 teaspoon Ground Cinnamon
¼ teaspoons Ground Allspice
4 whole Large Eggs
1 cup Granulated Sugar
⅓ cups Apple Cider
description: A two layer bar with a sugar cookie crust and a creamy spiced apple cider filling then finished with a light dusting of powdered sugar.

name: Stuffed Dates Wrapped In Bacon
ingredients:
10 whole Dates, Pitted
3 ounces, weight Room Temperature Goat Cheese
½ whole Jalapeno Pepper, Sliced Into Thin Half Moons
10 pieces (2 1/2 Inch Size) Thick-Cut Bacon
description: Pardon me as I wipe my mouth clean; I just inhaled a few too many stuffed dates wrapped in bacon. These little sweet-n-spicy poppers are so hard to resist. Four simple ingredients and you have the perfect party appetizer! I made only 10 because I needed to use up some leftover bacon. But you can adapt to make more!

name: Asian Slow Cooker Pork with Vegetable & Apple Noodles
ingredients:
2-½ pounds Pork Shoulder
½ whole Large Sweet Onion, Chopped
3-½ cups Chicken Stock
½ cups Low Sodium Soy Sauce
¼ cups Mirin (Japanese Rice Wine)
¼ cups Fish Sauce
2 Tablespoons Sugar
1 Tablespoon Sesame Oil
2 teaspoons Kosher Salt
1 teaspoon Garlic Powder
1 teaspoon Chinese Five Spice
2 whole Large Zucchini
4 whole Medium Carrots
2 whole Large Apples (any Kind Works)
1 Tablespoon Olive Oil
2 Tablespoons Chopped Chives (optional)
2 Tablespoons Sesame Seeds (optional)
½ Tablespoons Red Pepper Flakes (optional)
description: Soft and juicy pulled pork paired with light zucchini and carrot noodles and crunchy apples. The perfect gluten-free fall dish.

name: Whole Wheat Pumpkin Muffins
ingredients:
1 cup Whole Wheat Flour
½ cups All-purpose Flour
¾ cups Packed Brown Sugar
1 teaspoon Baking Powder
¼ teaspoons Baking Soda
½ teaspoons Salt
1 cup Canned Pumpkin Puree
1-½ teaspoon Pumpkin Pie Spice
½ teaspoons Cinnamon
¼ teaspoons Nutmeg
¼ cups Unsweetened Applesauce
1 teaspoon Vanilla
1  Egg
1 cup Milk Chocolate Morsels With Peanut Butter Filling
description: Filled with cozy fall flavors for a fraction of the calories you would find in a regular bakery shop muffin.

name: Green Chile Chicken Pot Pie
ingredients:
1 Tablespoon FOR THE FILLING:
1 Tablespoon Butter
⅓ cups Grapeseed Oil Or Other Flavorless Oil
¼ cups Yellow Onion, Diced
1-½ teaspoon Flour
½ teaspoons Chili Powder
¼ teaspoons Cumin
½ teaspoons Garlic Powder
⅛ teaspoons Kosher Salt
1-¼ cup Black Pepper
½ cups Low Sodium Chicken Broth
1-½ cup Skim Milk
½ cups Cooked Chicken Or Turkey, Diced Or Shredded
½ cups Frozen Corn, Defrosted
¾ cups Green Chiles, Diced
¼ cups FOR THE BISCUIT CRUMBLE
½ teaspoons All-purpose Flour
½ teaspoons Whole Wheat Pastry Flour
2 Tablespoons Kosher Salt
2 Tablespoons Chili Powder
½ cups Cold Unsalted Butter, Cubed
description: A delicious and healthier version of comforting chicken pot pie with a southwestern twist!

name: Spicy Jalapeno Dip
ingredients:
1 block (8 Oz. Size) Cream Cheese, Softened
1-¼ cup Sour Cream
¼ teaspoons Red Pepper Flakes
¼ teaspoons Chili Powder
2 whole Jalapeno Peppers (with Seeds) Diced Finely
3 slices Crispy Cooked Bacon (Cut Into Pieces)
½ cups Pecorino Cheese Grated
2 whole Green Onions, For Garnish
description: Great for game day or any gathering of family and friends. Easy, simple and delicious!

name: Zuurkool Met Wurst (Dutch Sauerkraut with Sausage)
ingredients:
5 pounds Potatoes Peeled And Rinsed
32 ounces, weight Jar Of Sauerkraut
8 whole Peppercorns
1 pound Kielbasa
½ cups Milk
4 Tablespoons Butter
description: This is a popular one pot Dutch dish.  I make this just how my husband’s mom did.  If you can peel potatoes then you can make this dish.

name: Old Fashioned Fish & Chips
ingredients:
1 cup FOR THE BATTER:
¼ cups Pancake Or Waffle Batter Mix (I Use Hungry Jack Mix)
1 whole Buttermilk
½ teaspoons Egg, Beaten
½ teaspoons Salt
2 whole Black Pepper
4 whole Yukon Gold Potatoes (washed, Sliced Thin)
¼ cups Fresh Haddock Fillets (2" Thick)
2 Tablespoons FOR THE SAUCE:
3 Tablespoons Mayonnaise
description: This recipe is one my great-grandmother made almost every Friday night! Flavorful and easy.

name: Zuppa Toscana Soup (Just Like Olive Garden’s!)
ingredients:
1 pound Spicy Italian Sausage, Crumbled
½ pounds Smoked Bacon, Chopped When Uncooked
1 quart Water
2 cans (14.5 Ounce) Chicken Broth
2 whole Large Russet Potatoes, Scrubbed Clean And Sliced About 1/3" Thick
2 whole Garlic Cloves, Peeled And Crushed
1 whole Medium Onion, Chopped
2 cups Kale Or Swiss Chard, Chopped
1 cup Heavy Whipping Cream
description: If you love Olive Garden’s Zuppa Toscana soup, this tastes just like it.  It’s an easy soup and always a hit!

name: Zuppa Toscana (Olive Garden Style)
ingredients:
1 pound Ground Sausage
1-½ teaspoon Crushed Red Pepper
4 strips Bacon, Sliced In 1/2" Pieces
1 whole Diced Onion
4 cloves Garlic, Grated On A Microplane
10 cups Chicken Stock Or Broth
1 pound Russet Potatoes, Sliced
1 cup Heavy Cream
½ bunches Kale Leaves, Chopped
description: Who needs to go to Olive Garden when you can make it yourself!

name: Zuppa Toscana
ingredients:
1 pound Italian Sausage, Mild
½ teaspoons Red Pepper Flakes, Or More To Taste
4 slices Bacon, Chopped
1 whole White Onion, Diced
5 cloves Garlic, Minced
8 cups Low Sodium Chicken Broth
2 cups Water
3 whole Russet Potatoes, Peeled And Chopped
1-¼ cup Heavy Cream
3 cups Kale, Chopped
description: Even better than Olive Garden’s version, and super easy to make!

name: Zuppa Toscana
ingredients:
1 pound Mild Italian Sausage (I Used Chicken Because It's Leaner)
1 teaspoon Red Pepper Flakes
4 strips Bacon, Chopped
1 whole Sweet Onion, Chopped
3 cloves Garlic, Minced
4 cups Chicken Stock
2 cups Water
3 whole Russet Potatoes, Peeled And Cut Into Half Moons
1 cup Heavy Cream
4 cups Chopped Kale, Stems Removed
description: For me there aren’t many things better than some warm toasty bread and a good soup to dunk it in. And this one just so happens to bring together everything I love in one big bowl. Potatoes, bacon, heavy cream and enough veggies to make you think it’s good for you.

name: Zuppa Toscana
ingredients:
1 pound Spicy Sausage (See Note)
1 pound Bacon
2 cups Diced Onion
1 Tablespoon Minced Garlic
6 Tablespoons Chicken Base
3 quarts Water
5 cups Russet Potatoes (or 6 Medium Potatoes), Unpeeled And Thinly Sliced
5 cups Kale Leaves, Cut In Half, Then Sliced (Ribs Removed)
1-⅓ cup Heavy Whipping Cream
description: My version of my favorite soup at a certain chain Italian restaurant. Except, I think mine is better.

name: Zuppa Pomodoro  di Toscano (Tuscan Tomato Soup)
ingredients:
5 cups Whole Tomatoes, Peeled, Seeded And Diced
2 cups Chicken Stock
2 whole Large Yellow  Onions, Peeled And Finely Diced
1-½ cup Heavy Whipping Cream
1 cup Basil Pesto, Yours  Or See My Recipe
3 Tablespoons Extra Virgin Olive Oil
description: This isn’t the bland, tasteless catsup-like soup from the famous red and white can of your youth. This is a  full-bodied, hearty and flavourful gift from Tuscany. You can  either use fresh Roma tomatoes or whole, canned Italian style tomatoes. If  you opt  for the  latter, use genuine San Marzano tomatoes  from Italy. It’s worth the few pennies more in taste.

name: Cheese Filled Egg Rolls
ingredients:
1 package FOR THE EGG ROLLS:
1 package (16 Oz. Size) Egg Roll Wrappers
2 cups (16 Oz. Size) Mozzarella Cheese Sticks
1 can Corn Oil

name: Triple Chocolate Bundt Cake

2-¼ cups Cool Whip

That’s Spanish, in case you didn’t know.
