1-½ cup Peeled And Grated Sweet Potato
1 cup Walnuts, Chopped
description: Moist zucchini sweet potato quick bread. Loaded with spices and nuts.

name: Zucchini Sundae Brownies
ingredients:
½ cups FOR BROWNIES:
1-½ cup Vegetable Oil
2 teaspoons White Sugar
2 cups Vanilla Extract
½ cups Flour
1-½ teaspoon Unsweetened Cocoa Powder
1 teaspoon Baking Soda
2 cups Salt
½ cups Shredded Zucchini
½ cups Chopped Maraschino Cherries
6 Tablespoons Mini Marshmallows
¼ cups _____
2 cups FOR FROSTING:
¼ cups Unsweetened Cocoa Powder
½ teaspoons Margarine
description: Oh so good brownies with yummy extras to fulfill any sweet tooth.

name: Zucchini Summer Soup
ingredients:
2 Tablespoons Extra-Virgin Oil
⅔ cups Red Onion
½ cups Carrot
1 cup Sweet Potato
4 cups Low Sodium Vegetable Soup
1 cup Zucchini, Diced
½ cups Frozen Peas
½ cups Chickpeas
1 teaspoon Garlic Powder
1 pinch Chili Pepper
2 Tablespoons Salt And Pepper
description: This Zucchini Summer Soup is very flavorful super easy recipe to make. You can add any seasonal veggies and you will end up with a delicious meal!

name: Apple Pie Breakfast Parfait
ingredients:
2 whole Apples, Peeled, Cored, And Diced
¼ teaspoons Cinnamon
2 Tablespoons Brown Sugar, Divided
1 Tablespoon Butter
1 Tablespoon Flour
2 Tablespoons Chopped Pecans
½ cups Oats
12 ounces, fluid Greek Yogurt, Vanilla Flavored
description: Vanilla yogurt, cinnamon apples and a homemade streusel topping make for a sensational Autumn breakfast or snack.

name: Homemade Chicken Noodle Soup
ingredients:
1 whole Medium Onion, Diced
3 whole Large Carrots, Peeled, Diced
3 stalks Celery, Diced
1 Tablespoon Parsley
2 teaspoons Thyme
1 teaspoon Oregano
2 teaspoons Ground Pepper
2 teaspoons Salt
2 leaves Bay Leaf
4-½ pounds Whole Chicken, Cleaned (make Sure You Take Any Bags Out Of It)
12 ounces, weight Bag Extra Wide Egg Noodles
description: A traditional slow-cooked homemade chicken noodle soup. Made with a whole chicken, vegetables and egg noodles.

name: Kürbiscremesuppe (a.k.a. Pumpkin Cream Soup)
ingredients:
2 Tablespoons Butter
½ whole Onion, Diced
1 whole Medium Carrot, Diced
2 cloves Garlic, Minced
1 whole Hokkaido Pumpkin, Peeled, De-seeded, And Chopped Into 1" Pieces
2 whole Small Yukon Gold Potatoes, Chopped Into 1" Pieces
3 cups Vegetable Broth
2 cups Water
1 leaf Bay Leaf
¼ teaspoons Nutmeg
1-½ Tablespoon Fresh Parsley, Chopped
¾ teaspoons Salt (or More To Taste)
¼ teaspoons Black Pepper
½ cups Crème Fraîche
1 cup Heavy Cream
description: A popular fall dish in Bavaria. So easy to make at home.

name: Soft and Fudgy Chocolate Cake with Chocolate Frosting
ingredients:
1-¾ cup FOR THE CAKE:
1-¾ cup All-purpose Flour
1 cup Sugar
1 teaspoon Unsweetened Cocoa Powder
2 teaspoons Salt
1 teaspoon Baking Soda
½ cups Baking Powder
1 cup Vegetable Oil Or Canola Oil
2 whole Buttermilk
1 teaspoon Eggs
1 cup Pure Vanilla Extract
1-¾ stick Water
7 Tablespoons FOR THE FROSTING:
⅔ cups Butter, Melted
1 teaspoon Unsweetened Cocoa Powder (heaping)
3-¾ cups Whole Milk
description: This is what you crave when you imagine the best chocolate cake ever. Ever. Ever!

name: Papa Jer’s Smoky Cheesecake
ingredients:
1-½ cup FOR THE CRUST:
10  Graham Cracker Crumbs
2 ounces, weight Crushed Chocolate Cream Oreo Cookies
½ teaspoons Chopped Macadamia Nuts
6-½ Tablespoons Pumpkin Spice
32 ounces, weight Butter
1-¼ cup FOR THE FILLING:
½ cups Cream Cheese, Softened To Room Temperature
2 teaspoons Smoked Sugar
5  Sour Cream At Room Temperature
1 cup Vanilla Extract
½ cups Large Eggs, At Room Temperature
2 teaspoons Chocolate Sprinkles
description: This cheesecake is made with smoked sugar, giving it a wonderful sweet smoky flavor.

name: Baked Ranch Chicken
ingredients:
2 whole Boneless, Skinless Chicken Breasts
½ cups Ranch Dressing - You Can Use Reduced Fat
½ cups Breadcrumbs
1 Tablespoon Dried Parsley
1 teaspoon Onion Powder
1 teaspoon Garlic Powder
description: Chicken breasts are breaded using ranch dressing to add great ranch flavor without tons of calories.

name: Meaty Pumpkin Chili
ingredients:
1 dash Olive Oil
1 pound Ground Meatloaf Mix (equal Parts Beef, Pork And Veal)
1 teaspoon Chili Powder
1 teaspoon Lime Sea Salt (or Regular Salt Is Fine Too!)
½ teaspoons Cinnamon
½ teaspoons Nutmeg
½ teaspoons Smoked Paprika
¼ teaspoons Cumin
1 pinch Crushed Red Pepper
1 whole Onion, Peeled And Finely Diced
4 whole Canned Chipotle Peppers In Adobo Sauce, Finely Chopped
1 Tablespoon Finely Chopped Fresh Cilantro Leaves, Plus Additional For Garnish
2 Tablespoons Apple Cider Vinegar
1-¼ cup Canned Pumpkin Puree
1 can (28 Oz. Size) Crushed Tomatoes
¼ cups Chicken Stock
1 cup Plain Greek Yogurt, As Needed For Topping
description: This pumpkin chili is loaded with warm fall flavors. So comforting as the temperatures start to drop!

name: Salted Caramel Apple Cinnamon Smoothie
ingredients:
1 Tablespoon Butter
2 whole Apples, Peeled, Cored And Sliced
1 teaspoon Brown Sugar
½ teaspoons Cinnamon
2 cups Frozen Fat Free Cool Whip
1 cup Milk
1 cup Ice
2 Tablespoons Caramel Sauce (for Drizzle)
1 pinch Sea Salt, to taste
description: Caramelized apples and cinnamon are combined for the perfect, creamy, ice cold smoothie. Even better, it’s topped with salted caramel!

name: Zucchini Bread
ingredients:
2 cups Shredded Zucchini
1-½ cup All-purpose Flour
1-½ cup Whole Wheat Flour
2 teaspoons Baking Powder
¼ teaspoons Baking Soda
2 teaspoons Cinnamon
1 teaspoon Salt
2  Egg
1 cup Sugar
½ cups Brown Sugar, Packed
¾ cups Olive Or Canola Oil
2 teaspoons Vanilla Extract
description: A simple and perfect zucchini bread.

name: Pistachio Chocolate Chip Cookies
ingredients:
1-½ cup Flour
½ teaspoons Salt
¾ teaspoons Baking Powder
½ teaspoons Baking Soda
½ cups Unsalted Butter,  Room Temperature
¼ cups Sugar
¾ cups Brown Sugar
1  Egg
1 teaspoon Vanilla Extract
¾ cups Pistachios, Shelled And Chopped
1 cup Dark Chocolate
description: Switch up pecans or walnuts for pistachios in your classic chocolate chip cookies!

name: Apple Spice Punch
ingredients:
6 cups, 5 tablespoons, 1 teaspoon, 5-¼ pinches Apple Juice, Not From Concentrate
8 whole Cloves
2 whole Cinnamon Sticks, Snapped In Half
1 pinch Ground Allspice
description: Served warm or chilled, this non-alcoholic apple spice punch will have you dreaming of cozy autumn evenings. Infused with cloves and cinnamon, this is the only apple punch recipe you’ll need!

name: Spinach and Mushroom Quiche
ingredients:
1  Pie Crust (or Pie Shell), Chilled
1 package (10 Oz. Size) Frozen Spinach
1 Tablespoon Extra Virgin Olive Oil
8 ounces, weight Fresh Cremini Mushrooms, Sliced
1 clove Garlic, Minced
4  Large Eggs
1 cup Whole Milk
⅓ cups Grated Parmesan Cheese
½ cups Sea Salt And Fresh Cracked Pepper
½ cups Grated Cheddar Cheese
description: Delicious spinach and mushroom quiche recipe with cheddar and mozzarella on a flaky, buttery pie crust.

name: Whole Wheat Pumpkin Dinner Rolls
ingredients:
2 teaspoons Instant Yeast
½ cups Warm Water, About 110ºF
1 cup Buttermilk
3 Tablespoons Pure Maple Syrup
1-½ cup Pumpkin Puree
4 Tablespoons Unsalted Butter, melted
1 Tablespoon Salt
3 cups Whole Wheat Flour
3 cups All-purpose Flour, Or More As Needed
description: Soft whole wheat pumpkin dinner rolls that are easy to make!

name: Pumpkin Chocolate Chip Bars
ingredients:
1-½ cup Flour
½ teaspoons Salt
1 teaspoon Baking Powder
½ teaspoons Ground Cinnamon
¼ teaspoons Ground Nutmeg
¼ cups Oats
½ cups Brown Sugar
1 cup Chocolate Chips
½ cups Vegetable Oil
½ cups Canned Pumpkin
2 teaspoons Vanilla Extract
1 Tablespoon Sugar
3 Tablespoons Honey
description: Like pumpkin bread with chocolate chips, just in bar format!

name: Zucchini Soup
ingredients:
3 pounds Zucchini
2 Tablespoons Butter
½ cups Onion, Chopped
1 teaspoon Salt
½ teaspoons Pepper
¼ cups Chopped Parsley
1 Tablespoon Chopped Fresh Basil (or 1 Teaspoon Dried Basil)
6 cups Chicken Broth
2 cups Croutons
description: This creamy soup is another way to use up the abundance of zucchini every summer.

name: Zucchini Slice
ingredients:
3 cups Zucchini, Grated
2 cups Peas And Corn, Frozen
3 slices Bacon - Cubed
2 cups Your Favorite Cheese, Grated
2 cups Self-Rising Flour
½ cups Grapeseed Oil
5 whole Eggs, Beaten
description: A very quick, easy and tasty meal for young and old.

name: Zucchini Slice
ingredients:
2 whole Zucchini, Grated
1 whole Sweet Potato (Yam), Peeled And Grated
1 whole Onion, Chopped Fine
4 pieces Raw Bacon, Chopped
½ cups Cheese, Grated
6 whole Eggs
1 cup Flour
⅛ cups Vegetable Oil
description: A delicious light dinner or lunch, packed with vegetables and bacon. Super easy to prepare. Best served with home fries/oven fries, salad and drizzled with Thai sweet chilli sauce.

name: Zucchini Shrimp Scampi
ingredients:
2 whole Zucchinis, Medium
2 Tablespoons Olive Oil
1 Tablespoon Minced Garlic
¼ teaspoons Crushed Red Pepper Flakes (optional)
10 whole Jumbo Shrimp, Shells Removed (I Used Frozen, Cooked Shrimp And Let Them Thaw Prior To Sautéing.)
¼ cups White Wine
2 Tablespoons Lemon Juice
description: This skinny shrimp scampi recipe is so simple and delicious. Fresh zucchini noodles, shrimp, and a few basic ingredients are all you need for this healthy meal.

name: Zucchini Salad with Peach Basil Dressing
ingredients:
2  FOR THE SALAD:
1-½ cup Zucchini
1  Strawberries, Roughly Chopped
1-½ cup Yellow/orange Pepper, Stem And Seeds Removed, Roughly Diced
1  Cucumber, Roughly Chopped
1  Avocado, Peeled, Pitted, And Diced
1  FOR THE DRESSING:
1  Peach, Halved And Pitted
½ cups Tomato, Quartered
2 Tablespoons Red Bell Pepper, Cored And Halved
1 pinch Fresh Basil
1 Tablespoon Apple Cider Vinegar
description: Summer in a bowl.  Zucchini noodles and the bounties of the season topped with an oil-free peach basil dressing.

name: Zucchini Salad
ingredients:
3 whole Tomatoes, Core Removed Then Diced
3 whole Zucchinis, Stem Removed Then Diced
½ cups Chopped Mild Sweet Onion
½ cups Miracle Whip
description: Zucchini with tomatoes, onion and Miracle Whip. Yum!

name: Zucchini Rounds
ingredients:
2 whole Medium Zucchinis, Peeled
8 ounces, weight Pimento Cheese Spread
description: Do you love slathering your favorite spread on a buttery cracker?  Well, I do. But, here’s a healthy, tasty alternative. Peel and slice a fresh, crisp zucchini into rounds. The mild flavor does not compete with the spread and the crunch is a low-fat alternative to those crackers!

name: Minestrone Soup
ingredients:
2 Tablespoons Extra Virgin Olive Oil
½  Large Onion, Diced
2 cloves Garlic, Minced
½  Large Carrot, Sliced
½ cups Cut-up Green Beans
2 Tablespoons Italian Seasoning
2 cups Sea Salt And Ground Black Pepper To Taste
3 cups Canned Stewed Tomatoes
3 cups Low Sodium Chicken Broth
1 cup Tomato Juice
1 cup Canned Or Cooked Kidney Beans, Drained And Rinsed
description: This soup is absolutely perfect for those chilly fall and winter days. It’s packed with tons of yummy vegetables and flavors.

name: Cheesy Spaghetti Squash
ingredients:
1 whole Large Spaghetti Squash
½ Tablespoons Olive Oil
¼ cups Shredded Mozzarella Cheese
2 teaspoons Fresh Thyme, Chopped
1 teaspoon Fresh Oregano, Chopped
½ teaspoons Pepper
1 teaspoon Garlic Powder
1 teaspoon Onion Powder
1 teaspoon Paprika
¼ cups Grated Parmesan Cheese
¼ cups Panko
description: Creamy spaghetti squash with cheese and herbs, topped with crunchy panko.

name: Red Curry Coconut Squash Soup
ingredients:
1  Medium-sized Butternut Squash
2 Tablespoons Butter
1 Tablespoon Coconut Oil
½  Onion, Chopped
3 cloves Garlic, Minced
1 Tablespoon Freshly Grated Ginger
2  Roasted Red Peppers, Sliced
2 Tablespoons Red Curry Paste
14 ounces, fluid Coconut Milk
½ cups Skim Milk
description: This soup has such an amazing balance of flavours and has officially become my favourite soup. Perfect for a chilly fall day! And I highly suggest the toasted squash seeds as a garnish. They really add a lot!

name: Raspberry Crumb Bread with Lemon Glaze
ingredients:
½ cups FOR THE CRUMB TOPPING:
1-½ Tablespoon Flour
1 Tablespoon Brown Sugar
1 teaspoon Granulated Sugar
⅛ teaspoons Baking Powder
3 Tablespoons Salt
1-½ cup Butter, Melted
1-½ teaspoon FOR THE RASPBERRY LOAF:
½ teaspoons All-purpose Flour
½ teaspoons Baking Powder
3 Tablespoons Baking Soda
¾ cups Salt
1  Butter, Melted
1  Granulated Sugar
¾ cups Egg
1-½ teaspoon Egg White
2 teaspoons Sour Cream
1-½ cup Pure Vanilla Extract
1-¼ cup Lemon Zest
2 Tablespoons Fresh Raspberries
1 teaspoon FOR THE LEMON GLAZE:
1 teaspoon Confectioners Sugar
description: This recipe can be easily adapted for muffins, but I prefer baking it in a loaf pan and calling it “bread”. Raspberry bread suggests enjoying a slice in the middle of the afternoon, with a cup of coffee or tea.

name: 15-minute Lemon Parmesan Brown Rice
ingredients:
4 cups Boil-in-a-Bag Brown Rice
3 Tablespoons Lemon Juice
1 Tablespoon Olive Oil
1 Tablespoon Fresh Parsley, Chopped
¼ teaspoons Pepper
⅛ teaspoons Salt
2 Tablespoons Parmesan Cheese
description: Quick 15-minute Lemon Parmesan Brown Rice. A healthy side dish made with fresh squeezed lemon juice, Parmesan cheese and fresh parsley.

name: Apple Shortbread Pie
ingredients:
2 cups FOR THE SHORTBREAD CRUST:
¼ teaspoons All-purpose Flour
2 sticks Salt
½ cups Unsalted Butter,  Room Temperature
1 teaspoon Powdered Sugar
6 pieces Vanilla Extract
4 Tablespoons FOR THE APPLE FILLING:
1 cup Granny Smith Apples, Peeled, Cored And Cubed
4 Tablespoons Unsalted Butter
1-½ teaspoon Brown Sugar
description: Simple and delicious apple pie with a shortbread crust. Perfect for the holiday season.

name: Korean Bulgogi (Thinly Sliced BBQ Beef)
ingredients:
2 pounds Rib Eye Steak
4 Tablespoons Gochujang Or Red Pepper Paste, Or To Taste (optional)
1 Tablespoon Gochugaru Or Red Pepper Flakes, Or To Taste (optional)
1  Small Onion Julienned
1  Small Carrot Julienned
2  Green Onion, Cut Into 2 Inch Pieces
5 Tablespoons Sesame Seeds, For Garnish
½ cups FOR THE MARINADE:
5 cloves Sugar
2 Tablespoons Soy Sauce
2 Tablespoons Garlic
1 teaspoon Sesame Oil
description: For those who don’t know what bulgogi is, it’s thinly sliced rib eye steak (or another prime cut of meat) that is marinated overnight with a flavorful soy sauce mixture.

name: Cranberry-Nut Bread
ingredients:
2 Tablespoons Butter
½ cups Whole Milk
½ cups Water
3 Tablespoons Honey
1 cup Whole Wheat Flour
2-½ cups All-purpose Flour, Or More As Needed
1-½ teaspoon Salt
2-½ teaspoons Yeast
1 whole Egg - At Room Temperature, Lightly Beaten
½ cups Cranberries -- Fresh, Raw, Coarsly Chopped
1 Tablespoon Brown Sugar
1  Orange, Washed Well Then Zested
½ cups Walnuts - Coarsely Chopped (or Favorite Nut Of Choice)
2 Tablespoons Butter, Melted
description: This bread is great for turkey sandwiches. It takes Thanksgiving leftovers to the next level!

name: Colcannon Soup
ingredients:
2 teaspoons Olive Oil
3 slices Thick Cut Smoked Bacon, Diced
2 whole Leeks -- Well Cleaned And Sliced (white And Light Green Only)
4 cups Chicken Broth, Low-Sodium
3 whole Large Russet Potatoes, Peeled And Diced
½ cups Heavy Cream
12 whole Brussel Sprouts (Add More Depending On Size And Diner's Preference), Stem Removed, Thinly Shaved
2 Tablespoons Salt And Pepper, to taste
description: A combination of Irish colcannon and potato-leek soup. How can you go wrong with these ingredients?

name: Ginger Zucchini Bread with Lemon Glaze
ingredients:
1-½ cup FOR THE BREAD:
½ teaspoons All-purpose Flour
½ teaspoons Salt
¼ teaspoons Baking Soda
1 teaspoon Baking Powder
½ cups Ground Ginger
¼ cups Granulated Sugar
1 teaspoon Light Or Dark Brown Sugar
2  Fresh Ginger, Peeled And Finely Grated
¼ cups Eggs
¼ cups Vegetable Oil
2 teaspoons Butter, Melted
1-½ cup Pure Vanilla Extract
2 Tablespoons Shredded Zucchini, Packed And Undrained
1-½ cup FOR THE LEMON GLAZE:
2 teaspoons Fresh Lemon Juice
2 teaspoons Confectioners Sugar
description: This is my family’s favorite zucchini bread recipe. It’s supremely moist and not too sweet. The hint of ginger adds a homey warmth and the lemon glaze tastes like a lemon drop candy.

name: Healthy Chocolate Chip Halloween Skillet Cookie
ingredients:
1-½ cup White Whole Wheat Flour
1-½ teaspoon Cornstarch
¼ teaspoons Salt
¾ teaspoons Baking Powder
2 teaspoons Pumpkin Pie Spice
½ cups Plus 1 Tablespoon Mashed Avocado
¾ cups Brown Sugar, Packed
3  Egg Yolks
1-½ teaspoon Vanilla Extract
1-½ Tablespoon Honey
¼ cups Plus 2 Tablespoons Mini Chocolate Chips
½ cups Candy Corn Plus More For Topping If Desired
description: This chocolate chip skillet cookie is decorated for Halloween. Oil/butter-free and 100% whole wheat!

name: Pumpkin Spice French Toast
ingredients:
2  Eggs
⅓ cups Milk
2 teaspoons Brown Sugar
2 Tablespoons Pumpkin Pie Spice
2 Tablespoons Butter
4 slices Fresh Italian Bread
description: Add an autumn flair to your breakfast with this wonderful pumpkin spice French toast!

name: Asparagus Salsa
ingredients:
1 pound Asparagus
1 cup Seeded And Finely Diced Tomato
¼ whole Medium-sized Red Onion, Finely Diced (more Or Less As Desired)
¼ cups Sun-dried Tomatoes, In Oil, Chopped
3 Tablespoons Chopped Mixed Fresh Herbs To Taste -- Basil, Citantro, Parsley, Thyme, Chives
3 Tablespoons Olive Oil
3 Tablespoons Balsamic Vinegar
description: A great alternative to tomato-basil bruschetta, this salsa is perfect served on crostini or crispy pita wedges.

name: Glazed Apple Oatmeal Cookies
ingredients:
2-¾ cups Old Fashioned Oats
1-¼ cup All-purpose Flour
1-½ teaspoon Apple Pie Spice
½ teaspoons Salt
¼ teaspoons Baking Soda
¾ cups Butter, Softened
1-¼ cup Brown Sugar, Firmly Packed
1  Egg
¼ cups Plus 2 Tablespoons Milk
2 teaspoons Vanilla Extract
1 cup Diced Apple (for 1 Cup You'll Need About 2 Apples)
1-½ cup Confectioners Sugar
description: These Glazed Apple Oatmeal Cookies are filled with apple chunks and spices and topped with a deliciously sweet glaze.

name: Marbled Chocolate Pumpkin Bread with Pumpkin Caramel
ingredients:
2 whole FOR THE BREAD:
1 cup Eggs
1 stick Sugar
1 teaspoon Unsalted Butter, At Room Temperature
1 cup Vanilla
½ cups Canned Unsweetened Pumpkin Puree
2 cups Buttermilk
1 teaspoon All-purpose Flour
½ teaspoons Baking Soda
½ teaspoons Baking Powder
½ teaspoons Pumpkin Pie Spice
¾ teaspoons Cinnamon
¾ cups Salt
½ cups Semi-Sweet Chocolate Chips
½ cups FOR THE SAUCE:
1 Tablespoon Sugar
½ teaspoons Heavy Cream
2 Tablespoons Unsalted Butter
¼ teaspoons Vanilla
1 pinch Canned Unsweetened Pumpkin Puree
description: The only thing more fun than adding chocolate to pumpkin bread is drizzling it with pumpkin caramel!

name: Apple Crisp Stuffed Apples (Slow Cooker)
ingredients:
4  Apples
½ cups Brown Sugar
½ cups Maple Syrup
¼ cups Butter
¾ cups Chopped Walnuts
1 cup Quick Cooking Oats
1 teaspoon Cinnamon
¼ cups Dry Cranberries
1 cup Apple Juice
description: Please your taste buds with this delicious warming dessert!

name: Mason Jar Pumpkin Cake for Two
ingredients:
1 whole Egg White
2 Tablespoons White Granulated Sugar
¼ teaspoons Vanilla Extract
2 Tablespoons Butter, Melted And Cooled
3 Tablespoons Canned Pumpkin Puree (not Pumpkin Pie Filling)
¼ cups All-purpose Flour
¼ teaspoons Baking Powder
1 pinch Salt
½ teaspoons Cinnamon
¼ teaspoons Pumpkin Pie Spice
1 Tablespoon Milk
1 ounce, weight Reduced Fat Cream Cheese, At Room Temperature
1 Tablespoon Butter, At Room Temperature
⅓ cups Powdered Sugar
description: Moist and spicy pumpkin cake is scaled down to a serving for two. This will make anyone’s day extra special when baked in a cute Mason jar. Topped with cream cheese frosting and sprinkles, this makes a great fall-inspired gift or special occasion treat for two.

name: Eggplant Parmesan
ingredients:
32 ounces, fluid Your Favorite Tomato Pasta Sauce
2-½ cups Shredded Mozzarella Cheese (and A Bit Extra For Garnish)
4 Tablespoons Herbes De Provence, Divided Use
1 cup All-purpose Flour
4  Eggs, Beaten
1 cup Italian Bread Crumbs
¼ cups Grated Parmesan Cheese Plus More As Desired For Sprinkling
1  Large Eggplant
description: I will gladly take eggplant Parmesan over any other form of Parmesan (chicken or veal)!  I prefer it over rice instead of pasta!

name: Braised Chicken and Caramelized Vegetables
ingredients:
3 Tablespoons Extra Virgin Olive Oil
6 pounds Chicken Thighs And Breasts With Skin On
1 Tablespoon Salt
2 teaspoons Black Pepper
2 whole Small-medium Yellow Onions, Sliced Into Thick Rings
1 pound Brussels Sprouts, Rinsed
1 head Garlic, Cloves Separated But Left Unpeeled
1 package (16 Oz. Size) Cherry Tomatoes, Rinsed
2 whole Red Fresno Chili Peppers, Rinsed And Left As Is
6 sprigs Thyme
1 whole Lemon, Juiced
2 cups Chicken Broth
description: This is the ultimate fall dinner! It’s comfort food at its best with braised chicken and delicious vegetables in a lovely broth. Perfect.

name: Zucchini Pumpkin Bread
ingredients:
3  Eggs, Lightly Beaten
¾ cups Honey Or Agave
1 cup Canned Pumpkin
1 cup Butter, Melted
1 Tablespoon Vanilla Extract
3 cups Whole Wheat Flour
1 Tablespoon Pumpkin Pie Spice
½ teaspoons Salt
½ teaspoons Baking Powder
1 teaspoon Baking Soda
2  Medium-sized Zuchini, Shredded
1 cup Chocolate Chips
description: With the start of fall still fresh in all of our minds, I had to make a nice hearty bread filled with fall goodness. Best eaten warm, this will fill your belly with preemptive holiday cheer.

name: Penne a la Betsy
ingredients:
¾ pounds Penne Pasta
1 pound Shrimp
3 Tablespoons Butter
3 Tablespoons Olive Oil
1 whole Onion (small)
2 cloves Garlic
½ cups White Wine, Or To Taste
1 can Tomato Sauce (8 Oz)
1 cup Heavy Cream
description: This pasta is made with an unbeatable combination of shrimp, tomato sauce, cream, garlic, wine and herbs.  It’s simple, flavorful, and whomever you make it for will pledge their eternal admiration and support for you.

name: Caramel Oatmeal Bars
ingredients:
14 ounces, weight Bag Caramels (prefer Kraft), Unwrapped
½ cups Evaporated Milk
2 cups All-purpose Flour
2 cups Oatmeal, Quick Cook Or Instant
1-½ cup Packed Brown Sugar
1-½ cup Butter (Room Temperature)
½ teaspoons Salt
1 teaspoon Baking Soda
8 ounces, weight Chocolate Chips
description: Caramel and chocolate between two layers of oatmeal crust!

name: Homemade Yogurt
ingredients:
5-½ cups Milk
½ cups Heavy Cream
4 Tablespoons Plain Yogurt As Starter
description: Making your own yogurt is so ridiculously simple and tastes absolutely divine. You may never go back to store-bought again.

name: Biscuits and Gravy
ingredients:
1 pound Breakfast Sausage
1 can (16 Oz.) Canned Biscuits
2 Tablespoons Flour
1 cup Milk
description: Biscuits and Gravy: a very important cowboy staple.  So dadgum delicious. And the gravy technique is applicable to just about any gravy situation you may come across on your path through life, like chicken fried steak or even turkey at Thanksgiving.

name: Delicious Vanilla Bean Ice Cream
ingredients:
1 whole Vanilla Bean, Split And Scraped
3 cups Half-and-half
2 cups Sugar
8 whole (up To 9) Large Egg Yolks
3 cups Heavy Cream
description: You can’t beat homemade vanilla bean ice cream. This is creamy, smooth, and wonderful. Simply divine, and perfect with a big slice of warm chocolate sheet cake.

name: Strawberry Meringue Pie (a.k.a. Lovebird Pie)
ingredients:
2 cups Cooked Strawberries (made From Apprx. 4 C Fresh Berries)
4 whole Egg, Separated (Reserve Whites For Meringue)
¾ cups Butter (1 1/2 Sticks)
2 cups All-purpose Flour
½ teaspoons Salt
2 teaspoons Sugar
1-½ cup Granulated Sugar
⅓ cups Cornstarch
3 Tablespoons Butter
1 Tablespoon Lemon Juice
6 Tablespoons Ice Water (approximately)
description: This recipe came to me while out picking in the strawberry patch. I dedicated it to my niece — ‘Lovebird’ — whose wedding shower was held recently. It’s a sweet, strawberry twist on the more traditional lemon meringue pie, using my all-butter pie crust recipe. Give it a try and you will feel the love.

name: Delicious Blackberry Ice Cream
ingredients:
2 pints Fresh Blackberries
½ whole Juiced Lemon
¼ cups Sugar
1-½ cup Half-and-half
1 cup Sugar
5 whole Egg Yolks
1-½ cup Heavy Cream
description: This is a custard-based ice cream, which is the best kind of ice cream there is. You’ll need an ice cream maker; mine’s an old wooden one. And don’t forget those beautiful, dark, glorious blackberries!

name: Blackberry Cobbler #1
ingredients:
1 stick Butter
1-¼ cup Sugar
1 cup Self-Rising Flour
1 cup Milk
2 cups Blackberries (frozen Or Fresh)
description: This is my favorite version of cobbler. It’s cakey and sweet and can really stand on its own without a creamy accompaniment such as ice cream or whipped cream.

name: Self-Rising Biscuits
ingredients:
2-⅓ cups Whole Milk
3 Tablespoons White Distilled Vinegar
6 cups Self-rising Flour, Plus More For Kneading
1-½ teaspoon Salt
¾ cups Lard (OR Butter OR Shortening OR A Combination)
description: One of the oldest, easiest biscuit recipes on the planet!

name: Shrimp and Grits
ingredients:
2 cups Water (see Note)
2 cups Milk (see Note)
1 cup Kosher Salt And Fresh Black Pepper, To Taste
4 slices Coarse Stone-ground Grits
2 pounds Bacon, Naturally Cured, Diced
3 cloves Shrimp, Peeled And Deveined
2 teaspoons Garlic, Minced
½ cups Ground Chipolte Pepper, More Or Less To Taste
2 Tablespoons White Wine
1 cup Butter
description: The heartiest, warmest, savoriest meal around. Welcome to the Low Country. Pass the shrimp and grits.

name: Almond Maple Biscotti
ingredients:
1 cup Whole Almonds, Skins On
1 cup 100% Pure Maple Syrup
½ cups Unsalted Butter, melted
¼ cups Brandy
2 teaspoons Pure Almond Extract
2 teaspoons Pure Vanilla Extract
3  Eggs
2-¾ cups White Whole Wheat Flour
1-½ teaspoon Baking Powder
¼ teaspoons Salt
description: Sweet but not too sweet, and with a great crunch. Perfect for noshing. You won’t miss the processed ingredients in this healthier biscotti. No processed sugar or flour. Even the people you gift them to won’t know unless you tell them!

name: Salmon Over Orzo Risotto
ingredients:
4 teaspoons Olive Oil
¼ cups Onion, Diced
3 cloves Garlic, Minced
1 cup Orzo
2 cups Low Sodium Chicken Broth
1 whole Tomato, Diced
4 ounces, weight Marinated Artichoke Hearts From A Jar, Chopped
¼ cups Grated Parmesan Cheese
2 whole (8 Oz. Size) Fillets Of Salmon
1 teaspoon Garlic Powder
1 teaspoon Onion Powder
1 teaspoon Paprika
1 teaspoon Pepper
1 teaspoon Italian Seasoning
description: Creamy orzo risotto studded with tomato and marinated artichoke hearts and topped with seasoned flaky salmon.

name: English Muffins
ingredients:
2 cups Spelt Flour
3 cups Ground Flaxseed
1 package (1/4 Oz. Size) Active Dry Yeast
1 teaspoon Baking Soda
2 teaspoons Salt
2  Eggs
¼ cups Coconut Oil
1 cup Warm Water (110 Degrees)
3 Tablespoons Honey
1 teaspoon Olive Oil Or More As Needed For Skillet And Greasing Pans
description: Spelt-flax seed flour English muffins.

name: Slow Cooker White Bean Chicken Chili Verde
ingredients:
1 whole Small Onion Chopped
2 whole Fresh Jalapenos, Seeded And Chopped
2 teaspoons Minced Garlic
2 pounds Boneless, Skinless Chicken Breast, Fat Removed
1 teaspoon Cumin
½ teaspoons Oregano
¼ teaspoons Garlic Powder
¼ teaspoons Onion Powder
¼ teaspoons Black Pepper
2 cans (4 Oz. Size) Chopped Green Chilies
1 cup Salsa Verde
2 cans (15 Oz. Size) White Beans, Drained And Rinsed
1 carton (32 Oz. Size) Good Quality Chicken Broth
1 whole Lime, Juiced
1-½ teaspoon Seasoned Salt
description: Using your slow cooker makes this White Bean Chicken Chili Verde a cinch! Just toss in your ingredients and let it simmer all day! Come home to a warm, filling bowl of soup!

name: Veggie Fried Quinoa
ingredients:
2 cups FOR THE STIR-FRY:
4 cups Dry Quinoa
2 teaspoons Water
1  Olive Oil, Divided
1 clove Shallot, Chopped
2  Garlic, Chopped
1  Carrots, Diced
1-½ cup Red Bell Pepper, Stem And Seeds Removed, Diced
¼ cups Green Peas
3  Vegetable Broth
2 teaspoons Eggs
4 teaspoons Salt
4 Tablespoons FOR THE SESAME GINGER SAUCE:
2 Tablespoons Raw Sugar Or Cane Sugar
2 cloves Rice Vinegar
2 teaspoons Amino Acids Or Soy Sauce (low Sodium)
½ teaspoons Garlic, Diced
3 Tablespoons Sesame Oil
description: I’ve recently realized that I’m a one bowl kind of cook, meaning most of my meals all go in one dish. This quinoa is super simple and packed with all kinds of delicious veggies.

name: Caprese Panzanella Salad
ingredients:
½ loaves FOR THE SALAD:
1-½ cup French, Italian Or Other Freshly Baked Crispy Bread (large Loaf)
¾ cups Cherry Tomatoes
¼ cups Mozzarella Pearls
1 teaspoon Basil, Cut Into Ribbons
¼ cups FOR THE DRESSING:
½ cups Dijon Mustard
2 cloves Balsamic Vinegar
½ teaspoons Olive Oil
½ teaspoons Garlic, Crushed
½ teaspoons Black Pepper
description: A few months after an amazing trip to Santorini with my husband, I had to bring back memories with a bread salad, also known as Panzanella Salad.

name: Gluten-Free Italian Baked Chicken Meatballs
ingredients:
1-¼ pound Ground Dark Meat Chicken Or Turkey
1  Extra Large Egg, Beaten
2 Tablespoons Tomato Paste
2 Tablespoons Extra Virgin Olive Oil
¼ cups Finely Chopped Parsley
2 cloves Garlic, Minced
1  Large Shallot, Minced
1 teaspoon Sea Salt
½ teaspoons Smoked Paprika
½ teaspoons Red Chili Flakes
⅓ cups Grated Aged Parmesan Cheese
½ cups Gluten Free Oats
2 cups Tomato Sauce, Preferably Homemade, Heated
description: This healthy gluten-free version of baked chicken meatballs uses oats instead of breadcrumbs. It’s a great easy spin on a classic Italian meatball recipe.

name: Scalloped Potatoes in a Crockpot
ingredients:
6 whole Large Potatoes, Peeled, Thinly Sliced
1 whole Medium Onion, Peeled,thinly Sliced
4 Tablespoons Butter
¼ cups Plus 1 Tablespoon All-purpose Flour
1 teaspoon Salt
⅛ teaspoons Pepper
2 cups Milk (I Used Non-fat)
2 Tablespoons Heavy Whipping Cream
1-⅓ cup Cheddar Cheese, Shredded
description: Thinly sliced potatoes layered with onions, covered in a creamy cheddar cheese sauce and slow-cooked in the crockpot.

name: Edna Mae’s Escalloped Cabbage
ingredients:
1 head Cabbage
1 jar (15 Oz.) Original Cheez Whiz (yes, I Said Cheez Whiz)
1 can (10 Oz) Cream Of Chicken Soup
1 whole (or 2) Fresh Jalapenos, Seeded And Finely Diced (1 Is Pretty Spicy; 2 Is Very Spicy)
¼ cups Milk
description: Food snobs: park your prejudice at the door!  This utterly delicious potluck dish created by Marlboro Man’s grandmother, Edna Mae, is sure to please. And if you absolutely refuse to use a “certain” processed cheese product, I’ll bet you could whip up a homemade cheese sauce and use it instead.

name: Lemon Bars
ingredients:
1 cup FOR THE CRUST:
1-¾ cup Butter
⅔ cups Flour
1-½ cup Confectionary Sugar (plus More For Dusting)
1 teaspoon Sugar
½ cups Flour
4 whole Baking Powder
description: Sweet squares of sugar and citrus.

name: Red Velvet Cake Balls
ingredients:
1 box Red Velvet Cake Mix
¾ cans Cream Cheese Frosting
1 pound Package Candy Coating
description: Bite-sized, candy covered cake.

name: Onion Strings
ingredients:
1 whole Large Onion
2 cups Buttermilk
2 cups All-purpose Flour
1 Tablespoon (scant) Salt
¼ teaspoons (to 1/2 Teaspoon) Cayenne Pepper
1 quart (to 2 Quarts) Canola Oil
description: This is one of my all-time favorite recipes. I know they don’t look it, but these teeny tiny, thinly-sliced fried onions are so pleasantly flavorful and crisp, and such an utterly perfect accompaniment for so many different main courses, they really need to be placed on some list of Culinary Triumphs of All Time.

name: Creamed Spinach
ingredients:
1 whole Onion, Finely Diced
2 cloves Garlic
2 Tablespoons Butter
1 bag (large Bag) Fresh Spinach
1 cup Heavy Cream
description: There are lots of different approaches to making creamed spinach—starting with a roux, splashing in some wine, sprinkling on some nutmeg—but most of the time when I have a hankerin’ for the stuff, I just stick to the basics so I can get it into my mouth more quickly: Cream. Spinach. And just a few other simple things to enhance the flavor of the two.

name: Spicy Shrimp
ingredients:
3 pounds (more Or Less) Unpeeled Shrimp (21-26 Count Or Larger)
½ cups Olive Oil
3 whole Salt And Pepper, to taste
¼ cups Lemons (juice Of)
1 stick (to 1/2 Cup) Worcestershire Sauce
description: This dish is best shared with a table full of friends and family. And it absolutely couldn’t be simpler: you throw a bunch of shrimp in a baking pan and douse it with a heavenly mixture of olive oil, lemon juice, Worcestershire, Tabasco, salt, pepper, and butter. Then you broil it to perfection and serve on a table covered with newspapers, because it’s super messy!

name: Blueberry Crumble Coffee Cake
ingredients:
4 cups FOR THE CAKE:
1-½ cup All Purpose White Flour
4 teaspoons Granulated Sugar
½ teaspoons Baking Powder
2 whole Salt
1 cup Large Egg, Lightly Beaten
1 cup Milk
3 cups Butter, Softened
1 cup Blueberries
½ cups Granulated Sugar
description: This is my husband’s favorite breakfast dish – especially in the summertime when blueberries are fresh picked!

name: Chicken-Wild Rice Soup
ingredients:
½ cups Onion, finely chopped
½ cups Celery, Diced
2 cloves Garlic Clove, Pressed
½ cups Carrots, Peeled And Diced
5 cups Chicken Broth
3 cups Water
2 cups Shredded, Cooked Chicken
1 package 4.5 Ounce Long Grain And Wild Rice With Seasoning Packet (I Used Uncle Ben's)
½ cups Flour
½ cups Butter
1-½ cup Salt And Pepper, to taste
¼ cups Milk/Half-and-Half/Cream (your Preference)
description: Delicious creamy chicken soup!

name: Chicken Skewers with Orzo Salad
ingredients:
8 ounces, fluid 3-4 Chicken Breasts, Cut In Strips
1 Tablespoon Chicken Marinade
1 Tablespoon Plain Yogurt
1 teaspoon Curry Powder
¼ teaspoons Fresh Ginger, Peeled And Minced
1 teaspoon Garlic, Minced
2 Tablespoons Salt
6 ounces, weight Freshly Ground Black Pepper
½ cups Sherry Or Chicken Broth
½ cups Orzo Salad
½ cups Uncooked Orzo
¼ cups Kalamata Olives, Chopped
¼ cups Cucumber, Peeled And Seeded
½ whole Feta Cheese
⅓ cups Onion, Chopped
¼ teaspoons Fresh, Flat-leafed Parsley, Chopped
¼ teaspoons Lemon (just The Juice)
description: This is the perfect summertime meal: Not too much effort; it can be eaten warm or cold; and the flavors are sensational.

name: Asian Noodle Salad
ingredients:
½ heads Linguine Noodles, Cooked, Rinsed, And Cooled
½ heads Sliced Napa Cabbage, Or More To Taste
½ bags Sliced Purple Cabbage, Or More To Taste
1 whole Baby Spinach, Or More To Taste
1 whole Red Bell Pepper, Sliced Thin
1 whole Yellow Bell Pepper, Sliced Thin
1 bag Orange Bell Pepper, Thinly Sliced
3 whole Bean Sprouts (also Called Mung Bean Sprouts)
3 whole Chopped Cilantro, Up To 1 Bunch, To Taste
1 can Scallions, Sliced
1 whole Cucumbers Peeled And Sliced
8 Tablespoons (about 10 Oz.) Whole Cashews, Lightly Toasted In Skillet
8 Tablespoons _____
2 Tablespoons FOR THE DRESSING:
⅓ cups Lime, Juiced
3 Tablespoons Olive Oil
2 cloves Soy Sauce
2 whole (up To 3 Tablespoons) Sesame Oil
description: Adapted from Jamie Oliver, this salad is a triumph. A total winner. An explosion of color, flavor, and texture. And the beauty of this salad is, you can just wing it, adjusting the ingredients of the salad or the dressing as you like.

name: Zucchini Pie
ingredients:
4 cups Zucchini
1-½ teaspoon Cream Of Tartar
2 Tablespoons Dash Of Salt
1 Tablespoon Flour
1-¼ cup Lemon Juice
1-½ teaspoon Sugar (or Less)
1 teaspoon Dash Of Nutmeg
description: Tastes like apple pie!

name: Zucchini Pickles
ingredients:
1-½ pound Zucchini Squash, Sliced
1 whole Small Onion, Thinly Sliced
2 Tablespoons Kosher Salt
1-½ cup White Vinegar
1 cup Granulated Sugar
1 teaspoon Mustard Seed
½ teaspoons Turmeric
description: Pretty soon you will have more zucchini than you know what to do with. I wanted to share a recipe that will help you use all that extra zucchini from your garden. If you got zucchini, then make pickles.

name: Zucchini Patties
ingredients:
4 cups Zucchini, Shredded
2 whole Eggs (large)
½ cups Shredded Parmesan Cheese
½ cups Shredded Mozzarella Cheese
¼ cups Chopped Onion
½ cups All-purpose Flour
2 Tablespoons Vegetable Oil
description: This is the perfect side dish for those summer months when you have more zucchini than you know what to do with.  Made mini and you’ve got a great appetizer too.

name: Zucchini Patties
ingredients:
1-½ cup Flour
¾ teaspoons Salt
1 cup Milk
1 whole Egg, Beaten
1-½ cup Grated Zucchini
1 Tablespoon Grated Parmesan Or Romano Cheese
½ cups Cooking Oil
description: Fried zucchini fritters.

name: Zucchini Pasta Casserole
ingredients:
3-½ cups Macaroni
1 whole Yellow Onion
3 cups Thinly Sliced Zucchini
3-⅝ ounces, weight Olive Oil
1 cup (1/2 Cup) Blue Cheese
1 cup Cream
description: Quick and simple casserole with zucchini and blue cheese.

name: Zucchini “Pasta”
ingredients:
1 whole Zucchini, Peeled With Julienne Peeler
¼ teaspoons Salt
1 clove Garlic, Minced
1 Tablespoon Extra Virgin Olive Oil
description: So simple and delicious you’ll never eat the real stuff again!

name: Zucchini Parmesan Cakes
ingredients:
1 whole Large Zucchini, Grated (about 2 Cups)
½ cups Plain Panko (or Fresh Breadcrumbs)
¼ cups Shredded Parmesan Cheese
3 Tablespoons Chopped Scallions
1 whole Kosher Salt And Pepper To Taste, Be Generous
¼ teaspoons Egg
description: A perfect complement to a grilled dinner and my favorite way to enjoy zucchini!

name: Zucchini Parmesan
ingredients:
2 Tablespoons FOR THE SAUCE:
2 cloves Olive Oil
½ teaspoons Garlic, Minced
4  Red Pepper Flakes
1 teaspoon Medium Tomatoes, Cored And Roughly Chopped
⅓ cups Kosher Salt, Plus More To Taste
½ cups White Wine
¼ cups Chopped Fresh Basil
¾ cups Water
2  Tomato Sauce
¾ cups FOR THE ZUCCHINI:
2  Medium Zucchini
⅓ cups All-purpose Flour
2 cups Large Eggs, Beaten
½ cups Milk
1 clove Panko Breadcrumbs
1 cup Fresh Grated Parmesan Cheese, Plus More For Spinkling
1-½ cup Garlic, Grated
¼ cups Kosher Salt And Freshly Ground Black Pepper
description: A light dinner or perfect side to any protein. A great way to use up zucchini from a home summer garden.

name: Decadent Stuffed Mushrooms
ingredients:
12 whole Large Mushrooms, Wiped Clean
½ cups Chopped Pecans
½ cups Pepperidge Farms Stuffing Mix (not Cubes)
3 Tablespoons Parsley, Chopped
1 whole Small Shallot, Finely Chopped
¼ cups Butter, Softened
1 clove Garlic, Crushed
½ teaspoons Salt
¼ teaspoons Freshly Ground Pepper
½ cups Heavy Cream (that's What Makes These Decadent)
description: Not your typical appetizer stuffed mushroom, these should be served as a side dish with beef tenderloin or prime rib roast.  Knife and fork are required.

name: Apple Pie with Caramel Sauce
ingredients:
3 cups FOR THE CRUST:
¼ cups Oats (use Certified Gluten-free If Necessary)
1 Tablespoon Date Syrup (sub Maple Or Agave If You Like)
½ teaspoons Coconut Oil
2 cups Cinnamon
1 teaspoon FOR THE FILLING:
3 whole Pitted Dates, Soaked In Water For At Least 4 Hours
½ teaspoons Coconut Oil
1 Tablespoon Medium Apples (or More If The Apples Are Small), Cored And Thinly Sliced
description: This tangy and sweet apple pie combines the tartness of apples, the creaminess of date caramel sauce and the crunch and heartiness of the oat crust. The ultimate fall dessert.

name: Braised Short Ribs in Coffee Brine
ingredients:
4 cups FOR THE BRINE:
¼ cups Water
1 cup Brown Sugar
3 teaspoons Kosher Salt
1 leaf Instant Coffee Granuals
3 whole Bay Leaf
5 whole Juniper Berries - Slightly Crushed
1 pound Peppercorns -- Slightly Crushed
1 Tablespoon FOR THE RIBS:
1 whole Beef Short Ribs
1 whole Olive Oil
1 stalk Medium Onion, Coarsely Chopped
½ heads Carrot - Coarsely Chopped
¼ cups Celery, Coarsely Chopped
1 cup Garlic -- Peeled And Left In Whole Cloves
½ cups Brandy
1 Tablespoon Beef Broth
description: The coffee brine adds a layer of flavor to this succulent dish. I like to serve this with garlic mashed potatoes, crusty bread and a tart accompaniment like sweet and sour roasted onions. Brining adds 8 to 24 hours to the “cooking” time.

name: Date-Nut Cream Cheese Bites (Easy!)
ingredients:
9-½ ounces, weight Pitted Dates
8 ounces, weight Cream Cheese
50 pieces Shelled Walnut Halves
description: Easy as 1-2-3. Perfect for an elegant appetizer or dessert, or just an informal snack. Gluten-free.

name: Amaretto-Glazed Pear Shortcake
ingredients:
16 ounces, weight Canned Sliced Bartlett Pears In Syrup, Reserve Syrup
1-¾ cup All-purpose Flour
½ cups Sugar, Plus 2 More Tablespoons
1-¾ teaspoon Baking Powder
¼ teaspoons Salt
6 Tablespoons Salted Butter, Cut In 6 Pieces
¾ cups Milk (2 % Is Fine)
¼ cups Reserved Syrup From Can Of Pears
½ Tablespoons Amaretto Liqueur, Or More As Desired To Taste
1 teaspoon Cinnamon
description: So easy to prepare, yet so delicious and elegant. Enjoy this comforting Amaretto-Glazed Pear Shortcake for dessert or breakfast.

name: Pumpkin Cookies with Homemade Cream Cheese Frosting
ingredients:
4 cups FOR THE COOKIES:
2 cups Flour
2 teaspoons Quick Oats
2 teaspoons Baking Soda
1 teaspoon Cinnamon
1-⅓ cup Salt
3 Tablespoons Butter, Slightly Softened
2 Tablespoons Crisco
1 cup Water
2 cups Sugar
1  Brown Sugar
1 teaspoon Egg
16 ounces, weight Vanilla
1 cup Canned Pumpkin (not Pumpkin Pie Mix)
8 ounces, weight Semisweet Chocolate Chips
2 teaspoons FOR THE FROSTING:
6 Tablespoons Cream Cheese, Slightly Softened
5 cups Vanilla
description: These pumpkin cookies are as delicious as they are addictive! The perfect combination of softness and sweetness, it’s difficult to have just one!

name: Basic Coleslaw
ingredients:
2-½ pounds Green Cabbage, Shredded Or Very Finely Sliced
1 whole Medium Onion, Finely Chopped
1 whole Large Carrot, Grated
1 teaspoon Salt
1 teaspoon Pepper
1-¼ cup Mayonnaise
⅓ cups Cider Vinegar
2 teaspoons Sugar
1 teaspoon Dijon Mustard
1 teaspoon Celery Seed
description: This tangy, crunchy coleslaw is best eaten the day it’s made. Make it ahead by a couple of hours to let the flavors combine in the fridge, but eat it while it’s crunchy.

name: Honey Chocolate Chip Cookies
ingredients:
1 cup Shortening (or Butter)
2 whole Eggs At Room Temperature
1 teaspoon Vanilla Extract
1 teaspoon Salt
1 cup Honey
2-½ cups All-purpose Flour
1 teaspoon Baking Soda
1 bag Chocolate Chips (small Bag)
description: This was my great grandmother’s recipe.  They were the alternative to Toll House cookies when I was growing up.  They have a different taste and softer texture.  The original recipe calls for shortening, but feel free to substitute.

name: Spinach Salad with Warm Bacon Dressing
ingredients:
3 whole Eggs
7 slices Thick Cut, Peppered Bacon
1 whole Red Onion, Small
1 package Mushrooms, White Button
8 ounces, weight Baby Spinach, Washed Dried And Stems Removed
3 Tablespoons Reserved Bacon Grease
3 Tablespoons Red Wine Vinegar
2 teaspoons Sugar
½ teaspoons Dijon Mustard
1 dash Salt
description: This salad is so freaking good. Cold spinach tossed with warm onions, mushrooms, and bacon, tossed with hot bacon dressing, and topped with cold, sliced eggs. It just doesn’t get any better than that.

name: Chocolate Chipotle Cupcakes
ingredients:
1 cup CUPCAKES
¾ cups Unsweetened Cocoa
2-½ cups Boiling Water
1 Tablespoon All-purpose Flour
1 teaspoon Baking Soda
¼ teaspoons Cinnamon
3 teaspoons Salt
2 cups Chipotle Powder
1 cup Sugar
4 whole Butter (Room Temperature)
2 teaspoons Eggs
1 cup Vanilla
2 teaspoons Buttermilk
3 ounces, weight Canned Chipotles In Adobo Sauce, Pureed
3 ounces, weight CHILI CHOCOLATE GANACHE
¾ cups Semi-sweet Chocolate
2 cups Chocolate With Chili Powder (ex: Vosges Brand)
1 gallon Heavy Whipping Cream
description: Chocolate, chipotle, cinnamon … sizzle!

name: Broiled Tilapia Parmesan
ingredients:
2 pounds Tilapia Fillets
½ cups Parmesan Cheese
¼ cups Butter
3 Tablespoons Mayonnaise
2 Tablespoons Lemon Juice
½ teaspoons Dried Basil
¼ teaspoons Black Pepper
⅛ teaspoons Celery Salt
⅛ teaspoons Onion Powder
description: If you are looking for a fish recipe that EVERYONE will eat and enjoy, this is it! Try it! I promise you will like it, and if you don’t tell the kids it is fish they will love it also! My little kids LOVE it. They will eat 2 Tilapia fillets each. When we make it for the 8 of us we have to make 15 pieces.

name: Fruit Pizza
ingredients:
¾ cups Butter
½ cups Confectioners Sugar
1-½ cup All-purpose Flour
1-⅓ cup Vanilla Chips
¼ cups Heavy Whipping Cream
¼ cups Granulated Sugar
8 ounces, weight Cream Cheese
1 Tablespoon Cornstarch
½ cups Pineapple Juice
½ teaspoons Lemon Juice
description: A sugar cookie like crust, with a cream cheese ‘sauce’ makes a yummy base of a twist on your favorite pizza recipe! This is always a crowd favorite! Bring copies of the recipe if you present it at a pot-luck!

name: Peach Pound Cake
ingredients:
2 Tablespoons For Pan
¼ cups Butter
1 cup Sugar
2 cups FOR THE CAKE:
4 whole Butter
1 teaspoon Sugar
3 cups Large Eggs
1 teaspoon Vanilla Extract
½ teaspoons All Purpose White Flour
2 cups Baking Powder
description: A yummy pound cake that deserves fresh peaches!

name: Ridiculously Good Taco Salad
ingredients:
1 pound Ground Hamburger Or Turkey
1 package Taco Seasoning
1 can Black Olives Sliced
1 can Ranch Style Beans Rinsed
2 cups Shredded Cheese
1 cup Shredded Carrots
1 head Lettuce Chopped
1 bag Nacho Cheese Doritos Crushed
1 bunch Small Green Onions Sliced
1 bottle Catalina Salad Dressing
1 whole Tomato, Diced
description: This has been a staple meal in our house for quite a few years now. It is a kid and hubby favorite! I love it because it is easy and yummy!! I also usually have all the ingredients on hand!

name: Banana Bread
ingredients:
2 whole Ripe Bananas
1 stick Unsalted Butter
1 cup Granulated Sugar
1 cup All-purpose Flour
1 whole Egg
¾ teaspoons Baking Soda
½ teaspoons Cinnamon
½ teaspoons Salt
½ teaspoons Ground Nutmeg
description: An easy, quick, and delicious banana bread that your kids can help you make.  Great for getting rid of overripe bananas, too!

name: Zucchini Noodles & Skinny Pesto Sauce
ingredients:
3 cups Basil Leaves, Packed
3 cloves Garlic
2 Tablespoons White Miso Paste
2 Tablespoons Parmesan Cheese, Freshly Grated
2 Tablespoons Sliced Almonds
3 Tablespoons Water
¼ whole Lemon, Juiced
2 whole Zucchini
1 whole Summer Squash
2 teaspoons Olive Oil, Or Sub With Oil-spray
⅓ cups Onions, Diced
description: Zucchini and summer squash noodles with a skinny pesto sauce.

name: Zucchini Muffins (Or Bread)
ingredients:
1-½ cup All-purpose Flour
1-½ cup Whole Wheat Flour
½ teaspoons Salt
2 teaspoons Baking Soda
½ teaspoons Baking Powder
½ teaspoons Cinnamon
½ teaspoons Nutmeg
3 whole Eggs, Gently Whisked
1 cup Vegetable Or Olive Oil
2 teaspoons Vanilla Extract
2 cups Shredded Zucchini
1 can (8oz) Crushed Pineapple
1-½ cup Granulated Sugar
¾ cups Chopped Pecans
description: A healthy and delicious way to use up that zucchini overflowing in your garden! This recipe combines whole wheat flour with nuts, zucchini, and pineapple. Great for hearty breakfast on the go or an afternoon snack. (Also a great sneaky way to get kids to eat their veggies.)

name: Zucchini Muffins for Two
ingredients:
¼ cups FOR THE MUFFINS:
¼ cups Canola Oil
1 whole Sugar
¼ teaspoons Large Egg White
¼ teaspoons Almond Extract
½ teaspoons Ground Allspice
6 Tablespoons Ground Cinnamon
½ teaspoons Flour
½ cups Baking Soda
⅓ cups Grated Zucchini, Squeezed Dry Before Measuring
½ whole _____
description: These zucchini muffins with lemon glaze are great for breakfast, or even for dessert with a lemon cream cheese frosting.

name: Zucchini Muffins
ingredients:
2-½ cups Flour
1 teaspoon Baking Powder
1 teaspoon Baking Soda
1 teaspoon Salt
⅛ teaspoons Nutmeg
2 cups Sugar
1 whole Lemon, Zested
1 whole Orange, Zested And Juiced
3 whole Eggs, Beaten
½ cups Butter, Melted
½ cups Oil
1 teaspoon Vanilla
2 cups Shredded Zucchini
½ cups Sliced Almonds
description: This is another great use for using up your piles of zucchini from the garden. Bright citrus flavours add spunk to these muffins.

name: Zucchini Muffins
ingredients:
2  Zucchini, Shredded
1-½ cup Spelt Flour
2 teaspoons Ground Cinnamon
1 teaspoon Baking Powder
½ teaspoons Salt
¼ teaspoons Nutmeg
⅛ teaspoons Allspice
2  Eggs
⅓  Avocado Ripe
¼ cups Honey
1 teaspoon Vanilla Extract
2 teaspoons Butter Extract
⅓ cups Walnuts, Chopped
description: A deliciously nutty zucchini muffin, perfect for an on-the-go snack.

name: Zucchini Muffins
ingredients:
1 cup Grated Zucchini
½ cups Light Brown Sugar
½ cups White Sugar
½ cups Canola Oil
2 whole Egg Whites
1 whole Egg Yolk
1-½ cup All-purpose Flour
¾ teaspoons Baking Powder
¾ teaspoons Baking Soda
½ teaspoons Salt
1-½ teaspoon Ground Cinnamon
¼ teaspoons Vanilla Bean Paste Or Extract
description: Zucchini is a vegetable, therefore zucchini muffins are healthy! That’s my story and I’m sticking to it.

name: Smore Cookies
ingredients:
⅔ cups Shortening
1 cup Packed Brown Sugar
½ cups Granulated White Sugar
2 whole Eggs
1 teaspoon Vanilla Extract
1 teaspoon Baking Soda
½ teaspoons Salt
2-½ cups All-purpose Flour
1 package Milk Chocolate Chips (11.5 Oz.) OR 1/2 King Size Milk Chocolate Candy Bar Chopped
1 cup Mini Marshmallows
2 packages Graham Crackers Broken Into Squares
description: Mmm…these are divine little cookies filled with chewy baked marshmallows and melted chocolate atop graham cracker squares. I hope you enjoy this recipe as much as we do! They taste extra good the next day too…if they last that long at your house.

name: Paul’s Acorn Squash
ingredients:
3 whole Acorn Squash
6 Tablespoons Butter
1-½ cup Brown Sugar
6 slices Bacon, Thick Cut
1 teaspoon Salt And Pepper, to taste
description: My husbands favorite side dish, how do you go wrong with bacon and brown sugar??

name: Cheesy Ham Chowder
ingredients:
10 strips Bacon
1 cup Carrots, Peeled And Diced
3 cups Diced Onion
1-½ cup Milk
3 Tablespoons Water
1 can All-purpose Flour
1-½ cup Corn, Drained
3 cups Cubed Potatoes
2 teaspoons Shredded Cheddar Cheese
2 cups Chicken Bouillon
description: A thick, creamy soup that’s perfect for a cold day!

name: Cream of BAKED potato soup
ingredients:
6 cups Milk
1 teaspoon Salt
4 Tablespoons White Pepper
6 Tablespoons All Purpose White Flour
1 whole Butter
8 pounds Large Onion, Chopped
description: Easy, quick, hearty and delicious potato soup using baked potatoes instead of boiled.  If you groove on baked potatoes with all the trimmings you will love this!

name: Pimento Cheese Spread
ingredients:
1 cup Hellman's Mayonnaise, Or You Can Make Your Own
1 teaspoon Lemon Juice
1 Tablespoon Worcestershire
1 Tablespoon Dry Mustard
1 teaspoon Cayenne Pepper
1 bag Shredded Sharp Cheddar Cheese
1 bag Shredded Colby Cheese, Or Shredded Mexican Style Cheese
1 jar Chopped Pimientos, Drained
description: Really good on hot summer days.  Eat on squishy white bread, celery or from your finger dipped in the bowl

name: Easy, easy fruit salad!
ingredients:
2 cans Mandarin Oranges, drained
2 cans Pineapple Chunks, drained
2 cans Cherry Pie Filling
2 cans Large Fruit Salad DRAINED
2 whole Bananas, Sliced
1 bunch Red Or Green Grapes
description: Almost all canned, don’t knock it until you try it! Family favorite!

name: Marshmallow Fudge
ingredients:
¼ cups Butter Or Margarine
12 ounces, weight Chocolate Chips (small Bag)
1 cup Peanut Butter, Creamy Or Chunky
4 cups Mini Marshmallows
description: Super easy and delicious 4 ingredient fudge

name: Baked Beans with a Kick
ingredients:
6 strips Bacon, Chopped
1 cup Chopped Onion
2 cans Pork N Beans
2 cans Red Kidney Beans
1 can Butter Beans
¼ cups Barbecue Sauce
¼ cups Ketchup
¼ cups Sugar
¼ cups Brown Sugar
2 Tablespoons Molassas
2 Tablespoons Mustard
1 teaspoon Salt
1 cup Picante Sauce
description: The BEST baked beans, ever!  Hearty, not too sweet, lots of texture, just the right spice.

name: Sausage Cream Cheese Roll-ups
ingredients:
1 pound Breakfast Sausage (I Like HOT!)
1 block Cream Cheese (8 Oz. Softened)
2 cans Refrigerator Crescent Rolls
description: I love my breakfast sausage, and these are an easy fix for a hearty breakfast!

name: Pasta Carbonara
ingredients:
3 Tablespoons Exra Virgin Olive Oil
1 pound Rigatoni
⅓ pounds Pancetta, Thinly Sliced
4 cloves Finely Chopped Garlic
½ teaspoons Crushed Red Pepper
1 cup White Wine
description: Creamy, bacon-y, spicy, yummy.  One of my favorite pasta dishes to curl up with on the couch and watch a movie…or for a romantic date night.  Such an easy, and versatile dish!

name: Mini Caprese Appetizers
ingredients:
20 whole Cherry Tomatoes
10 whole Bocconcini (mini Mozzarella Balls) Cut In Half, Or Make Pieces From A Large Mozzarella Ball
10 whole Basil Leaves
2 Tablespoons Chopped Parsley
2 Tablespoons Chopped Chives
2 Tablespoons Olive Oil
description: All the ingredients of a classic caprese salad in a bite-size appetizer!

name: Chicken Artichoke Casserole
ingredients:
2 Tablespoons Butter
3 cups Sliced Mushrooms
1 cup Thinly Sliced Carrots
1 cup Chopped Green Onion
2 cans (10 Oz) Cream Of Chicken Soup
½ cups Heavy Cream
½ cups Chicken Broth
1 teaspoon Salt
3 cups Cooked, Then Cubed Chicken
3 jars Marinated Artichoke Hearts, Chopped
3 cups Shredded Mozzarella Cheese
4 cups Cooked White Or Brown Rice
½ cups Grated Parmesan Cheese
description: A delish dish that has titillated many mouths in my home.  Marinated artichoke hearts, carrots, mushrooms, greens onions in a soup mix over white or brown rice…

name: Cinnamon Streusel Banana Bread
ingredients:
1-½ cup FOR BREAD
1 cup Flour
1 teaspoon Sugar
1 teaspoon Ground Cinnamon
½ teaspoons Baking Soda
3 whole Salt
2 whole Ripe Bananas
¼ cups Eggs
½ cups Honey
¼ cups Natural Applesauce
2-½ Tablespoons Water
2 Tablespoons FOR THE TOPPING:
1 teaspoon Packed Brown Sugar
description: Cinnamon and brown sugar crumbles really set off this delicious and moist banana bread.  I use applesauce to cut fat and calories, but you can replace that with oil if you prefer.

name: Cajun Chicken Pasta
ingredients:
1 box Pasta, Such As Penne Or Linguini
1-½ pound Chicken Breast, Boneless, Skinless Or Tenders
1 Tablespoon Garlic Powder
1 Tablespoon Weber Grill N'Orleans Cajun Seasoning
1 Tablespoon Salt And Pepper, to taste
1 jar Exra Virgin Olive Oil
description: My recreation of the dish at Red Lobster!

name: Super Awesome Pretzels
ingredients:
1 Tablespoon Active Dry Yeast
½ cups Warm Water
½ cups Milk
2 Tablespoons Packed Brown Sugar
2 Tablespoons Unsalted Butter, Softened
1 whole Egg
½ teaspoons Salt
3-¼ cups All Purpose White Flour
¼ cups _____
1 whole FOR THE POACHING LIQUID:
1 Tablespoon Water
1 Tablespoon Baking Soda
description: These pretzels are delicious! They remind me of the pretzels sold at the ballpark. I used my regular bread recipe as a base and added the poaching step to give them that lovely, unique pretzel-y flavor. I like to make them with half wheat and half white flour. NOTE: for a sweet topping, bake the pretzels plain; when they’re done, brush with butter and sprinkle them with a cinnamon and sugar mixture (3 parts sugar to 1 part cinnamon)

name: Fluffy Snickerdoodles
ingredients:
2-¾ cups All-purpose Flour
2 teaspoons Cream Of Tartar
1 teaspoon Baking Soda
¼ teaspoons Salt
2 sticks Unsalted Butter, Softened
1-½ cup Sugar
2 whole Eggs
2-½ teaspoons Vanilla Extract
3 Tablespoons Sugar
2 Tablespoons Ground Cinnamon
description: Growing up, Snickerdoodles were always hard and thin… but I like my cookies light and fluffy.  I made these snickerdoodles light and fluffy, how I like them!

name: Zucchini Bread, Mini Loaves and Muffins
ingredients:
6 whole Eggs
1 cup Vegetable Oil
1 cup Applesauce
2 cups White Sugar
2 cups Brown Sugar
6 cups Grated Zucchini
4 teaspoons Pure Vanilla Extract
3 cups All-purpose Flour
3 cups Whole Wheat Flour
6 teaspoons Cinnamon, Ground
2 teaspoons Baking Soda
½ teaspoons Baking Powder
2 teaspoons Salt
2 cups Walnuts, Chopped (optional)
description: Moist and good for you zucchini bread. Keeps the kids coming back for more! Use up all that zucchini in your garden with these healthy as possible muffins or bread!

name: Salmon with Mandarin Hoisin Glaze
ingredients:
1-½ Tablespoon GLAZE
2 Tablespoons Mandarin Orange Juice
2 teaspoons Hoisin Sauce (found In Asian Section Of The Store)
2 pieces Honey
1 can FISH
description: If you are like me you wish you could eat more fish… but you just don’t have any good recipes. Until now, my friends. This is my take on a recipe from Martha Stewart’s Everyday Food. We eat it once every two weeks or so and I haven’t tired of it yet.

name: Summer Spaghetti
ingredients:
3 whole Tomatoes, Chopped
¼ cups Green Onions, Chopped
3 Tablespoons Fresh, Flat-leafed Parsley, Chopped
2 cloves Garlic, Minced
2 teaspoons Kosher Salt
2 teaspoons Fresh Rosemary, Minced
2 teaspoons Fresh Oregano, Minced
½ teaspoons Black Pepper
½ cups Olive Oil
1 pound Spaghetti
description: A fresh summer meal that features bright, fresh flavors and plenty of color.

name: Zucchini Muffins
ingredients:
1-½ cup Walnuts, Chopped
1 whole Lemon, Zest Only
1 whole Small Orange, Zest Only
½ cups Crystallized Ginger
1 stick Unsalted Butter
¾ cups Sugar
¾ cups Brown Sugar (lightly Packed)
3 whole Large Eggs
2 teaspoons Pure Vanilla Extract
3 cups Zucchini, Grated (about 3 Medium)
3 cups Unbleached All-purpose Flour
¼ cups Ground Flax Seed
1-½ teaspoon Baking Soda
½ teaspoons Baking Powder
1 teaspoon Kosher Salt
1 teaspoon Ground Cinnamon
1 Tablespoon Ground Allspice
½ Tablespoons Curry Powder
description: These zuchini muffins feature citrus zest and crystallized ginger. They could easily be baked a little sweeter and frosted with some cream cheese frosting to make quasi-healthy cupcakes.

name: Pasta alla Norma
ingredients:
1  Large Eggplant, Diced
2 Tablespoons Extra Virgin Olive Oil
½  Red Onion, Diced
2 cloves Garlic, Minced
28 ounces, weight Canned Italian Plum Tomatoes
⅓ cups Fresh Basil Leaves, Plus More For Topping
2 cups Sea Salt And Fresh Cracked Pepper
1 cup Dry Penne Pasta
2 Tablespoons Ricotta Salata Cheese, Grated
2 teaspoons Fresh Italian Parsley, Chopped
description: A traditional Sicilian pasta dish with penne pasta, eggplant,  ricotta salata, fresh herbs and tomato sauce.

name: Chicken and White Bean Chili
ingredients:
3  Boneless, Skinless Chicken Breasts (see Note)
2 Tablespoons Olive Oil Plus More For Brushing On The Chicken
2  Salt And Pepper
1  Yellow Onions, Diced
3 cloves Red Bell Pepper, Stem And Seeds Removed, Diced
¾ teaspoons Garlic, Crushed
1 teaspoon Cumin
½ teaspoons Chili Powder
28 ounces, weight Smoked Paprika
14 ounces, weight Canned Diced Tomatoes
⅓ cups Canned Cannellini Beans, Drained And Rinsed
description: This chicken and white bean chili is true comfort food. It’s got my name written all over it! Gluten-free and dairy-free. Simply mouthwatering.

name: Moroccan Chicken with Green Olives
ingredients:
1 bunch Fresh, Flat-leafed Parsley, Chopped
1 bunch Cilantro, Chopped
2 cloves Garlic, Minced
1 teaspoon Turmeric
1 teaspoon Ground Cumin
1 Tablespoon Vegetable Oil
1 cup Salt And Pepper, to taste
4 cubes Water
2 jars Chicken Bouillon
1 loaf Green Olives
4 whole French Bread
3 whole Boneless, Skinless Chicken Breasts
1 whole Medium Chopped Onion
description: If there is one reason (aside from our son) that I am most thankful for meeting J. it’s for this chicken. He and his roommate from college (and childhood friend, to boot) came up with this yummy recipe when they were missing their mommy’s homemade Moroccan food (because J. is, of course, Moroccan).

name: Zucchini Bread
ingredients:
3 whole Eggs, Slightly Beaten
2 cups Sugar
1 cup Canola Oil
2 teaspoons Pure Vanilla Extract
3 cups All-purpose Flour
2 teaspoons Baking Soda
½ teaspoons Baking Powder
1 teaspoon Salt
1-½ teaspoon Ground Cinnamon
1 teaspoon Freshly Grated Nutmeg
2 cups Shredded Zucchini
1 can (8 Oz) Crushed Pineapple, Drained
1 cup Raisins
1 cup Chopped Pecans
description: This recipe has a different twist than most with the addition of pineapple and raisins.  It’s a great recipe to use when you are overun with zucchini and it freezes great.

name: Nutty Peanut Buttery Caramel Apples
ingredients:
½ cups Sugar
½ cups Heavy Cream, At Room Temperature
1 Tablespoon Unsalted Butter
¼ cups Smooth Peanut Butter
1 pinch Sea Salt
1 cup Roasted Peanuts, Finely Chopped
4 whole Large Tart Apples, Washed And Dried
4  Skewers To Insert Into The Apples
¼ cups Chocolate Chips
¼ cups Heavy Cream
description: Why have plain caramel apples when you can have peanut butter caramel apples!

name: Drumsticks with Sriracha and Honey Lime Sauce
ingredients:
2 pounds Chicken Drumsticks
1-½ Tablespoon Soy Sauce
1 Tablespoon Honey
1 teaspoon Sriracha
½ teaspoons Minced Garlic
1 whole Lime, Zested
½ whole Lime, Juiced
description: Grilled drumsticks tossed in a sweet and spicy Sriracha and honey lime sauce! A great addition to your game day line up!

name: Zucchini Lasagna
ingredients:
2 pounds Zucchini (large Are Best)
1 teaspoon Salt
1 whole Small Onion, Diced
1 whole Small Green Pepper, Diced
3 cloves Garlic, Minced
½ pounds Ground Beef (sirloin Preferred)
2 Tablespoons Tomato Sauce
3 cups Prepared Marinara Sauce
2 Tablespoons Fresh Basil, Finely Chopped
1 whole Egg
2 cups Cottage Cheese
¾ cups Grated Parmesan Cheese (not Kraft)
1 cup Shredded Mozzarella Cheese
2 Tablespoons Minced Fresh Parsley
10 whole No-cook Lasagna Noodles
description: The zucchini lightens up what can be a really heavy-tasting dish.  It’s transformed into something, while not light, per se, that is much easier to stomach on a warm, late summer evening.  Of course, this is the time of year when those when garden fresh zucchinis fill the crisper drawers and leave me thinking, what on Earth to do with all this zucchini?

name: Zucchini Muffins
ingredients:
1-⅓ cup Sugar
2 whole Eggs, Beaten
2 teaspoons Vanilla Extract
3 cups Freshly Grated Zucchini
⅔ cups Melted Unsalted Butter
2 teaspoons Baking Soda
1 pinch Salt
2 cups All-purpose Flour
1 cup Whole Wheat Flour
2 teaspoons Cinnamon
½ teaspoons Nutmeg
⅔ cups Unsweetened Shredded Coconut
1 cup Raisins And/or Walnuts (optional)
description: A great way to use up some of the zucchini your garden is producing!

name: Zucchini Muffins
ingredients:
1-⅓ cup Sugar
½ cups Oil
2 teaspoons Vanilla
2 whole Eggs
2 cups Flour
2 teaspoons Cinnamon
1-½ teaspoon Baking Powder
1 teaspoon Salt
2 cups Shredded Zucchini
1 cup Chopped Walnuts
description: These slightly spicy, nutty muffins are one of our favorites. If using frozen shredded zucchini, squeeze well to remove excess water before adding to the batter.

name: Zucchini Mock Crab Cakes
ingredients:
2 cups Zucchini, Peeled And Shredded
1 cup Seasoned Italian Bread Crumbs
1 whole Egg
1 Tablespoon Mayonnaise
1 teaspoon Old Bay Seasoning
description: These yummy patties taste a lot like the real thing, great for people who love seafood but are allergic. And a tasty way to use up the zucchini crop!

name: Apple Crisp
ingredients:
5 cups FOR THE FRUIT:
1 Tablespoon Peeled And Sliced Apples
1 teaspoon Flour
¼ teaspoons Cinnamon
½ cups Nutmeg
½ cups FOR THE TOPPING:
1 teaspoon Rolled Oats
⅓ cups Whole Wheat Flour
1 pinch Cinnamon
6 Tablespoons Brown Sugar
description: The perfect apple crisp. It’s not too sweet and has a crunchy topping.  Apple crisp for breakfast anyone?

name: Pumpkin Spice Cornbread
ingredients:
1 Tablespoon Vegetable Shortening
1 box (8 1/2 Oz. Size) Jiffy Cornbread Mix
1  Egg
¼ cups Milk
½ cups Canned Pumpkin (not Pumpkin Pie Mix)
1 Tablespoon Pumpkin Pie Spice
2 Tablespoons Sugar
description: The perfect autumn comfort food.

name: Green Tomato Bake
ingredients:
6 whole Green Tomatoes (washed, Sliced)
1-½ cup Low Sodium Vegetable Stock
½ teaspoons Salt
½ teaspoons Black Pepper
1 whole White Onion, Sliced Thinly
1 cup Seasoned Bread Crumbs
½ cups Grated Parmesan Cheese
1 cup Shredded Mozzarella Cheese
description: I am using up the last of my garden tomatoes. Last year I made this skillet bake and it was a huge hit, so I decided to share it with you!

name: Quick Cashew Chicken
ingredients:
2 pounds FOR THE CHICKEN:
1 Tablespoon Boneless, Skinless Chicken Breasts
1 piece Olive Oil
4 cloves (1/2 Inch Size) Ginger, Minced
½ cups Garlic, Minced
2 whole Snow Peas
½ whole Bell Peppers, Stem And Seeds Removed, Diced
¾ cups Onion, Diced
½ cups Roasted Cashews
1 Tablespoon FOR THE MARINADE:
2 Tablespoons Low Sodium Soy Sauce
1 Tablespoon Mirin (Chinese Rice Wine)
2 Tablespoons Rice Wine Vinegar
1 Tablespoon Cornstarch
1-½ Tablespoon FOR THE SAUCE:
1 Tablespoon Soy Sauce
½ teaspoons Rice Wine Vinegar
1 teaspoon Oyster Sauce
description: Moist chicken with crisp veggies and crunchy cashews in a savory sauce.

name: Easy No-Bake Peanut Butter-Chocolate Chip Granola Bars
ingredients:
2 cups Crispy Rice Cereal
1-½ cup Quick Cooking Oats
½ cups Light Brown Sugar
½ cups Honey
½ cups Peanut Butter, Smooth Or Crunchy
1 teaspoon Vanilla Extract
¼ cups Miniature Chocolate Chips
description: Chewy, delicious peanut buttery granola bars with chocolate chips in every bite. The perfect portable snack for busy people and hungry kids!

name: Baked Potato Pancakes
ingredients:
4 whole Medium Idaho White Potatoes, Shredded And Drained Very Well
¼ cups Onion  Shredded
2 cloves Garlic, Minced
1 teaspoon Parsley, Chopped
2 whole Eggs
¼ cups All-purpose Flour
2 Tablespoons Panko Breadcrumbs
¼ teaspoons Salt
¼ teaspoons Pepper
¼ cups Shredded Parmesan Cheese
1 Tablespoon Olive Oil
description: Crispy baked potato pancakes stuffed with shredded potatoes, Parmesan cheese, onion and garlic.

name: Beef & Green Bean Persian Rice
ingredients:
2 pounds Lean Ground Beef
2 whole Large Onions (Half Pureed Using A Food Processor Or Box Grater And Half Chopped)
1 Tablespoon Salt, Or To Taste
½ Tablespoons Black Pepper, Or To Taste
1-½ Tablespoon Turmeric Powder
8 Tablespoons Tomato Paste, Heaping
2 pounds Fresh Or Frozen Green Beans (If Using Fresh Remove The Stems And Strings And Cut Into Thirds)
2 Tablespoons Extra Virgin Olive Oil, Plus Enough To Cover The Bottom Of A Large Pot For The Tahdig (crispy Rice), Plus Enough To Cover The Bottom Of A Pan For Onions
1 Tablespoon Cinnamon, Heaping
3 cups Uncooked Basmati Rice
½ teaspoons Ground Saffron Mixed Into Below Amount Of Hot Water
⅓ cups Hot Water
2 Tablespoons Butter (or Extra Virgin Olive Oil)
description: The perfect autumn meal! Flavors of saffron and turmeric combine with tomatoes, green beans, caramelized onions, beef and basmati rice!

name: Healthy Sloppy Joes
ingredients:
½ pounds Lean Ground Beef Or Turkey
2 cloves Garlic, Minced
1 whole Carrot, Peeled And Shredded Plus More For Serving If Desired
3 cups Fresh Spinach Plus More For Serving If Desired
1 cup Canned Navy Beans (or Garbanzos)
1 cup Diced Tomatoes (canned Or Fresh)
¼ cups Green Onions, Chopped
2 teaspoons Grainy Mustard
2 teaspoons Apple Cider Vinegar
1 teaspoon Ketchup
1 teaspoon Maple Syrup
4 whole Whole Wheat Or Seeded Hamburger Buns
description: This American classic gets a healthy tweak.  All the savory goodness you love with a nutritional boost from healthy beans and vegetables.

name: Zucchini Meat Lasagna
ingredients:
1 pound Ground Beef, Lean
¼ cups Onions, Diced Small
½ Tablespoons Garlic, Minced
8 ounces, weight Portobello Mushrooms (Small), Sliced
1 cup Chicken Broth, Low-Sodium
24 ounces, weight Jar Pasta Sauce (I Used Roasted Red Pepper)
5 cups Sliced Zucchini, Sliced About 1/4" Thick
2 cups Spinach, Fresh
1-¾ cup Ricotta Cheese, Fat Free
¾ cups Mozzarella Cheese, Shredded, Low-fat
description: A thick, hearty noodle-less lasagna made with zucchini, ground beef and lots of cheese. A perfect low-calorie, low-carb pasta dish.

name: Zucchini Linguine with Spinach and Parmesan Pesto
ingredients:
2 whole Zucchini Squash
1 Tablespoon Olive Oil
¼ cups Olive Oil
1-½ cup Raw Baby Spinach
1 clove Garlic
2 Tablespoons Grated Parmigiano Reggiano
1 pinch Salt
1 pinch Pepper
description: A healthy and low carb alternative to traditional pasta that is just as flavourful.

name: Zucchini Latkes with Yogurt-Curry Sauce
ingredients:
½ cups Plain Greek Yogurt
2 Tablespoons Mango Chutney, Chopped If Necessary
½ teaspoons Fresh Lime Juice
¼ cups Mayonnaise
2 teaspoons Curry Powder
1 pound Zucchini, Grated
1 teaspoon Kosher Salt
1 whole Egg
2 whole Scallion, Finely Chopped
½ cups All-purpose Flour
¼ teaspoons Freshly Ground Black Pepper
½ cups Olive Oil
description: Do you have a bumper crop of zucchini?  These crispy latkes are the perfect way to use it up, and the tasty sauce adds a zing to the dish.

name: Zucchini Lasagna
ingredients:
2 whole Medium Zucchini (8 Oz. Each)
9 pieces Lasagna Noodles
8 ounces, weight Cream Cheese, Room Temperature
1 container (15 Oz. Size) Part-Skim Ricotta Cheese
2 cloves Garlic, Minced, Divided
4 teaspoons Italian Seasoning, Divided
½ cups Salt And Ground Pepper
description: I adapted this from a Martha Stewart recipe that was a little bland for my taste! My friends and family love this recipe , so I figure it is time for me to share it with y’all!

name: Zucchini Lasagna
ingredients:
2 cloves Garlic, Minced
1 whole Onion, Chopped
1 jar (24 Oz.) Your Favorite Pasta Sauce
1 pound Ground Turkey
1 whole Egg
2 cups Cottage Cheese, Low Fat
1 teaspoon Whole Wheat Flour
½ cups Skim Mozzarella Cheese, Shredded
2-½ cups Zucchini, Sliced
description: This a healthy (and tasty) version of a typical lasagna. I actually like it better!

name: Zucchini Jam
ingredients:
6 cups Zucchini, Grated
¼ cups Water
1 dash Salt
1 package Dry Pectin
3-½ cups Sugar
13 ounces, fluid Crushed Pineapple
6 ounces, fluid Package Apricot Jell-o Powder
description: This is an unusual but delicious way to use up some of that excess zucchini. Don’t tell the kids there is zucchini in this. They will never know it.

name: Zucchini Imperial
ingredients:
4 cups Zucchini, Sliced
1 cup Parmesan Cheese
2 whole Eggs
1 cup Mayonnaise
½ teaspoons Salt
¼ teaspoons Pepper
½ cups Onion, Chopped
1 Tablespoon Butter Or Margarine, Melted
¼ cups Breadcrumbs
description: This is a recipe my mother made often when I was teenager and had no love of zucchini. Then one day when I was pregnant with my daughter, I had a craving for this casserole. I have loved it and zucchini ever since.

name: Zucchini Hummus Soup
ingredients:
1 Tablespoon Olive Oil
4 cloves Garlic, Minced
1 whole Small Onion, Minced
3 whole Small Zucchini, Minced
4 cans Vegetable Broth, (14.5 Oz Cans)
½ teaspoons Oregano
16 ounces, weight Hummus (store Bought Or Homemade)
8 ounces, weight Salt To Taste
description: A really tasty soup that’s packed full of goodies!

name: Zucchini Hash with Poached Egg
ingredients:
6 strips Bacon
1 whole Large Zucchini
1 whole Small Onion, Diced
1 clove Garlic, Minced
½ cups Frozen Corn
1 teaspoon Salt
1 teaspoon Pepper
1 teaspoon Paprika
1 teaspoon Creole Seasoning
½ teaspoons Honey
1 Tablespoon Butter
2 whole Eggs
1 Tablespoon Vinegar
description: Zucchini, onions, garlic, corn. Oh, and bacon! What’s not to love?

name: Zucchini Gratin with Mushrooms
ingredients:
3 Tablespoons Unsalted Butter, Plus Extra For Topping
3 whole Medium Onions, Peeled, Cut In Half Then Thinly Sliced
2 pounds Zucchini, Sliced 1/4 Inch Thick
½ pounds Salt And Pepper, to taste
¼ teaspoons Shiitake Mushrooms, Sliced
2 Tablespoons Ground Nutmeg
1 cup All-purpose Flour
4 ounces, weight Hot Milk
¾ cups Swiss Cheese Slices (or Grated)
description: We purchased some fresh zucchini from the farmers’ market last weekend. I was inspired by Ina Garten’s Zucchini Gratin. This is a great Meatless Monday recipe or as a side dish.

name: Zucchini Gratin
ingredients:
1 Tablespoon Olive Oil
3 cloves Garlic, Minced
1 whole Medium Onion, Chopped
2 whole Roma Tomatoes, Chopped
3 whole Medium Zucchini, Sliced And Halved
1 teaspoon Ground Thyme
1 teaspoon Salt
2 Tablespoons Flour
2 whole Eggs
½ cups Half-and-half
¼ cups Shredded Cheddar
¼ cups Grated Parmesan
description: Good veggie side made with fresh produce from the store, but even better when you use produce from your garden or the farmers’ market.

name: Loaded Baked Potato Pizza
ingredients:
4 slices Bacon
4 whole Medium-large Red Potatoes
1 package (1 Oz. Size) Ranch Seasoning Mix
¾ cups Ricotta Cheese
½ cups Sour Cream
2 whole Udi's Gluten Free Pizza Crusts Or Other Medium-Sized Crusts Of Choice
1 whole Small White Onion, Thinly Sliced
1-¼ cup Shredded Cheese ( I Used A Mixture Of Cheddar And Mozzarella)
3 Tablespoons Chopped Green Onions
description: What can be better than potatoes, bacon, ranch dressing and cheese? All the things you love about a loaded baked potato in pizza form!

name: Garlic Fry Bread
ingredients:
3 cups Vegetable Oil
4-½ cups White Flour Plus More As Needed
2 teaspoons Baking Powder
1 Tablespoon Garlic Salt
1 Tablespoon Parsley Flakes
1 Tablespoon Red Pepper Flakes
1-½ cup Water
½ cups Milk
description: My garlic fry bread is crisp on the outside and tender on the inside. The perfect addition to any meal.

name: Slow Cooker Apple Dip
ingredients: 2 cans (12 Oz. Size) Sweetened Condensed Milk
description: This smooth, creamy and rich caramel dip takes only one ingredient and a slow cooker to make! Perfect for fall, plus it costs a fraction of store bought apple dip.

name: Double Chocolate Halloween Bark
ingredients:
10 ounces, weight White Chocolate
3-½ ounces, weight Milk Chocolate
½ cups Selection Of Gummy Sweets
2 Tablespoons Sprinkles, Autumn Coloured
5 whole Oreo Cookies, Crushed
½ cups Marshmallows, I Used Halloween Shaped Ones
½ cups Milk Chocolate Covered Honeycomb Pieces Or Other Chocolate Of Choice
description: This Halloween bark uses white and milk chocolate and is loaded with Halloween-shaped gummy sweets, marshmallows and Autumn coloured sprinkles! No-bake and fun to make, the kids (and adults) will love this recipe!

name: Creamy Cauliflower Soup
ingredients:
1 Tablespoon Olive Oil
1 whole Onion, Peeled And Chopped
1 whole Cauliflower, Cored And Chopped Into Small Florets
500 milliliters Vegetable Or Chicken Stock (use Bouillon For Gluten Free)
¼ teaspoons Garlic Salt
50 milliliters Double Cream
100 grams Grated Mature Cheddar Cheese Plus Extra For Garnish
1 pinch Salt And Pepper
description: Only 7 ingredients (excluding salt and pepper) and 25 minutes to the best cauliflower soup you’ll ever eat.

name: Turkey Meatballs
ingredients:
1 pound Extra-Lean Ground Turkey
⅓  Yellow Onion, Chopped
½ cups Panko Flakes
3 cloves Garlic, Chopped
2  Eggs
1-½ teaspoon Dried Oregano
1 teaspoon Dried Basil
1 teaspoon Salt
½ teaspoons Ground Black Pepper
1 teaspoon Sriracha
description: Many people think turkey meatballs are dry and flavorless. This recipe will prove them wrong! The eggs keep them juicy and the diverse spices linger on your palate. Sauteing them lightly in olive oil locks in all the delicious flavors with a crispy crunch.

name: Apple-Stuffed Chicken
ingredients:
1  Granny Smith Apple
¼ cups Crumbled Feta
½ cups Bread Crumbs
4  Boneless, Skinless Chicken Breasts
2  Eggs
2 teaspoons Thyme
description: Stuff chicken breasts with apple and feta before rolling them in breadcrumbs and baking until golden.

name: Flour Tortillas
ingredients:
2 cups All Purpose White Flour
1 teaspoon Baking Powder
½ teaspoons Salt
¼ cups Shortening
⅔ cups Warm Water
description: Plain Jane (or is that Maria) tortillas. The recipe is from my mom and the first time I made them my son made me promise to never buy them again.

name: Chocolate chip cookies by Tiffany
ingredients:
1 cup White Sugar
1 cup Brown Sugar
1 cup Vegetable Oil
1 cup Shortening
2 whole Eggs
2 teaspoons Pure Vanilla Extract
4 cups All-purpose Flour
4 teaspoons Cream Of Tartar
2 teaspoons Baking Soda
1 teaspoon Salt
2 cups Semi-Sweet Chocolate Chips
description: I think the combo of shortening and oil is a little different, since I usually only use real butter for cookies. These turn out really nice. They don’t spread out, they stay chunky and have a shortbread consistency.

name: Perfectly Juicy 4 Ingredient Roasted Chicken
ingredients:
1 whole 3-4 Lb. Chicken
1 bunch Celery
½ sticks Butter
5 dashes Onion Powder
description: This recipe makes the world’s juiciest roasted chicken and it’s so much cheaper than paying like $6-$7 for the rotisserie chickens at your local grocer.

name: Broccoli Chowder
ingredients:
2 whole Yukon Gold Potatoes, Peeled And Diced
1 whole Medium Onion, Chopped
2 cups Broccoli Florets
2 cups Chicken Broth
¼ teaspoons Thyme
½ cups Low Fat Sour Cream
½ cups Skim Milk
¼ cups Grated Parmesan Cheese
description: This is one of our favorite winter chowders and so easy to make!

name: Strawberry Sorbet
ingredients:
1 quart Strawberries
1 cup Water
1 cup Sugar
2 Tablespoons Lime Juice
2 teaspoons Lime Zest
¼ teaspoons Salt
¼ cups Corn Syrup
description: Simple and delicious strawberry sorbet.

name: Cabbage Crunch Salad
ingredients:
½ cups Sliced Almonds, Toasted
1 bag Coleslaw Mix Or Chopped Cabbage
1 package Ramen Noodles, Crushed
1 cup For Dressing
½ cups Sugar
1 cup Vinegar
1 teaspoon Canola Oil
1 teaspoon Dried Mustard
½ teaspoons Celery Seed
description: This is a beloved crunchy, cabbagey (?) salad – the star of many a NW Iowa church potluck.

name: Tuna Macaroni Salad (Gluten-Free)
ingredients:
16 ounces, fluid Tinkyada Rice Pasta
8 ounces, fluid Medium Cheddar Cheese, Cubed
⅓ cups Fresh, Flat-leafed Parsley, Chopped
1 whole Medium Red Onion, Diced
4 stalks Celery, Diced
2 cans Tuna, 12 Oz
⅔ cups Mayonnaise
1 teaspoon Sriracha Hot Chili Sauce
1 Tablespoon Fresh Lemon Juice
description: Combine your favorite gluten-free (or gluten-filled!) pasta with canned tuna, cheese, veggies and mayo for a trip back to the age of 1970′s magazine-inspired summer pasta salad.

name: Veggie/Pork Marinade
ingredients:
⅓ cups Extra Virgin Olive Oil
4 Tablespoons Red Wine Vinegar
4 Tablespoons Lemon Juice
1 whole Serrano Chile-seeded, And Mortared
1 teaspoon Salt
4 cloves Garlic-mortared
description: This marinade is fantastic for grilled veggies, and also great on pork or chicken.

name: Quick Pulled Pork Sandwiches
ingredients:
1-½ Tablespoon FOR RUB
2 teaspoons Paprika
½ teaspoons Brown Sugar
½ teaspoons Celery Salt
½ teaspoons Garlic Powder
½ teaspoons Dry Mustard
½ teaspoons Cracked Pepper
¼ teaspoons Onion Powder
1 whole Salt
1 jar FOR PORK
2 Tablespoons Pork Tenderloin (weight Varies)
1 package Olive Oil
description: Spicy, rich, decadent, succulent shredded pork atop steamed sesame buns with crunchy bursts of onion and sweet pickles… A quick version of delicious pulled pork sandwiches!   Is it slow cooked? No. Is it with pork shoulder? No. Is it good? YES.

name: “No-Bake” Mississippi Mud Cookies
ingredients:
2 cups Granulated Sugar
4 Tablespoons Cocoa Powder
1 stick Butter Or Margarine
½ cups Milk
½ cups Peanut Butter, Creamy Or Chunky
2 cups Quick Oats "Crystal Wedding Oats"
1 teaspoon Vanilla Extract
description: This is a recipe my mother used to whip up on busy afternoons. We still love it after all these years.

name: Raspberry Peach Cobbler
ingredients:
½ cups Sugar
1 Tablespoon Cornstarch
½ teaspoons Ground Cinnamon
1 teaspoon Pure Vanilla Extract
3 cups Peaches Sliced
1 cup Fresh Or Frozen Raspberries
3 Tablespoons Shortening
1 cup All-purpose Flour
1 Tablespoon Sugar
1-½ teaspoon Baking Powder
½ teaspoons Salt
½ cups Milk
description: This Old Fashioned Cobbler is berry delicious!  Serve warm with ice cream or whipped cream.

name: Lemon Drop Candy Cookies
ingredients:
2 cups White Sugar
1-½ cup Butter Flavored Crisco
3 whole Eggs
2 teaspoons Pure Vanilla Extract
1 teaspoon Lemon Extract
4 cups All-purpose Flour
1-½ teaspoon Baking Powder
1-½ teaspoon Baking Soda
1 teaspoon Salt
1 whole Lemon, Zested
6 ounces, fluid Lemon Drops Candy Crushed
1 cup Confectionary Sugar
1 whole Lemon, Juiced

name: Zucchini Fritti (Fried Zucchini)

½ cups Canola Oil (more If Needed)

ingredients:
1 pound Zucchini (about 2 Medium-sized), Coarsely Grated

ingredients:
