description: While this recipe uses an Italian vegetable, the finished product is all-Greek, thus combining different but complementary flavors of the Mediterranean. Summer is the time that this deep green squash is at its best. When you’re at the market or roadside stand, choose the smallest ones available, as larger zucchini tend to develop bitter flesh and seeds. You can make these with either oregano or dill—just be sure it’s fresh.

name: Zucchini Fritters
ingredients:
4 cups Shredded Zucchini

name: Zucchini Fritters

¼ teaspoons Black Pepper

description: The best part of living in a warm climate is getting to eat zucchini one day and butternut squash the next!  I love any kind of squash—especially stuffed!

name: Leek Apple Cheddar Soup
ingredients:
2 Tablespoons Unsalted Butter

Yoghurt makes these muffins tender and soft, whilst the honey sweetens and adds a tang that’s perfectly complemented by the spices. An Autumnal taste sensation!

Actually, I’ve never tried the original recipe as written- I made several changes the first time I tried it, and more the next time- you know how it goes! Anyway, this is what I ended up with. It’s definitely not diet-friendly, but everyone sure seems to love it.

This zucchini can be made to be low-carb and gluten-free, or made using more “traditional” ingredients. Either way, they’re a stand-out appetizer, side dish, or after-school snack!

name: Frozen Strawberry Dessert
ingredients:

name: Pumpkin Cranberry Muffins

½ teaspoons Nutmeg

name: Cherry Tomato and Roasted Beet Salad
ingredients:
3 whole Beets

¼ cups Chopped Walnuts
3 Tablespoons Extra Virgin Olive Oil
2 Tablespoons Balsamic Vinegar

ingredients:

½ teaspoons Ground Cumin
½ teaspoons Ground Coriander
¼ teaspoons Cayenne Pepper

name: Zucchini Casserole
ingredients:

1 can Cream Of Chicken Soup
1 cup Sour Cream

name: Zucchini Casserole

8 ounces, weight Sour Cream
1 teaspoon Salt
½ teaspoons Garlic Powder

name: Zucchini Carrot Pineapple Cake with Walnuts and Cream Cheese Frosting
ingredients:
2 cups FOR THE CAKE:
1 cup Brown Sugar
⅓ cups Unsweetened Apple Sauce
3 whole Canola Oil
2 teaspoons Eggs
3 teaspoons Vanilla
¼ teaspoons Cinnamon
2 teaspoons Nutmeg - Optional
1-½ teaspoon Baking Soda
2-½ cups Salt
2 cups Whole Wheat Pastry Flour (or All-purpose)
2 cups Carrots, Shredded

8 ounces, weight Chopped Walnuts
½ cups Can Crushed Pineapple, Drained
8 ounces, weight FOR THE FROSTING:
2 teaspoons Butter, Softened
3-½ cups Cream Cheese, Softened
description: A delcious moist cake to make great use of our overflow of zucchini that we have right now.

name: Zucchini Carrot Muffins
ingredients:
½ cups Unsweetened Applesauce (I Use One Little Cup From The Lunch Six Pack)
½ cups Egg Beaters (or 2 Whole Eggs)
2 Tablespoons Truvia (natural Sugar Substitute)

ingredients:
6 cups FOR THE FILLING:

⅔ cups Lemon Juice Concentrate
⅓ cups Granulated Sugar
1 teaspoon Brown Sugar

name: Zucchini Cakes
ingredients:
2 whole Zucchini, Grated
1-¼ cup Panko Bread Crumbs
¼ cups All-purpose Flour
1 whole Egg
1 Tablespoon Adobo Seasoning
1 teaspoon Black Pepper
⅓ cups Parmesan Cheese, Grated
description: A healthy vegetarian side dish that’s a snap to make!

name: Zucchini Cakes
ingredients:
1 whole Large Zucchini
1 Tablespoon Minced Garlic
½ cups (to 3/4 Cup) Breadcrumbs
½ cups 4-cheese Italian Blend (or Parmesan Or Romano)
2 whole Eggs

1 whole Shredded Zucchini
1 Tablespoon Minced Garlic
½ cups Breadcrumbs

1 pinch Salt And Pepper, to taste

description: Crispy. Savory. Vegetable-y. These zucchini cakes are a great new way to use up some of those easy-to-grow garden gems.

name: Mini Blueberry Crumb Cakes
ingredients:
¼ cups FOR THE CRUMB TOPPING:
¼ cups Granulated White Sugar
1 teaspoon Brown Sugar
⅛ teaspoons Cinnamon
⅛ teaspoons Ground Nutmeg
2 Tablespoons Ground Ginger(optional)
2 Tablespoons Unsalted Butter, Softened
1 cup Vegetable Oil
6 Tablespoons All Purpose White Flour
¾ cups _____
1-¼ cup FOR THE CAKE:
1 cup Unsalted Butter, Softened

¼ teaspoons All-purpose Flour, Divided

6 ounces, fluid Baking Soda
1 teaspoon Salt
description: I just love blueberry season. There are just so many ways to use them up and because they are so good for you, I NEVER feel bad about adding tons of sugar to them and making desserts. Or making breakfast items. Or making something that can be both. Hence, the mini crumb cakes. They’re cupcakes, they’re muffins, they’re breakfast, they’re dessert. They’re just plain good and if used for dessert, deserve to be warmed up and have vanilla ice cream as a supporting actor.

name: Pasta with Bell Peppers and a Kick
ingredients:
4 Tablespoons 14 Ozs Of Pasta (i Prefer Thin Spaghetti)
4 cloves Extra Virgin Olive Oil
description: Easy pasta dish with bell peppers and a garlic olive oil sauce (chicken optional).  GREAT reheated (especially at midnight).

name: Mini Eggs Benedict
ingredients:
1 package Instant Hollandaise Sauce

12 slices Bacon (cooked)
24 slices Miniature Bread Or Bagel Chips

name: Easy Refrigerator Pickles

6 cups Thinly Sliced Cucumbers

½ teaspoons Sea Salt

name: Beef Tenderloin Salad
ingredients:
2 pounds Beef Tenderloin Steaks

name: Velveeta Fudge
ingredients:
½ pounds Butter
½ pounds Velveeta Cheese
2 pounds Powdered Sugar
½ Tablespoons Vanilla
½ cups Cocoa Powder
½ cups Chopped Nuts (if Desired)

ingredients:

description: Taco Pasta – combining the best of both worlds… Mexican and Italian!  Created in my kitchen one night when we were too tired to go out and didn’t have all of the ingredients to any one meal in the pantry.  This meal is simple, cheap, easy, and a crowd pleaser!

I had completely forgotten about this wonderful recipe until I was searching through my tin file for something to make for Sweet Taste of Saturday. Your family will love this sweet, dense treat. The sugar and cinnamon bake throughout the bread and make a slightly crunchy sweet crust.

name: Zucchini Bread

name: Zucchini bread

1 teaspoon Salt

name: Zucchini Bread

name: Zucchini Bread
ingredients:
3 cups Flour
1 teaspoon Baking Powder

⅓ cups Vanilla Almond Milk
⅔ cups Vegetable Oil
1 teaspoon Vanilla
2  Eggs

Though this recipe only uses a couple of zucchini, this is still worth making! My mom would triple up the recipe and freeze the bread so we would have some all winter.  This time I threw in a 1/2 cup of chocolate chips.

name: Grandma’s Creamy Dreamy Corn Chowder

1 teaspoon McCormick Chicken Base (bouillon)
1 Tablespoon Oil
description: No more canned Enchilada sauce…this is super easy to make and is mild enough for your kids!

name: Charleston Cheese
ingredients:
8 ounces, weight Cream Cheese (8 Oz. Softened)
½ cups Mayonnaise
¼ cups Onion, finely chopped
1 cup Cheddar Cheese, Grated
8 strips Bacon, cooked and crumbled
description: I’m not sure of the origin of this recipe. My aunt has made it for years for most every shower, party, gathering that we have. It’s a huge hit! I always make it without the green onions. Serve it with crackers of your choice, but Ritz Salted Rounds work great with it.

name: Arroz con Pollo
ingredients:
1 whole Chicken, Cut Up
½ cups Lard/oil
1 whole Onion, Minced
2 cloves Bell Pepper, Julienned
1-½ cup Garlic, Minced
2-½ cups Rice, Uncooked
1 can Hot Water
2 Tablespoons (14 1/2 oz. size) Whole Tomatoes, Or 2 Whole Tomatoes, Diced
¼ cups Cumin, Ground
description: Essentially this title means Rice with Chicken. Try this traditional Tex-Mex meal that is sure to be a family favorite.

name: Fast and Easy Breakfast Parfait
ingredients:
5 slices Fresh Strawberries
⅓ cups Low Fat Vanilla Yogurt
¼ cups Preferred Granola
description: This is a delicious, healthy, and FAST morning breakfast or snack.

name: Aunt Della’s Ginger Molasses Cookies
ingredients:
1 cup Sugar
¾ cups Shortening
1 whole Egg, Beaten
4 Tablespoons Molasses
1 teaspoon Salt
2 teaspoons Baking Soda
½ teaspoons Cinnamon
¼ teaspoons Ginger
¼ teaspoons Ground Cloves
2 cups Flour
description: These cookies have the perfect taste of sweet and salty! Enjoy

name: BBQ Pulled Pork
ingredients:
4 pounds Pork Shoulder
1 whole Onion, Chopped
1 bottle BBQ Sauce
8 ounces, fluid Ginger Ale
2 Tablespoons Sweet Paprika
1 Tablespoon Chili Powder
1 Tablespoon Ground Cumin
1 Tablespoon Firmly Packed Brown Sugar
1 Tablespoon Kosher Salt
1 teaspoon Dried Oregano
1 teaspoon Black Pepper
1 teaspoon White Pepper
1 teaspoon Sugar
description: This over-night crock pot dish is perfect for any family dinner any time of year!

name: Ultimate Queso
ingredients:
1 whole Brick Processed Cheese, Cubed  (like Velveeta)
1 pound Ground Hamburger Or Turkey, Cooked
8 ounces, fluid Low Fat (or Not) Sour Cream
2 cans Rotel (whichever Kind Floats Your Boat)
2 loaves Sourdough Bread
description: This is definitely not a fat free, low-cal, or reduced anything dip; but it is awesome for a big game, family get together, etc… Just make sure you have plenty of people on hand to help you eat it!

name: Carrots Vichy
ingredients:
2 cups Water
2 pounds Baby Carrots
6 Tablespoons Butter Or Margarine
3 Tablespoons Sugar
¾ teaspoons Salt
1 teaspoon Parsley, Dried
description: You haven’t tried carrots until you’ve tried these, simmered in a buttery/savory glaze until carrot nirvana is achieved.  So simple, yet so tasty.

name: White Chili
ingredients:
2 whole Medium Onions, Chopped
1 teaspoon Vegetable Oil Or More As Needed
1 cup Chicken Breasts, Cooked And Cubed. (I Like To Use Store Bought Rotisserie Chicken)
1 can Green Chiles
1 can Rotel (whichever Kind Floats Your Boat)
3 cans Great Northern Beans
8 ounces, fluid Milk, To Desired Thickness
8 ounces, fluid Monterey Jack Cheese, Shredded
description: A one pot wonder full of yummy flavor and best of all, it’s easy peasy lemon squeezy!

name: Sopapilla Cheesecake
ingredients:
2 cans Pillsbury Crescent Rolls
2 blocks Cream Cheese (8 Oz. Softened)
1 teaspoon Vanilla Extract
1-½ cup Sugar
1 stick Butter Or Margarine
1 teaspoon Cinnamon
description: A great twist on a classic!  I serve this on nights when enchiladas, fajitas, tacos or anything Mexican inspired are on the menu.  Fast and amazing!

name: Strawberry Vanilla Bean Ice Cream
ingredients:
1 pound Strawberries
1 ounce, fluid Lime Juice
1-¾ cup Sugar
1 whole Vanilla Pod
2 whole Eggs
2 cups Well-chilled Heavy Cream
1 cup Whole Milk
description: Vanilla bean ice cream with a shot of fresh, summer-y strawberries.

name: Hot Spinach and Artichoke Dip
ingredients:
1 package Frozen Spinach, Thawed
1 can Artichoke Hearts, Drained, Chopped
1 package Cream Cheese, 8 Oz Pkg
1 package Boursin® Herb And Garlic Cheese
description: Better then anything you will get at Applebees!

name: Black Bean and Corn Salsa
ingredients:
1 can Black Bean, Drained And Rinsed
1 can Corn Kernels, Drained
1 whole Medium Red Onion, Diced
1 whole Medium Red Bell Pepper Chopped
1 whole Jalapeno, Seeds And Membranes Removed, Finely Diced
½ cups Cilantro, Chopped
2 Tablespoons Juice Of 2 Small Lemons
1 Tablespoon Exra Virgin Olive Oil
description: A quick and easy salsa to serve as a side dish or a dip.

name: Triple Chocolate Chip Cookies
ingredients:
½ cups Unsalted Butter
½ cups Brown Sugar
6 Tablespoons Sugar
1 whole Egg
1 teaspoon Pure Vanilla Extract
1-¼ cup Flour
1 teaspoon Baking Soda
½ teaspoons Salt
⅓ cups Milk Chocolate Chips
⅓ cups Semi-Sweet Chocolate Chips
⅓ cups White Chocolate Chips
description: These rich, delicious cookies are best enjoyed right out of the oven!

name: Pecan Caramel Cheesecake
ingredients:
1 box Nilla Wafers
⅓ cups Melted Butter Or Margarine
1-⅓ cup Sugar, Divided
2 blocks Regular Cream Cheese
1 block Light Cream Cheese
½ cups Low Fat Sour Cream
1 teaspoon Vanilla
3 whole Eggs
⅔ cups Roughly Chopped Pecans, Lightly Toasted
1 bottle Caramel Sauce (the Thicker The Better)
description: A cheesecake with a nilla wafer crust and pecan-caramel topping.

name: Banana Berry Muffins
ingredients:
½ cups Butter, Softened
½ cups Sugar
2 Tablespoons Ground Flax Seed
6 Tablespoons Water
2 whole Bananas, Mashed
½ cups Applesauce
½ cups Slivered Or Chopped Almonds
1 teaspoon Vanilla
½ cups Whole Wheat Flour
½ cups Wheat Germ
½ teaspoons Baking Soda
1 teaspoon Baking Powder
½ teaspoons Salt
1 cup Frozen (or Fresh) Mixed Berries, Thawed
1 cup All Purpose White Flour, + 1 Tsp
description: These are perfect for breakfast on the go. Freeze them after they’ve cooled from the oven and just 1 minute in the microwave warms them through on a busy morning!

name: Bigmama’s Pecan Pie
ingredients:
7 whole Eggs
3 cups Pecans, Chopped
2 cups Light Karo Syrup
1-½ cup Granulated Sugar
1 stick Butter, Melted
3 teaspoons Vanilla Extract
3 whole Pie Crusts (frozen)
description: My maternal grandmother was famous for this pecan pie recipe. It’s super easy and makes 3 pies all at once: one to keep, one to freeze, and one to give away! (or you could just eat all 3)

name: Zucchini Bread
ingredients:
2 cups All Purpose Flour, Sifted
1 cup Granulated Sugar
¼ teaspoons All Spice
¼ teaspoons Cloves
¼ teaspoons Nutmeg
1 teaspoon Cinnamon
½ teaspoons Salt
1 teaspoon Baking Powder
1 teaspoon Baking Soda
2 whole Large Eggs
¾ cups Oil
1 teaspoon Vanilla Extract
2 cups Grated Zucchini, About 3 Small To Medium Zucchinis
description: Moist Zucchini Bread that is easy to make and delicious!

name: Zucchini Bread
ingredients:
1 cup Whole Wheat Flour
½ cups All-purpose Flour
1 teaspoon Baking Soda
1 teaspoon Salt
1 teaspoon Cocoa Powder
1 teaspoon Cinnamon
½ teaspoons Nutmeg
8 Tablespoons Unsalted Butter,  Room Temperature
½ cups Granulated Sugar
¾ cups Light Brown Sugar
2 whole Eggs
2 cups Shredded Zucchini
½ cups Sour Cream
1 teaspoon Vanilla
description: This moist bread pairs perfectly with a cup of coffee or tea.

name: Zucchini Bread
ingredients:
2 cups FOR THE BREAD:
3 whole Zucchini, Shredded
1 cup Eggs
1 teaspoon Vegetable Oil
3 cups Vanilla
2-¼ cups Flour
1 teaspoon Granulated Sugar
½ teaspoons Salt
1 teaspoon Baking Powder
½ cups Baking Soda
3 teaspoons Walnuts, Chopped (optional)
½ teaspoons Cinnamon
4 Tablespoons _____
description: Ever since I can remember this has been one of my very favorite breads! My mom made it a lot while we were growing up, and I can remember so vividly walking in the door from school, smelling the bread baking and getting so excited. It makes your house smell so lovely that it’s almost worth baking for the smell alone!

name: The Best Peanut Butter Cookies
ingredients:
1 cup Granulated Sugar
1 whole Egg
1 cup Peanut Butter
description: 3 ingredient peanut butter cookies

name: Hoosier Sugar Cream Pie
ingredients:
4 Tablespoons Cornstarch
¾ cups White Sugar
4 Tablespoons Butter, Melted
2-¼ cups Heavy Cream
1 teaspoon Pure Vanilla Extract
2 Tablespoons Butter, Melted
½ teaspoons Ground Cinnamon
½ teaspoons Ground Nutmeg
description: My Great-Grandmama made this for every holiday.  The recipe died with her so I spent several years trying to figure it out.  I finally got something just as yummy as her “original”.

name: Chocolate Turtle Birthday Cake
ingredients:
1 whole FOR THE CAKE:
1 cup Egg
⅔ cups Buttermilk Or Sour Milk
1 teaspoon Cooking Oil
2 cups Vanilla
1-¾ cup Flour
½ cups Sugar
1 Tablespoon Unsweetened Cocoa Powder Plus More For Dusting The Pans
1 teaspoon Baking Soda
1 cup Salt
1-½ cup Freshly Brewed Hot Coffee
1 cup Pecan Or Walnut Halves, Toasted
½ cups FOR THE CHOCOLATE TOPPING:
6 Tablespoons Sugar
1 package Milk
1 teaspoon Butter
1 cup (12 Oz. Size) Semi-Sweet Chocolate Chips
3 Tablespoons Freshly Brewed Hot Coffee (might Need Double This Amount)
1 cup FOR THE CARAMEL SAUCE:
description: For my brother`s birthday, I decided to make a chocolate turtle cake. Moist homemade cake layers, homemade chocolate frosting and homemade caramel sauce. I’m happy to say the cake was a hit!

name: Homemade Peach Ice Cream
ingredients:
9  Large Ripe Peaches, Pitted
3 Tablespoons Fresh Lemon Juice
1-¼ teaspoon Salt
1-⅓ cup Stevia
⅓ cups Honey
9  Large Egg Yolks
4 Tablespoons All-purpose Flour
2 cups Almond Milk
2 cups Heavy Cream
3 teaspoons Pure Vanilla Extract
1 teaspoon Lemon Extract
description: Creamy, fresh peach ice cream made a bit healthier with stevia and almond milk.

name: Brussels Sprout Haluski
ingredients:
4  Eggs
3 cups Flour, Plus Extra If Needed
½ cups Milk
1 pound Fresh Brussels Sprouts
½ cups Butter
description: A great twist on a middle European side dish.

name: Tomato and Squash Gratin with Farro & Chicken Sausage
ingredients:
3 Tablespoons Olive Oil
½ cups Red Onion, Diced
1 whole Red Pepper, Stem And Seeds Removed, Diced
1 whole Zucchini, Sliced Into Thin Rounds
1 whole Yellow Squash, Sliced Into Thin Rounds
½ cups Ground Chicken Sausage, Cooked
½ cups Farro, Cooked According To Package Instructions
¼ cups Basil, Chopped, Divided
1-½ teaspoon Fresh Thyme
3 whole Eggs
½ cups Whole Milk
¾ cups Shredded Mozzarella, Plus More For Topping, As Desired
10 slices Tomato
½ cups Breadcrumbs
description: A quick and easy weeknight dinner that’s bursting with flavor!

name: Toasted Pecan Pumpkin Cookies
ingredients:
2 cups Tosted Pecans
½ cups Rolled Oats (gluten-free Optional)
1 cup Almond Flour
1 teaspoon Baking Soda
½ teaspoons Fine Sea Salt
1 teaspoon Ground Cinnamon
¼ teaspoons Ground Cloves
¾ cups Canned Pumpkin Puree
1 Tablespoon Orange Zest
¾ cups Fresh Squeezed Orange Juice
2 teaspoons Pure Vanilla Extract
1 cup Dates, Chopped And Pitted
description: Pumpkin, spice and everything nice!  The most delicious yet healthy cookie you’ll ever taste!

name: Strawberry Jam
ingredients:
5 cups Strawberries, Washed, Hulled And Cut In Half
¾ cups Sugar
2 Tablespoons Fresh Lemon Juice, Plus A Few Squeezes More
description: I was tired of overly sugary, very processed tasting jams, so I created this low-sugar homemade strawberry jam.

name: Peach Iced Tea
ingredients:
1 liter Water
¼ cups Black Tea Leaves (sub 4 Individual Serving Size Black Tea Bags For The 1/4 Cup Leaves)
½ cups Peach Simple Syrup
description: For some reason, peach iced tea is basically unheard of in Canada. It’s so delicious! Now that Niagara peaches are in season here, what better way to make use of these perfumed, juicy fruits than use them to flavour iced tea.

name: Peach Simple Syrup
ingredients:
3 whole Peaches
1-½ cup Sugar
1-½ cup Water
description: Ontario peaches are at their prime in August and September. The Niagara region of Ontario has plenty of fruit and the peaches are so luscious, perfumed and dripping with juice. I can easily eat six in a day. Sometimes they get mealy. At that point, I don`t like to eat them. Instead of throwing out the mealy peaches, use them to make this peach-flavoured syrup. See my TastyKitchen recipe box for my peach iced tea.

name: Easy Fudgy Brownies
ingredients:
⅔ cups Flour
⅓ cups Cocoa Powder
2 Tablespoons Cornstarch
1 teaspoon Baking Powder
¼ teaspoons Baking Soda
¼ teaspoons Salt
1 cup Packed Brown Sugar
3 Tablespoons Light Olive Oil (don`t Use Your Best For This)
1 Tablespoon Melted Butter
1 whole Egg
1-½ teaspoon Vanilla
1 Tablespoon Water
½ cups Optional Add-ins: Chocolate Chips, White Chocolate Chips, Walnuts, Or Pecans
description: There are cakey brownies, fudgy brownies, iced brownies…you name it. In my opinion, fudgy brownies are the quintessential brownie. If you want a cakey brownie, why not just eat chocolate cake? I also don’t understand iced brownies. If your brownie is flavourful enough, it doesn’t need to be dressed up in icing.

name: Cornish Hen with Mediterranean Garlic-Spice Rub
ingredients:
15 cloves FOR SPICE RUB
2-½ teaspoons Garlic
2-½ teaspoons Seasoned Salt
1-½ teaspoon Hot Paprika
1-½ teaspoon Ground Allspice
1 teaspoon Dried Thyme
½ teaspoons Ground Black Pepper
1 whole Ground Nutmeg
2 Tablespoons Lemon Or Lime, Juice Of
4 whole Olive Oil
1 whole FOR THE HENS:
2 stalks (1 1/2 Lb. Size) Cornish Game Hens
2 whole Sweet Onion, Roughly Chopped Or Cut In Large Pieces
2 cups Celery, Cleaned And Chopped In Large Pieces
description: Fall-off-the-bone hens that make the perfect dinner or even a Holiday meal! You have to try it with the Mediterranean garlic spice rub. Yum!

name: Spinach Fettuchine with Mushrooms
ingredients:
1 box Spinach Fettuchine
2 cloves 1 Container Mushroom Caps
2 Tablespoons Garlic, Chopped
description: Spinach fettuccine with portabella mushrooms sounds delicious and nicer than your average weeknight meal, but is really easy to throw together!

name: Chicken Velvet Soup
ingredients:
6 Tablespoons Butter
⅓ cups Flour
½ cups Milk
½ cups Heavy Whipping Cream
3 cups Chicken Broth
1 cup Cooked Chicken, Cubed Or Shredded
description: Easy, fast homemade cream of chicken soup.

name: Italian Chicken and Veggies
ingredients:
1 pound Boneless, Skinless Chicken Breasts
1 package Dry Italian Dressing Mix
1 whole Zucchini, Chopped
1 whole Green Pepper, Roughly Chopped
1 whole Yellow Bell Pepper, Chopped
1 whole Yellow Squash, Chopped
½ whole Onion, Chopped
½ cups Kraft Italian Dressing
1-½ cup Shredded Mozzarella Cheese
description: Chicken and vegetables are cooked in an Italian seasoning mix in foil pouches, making it one of the juiciest chicken dishes ever!

name: Sweet and Sour Pasta Salad
ingredients:
1 pound Rotini
⅔ cups Vegetable Oil
1-½ cup Sugar
1-½ cup White Vinegar
1 teaspoon Garlic Salt
2 Tablespoons Dry Mustard
description: This tangy pasta salad always gets compliments at potlucks.  It’s a good change from the norm.

name: Marshmallow Frosting
ingredients:
3 whole Egg Whites, At Room Temperature
2-¼ cups Granulated White Sugar
¾ teaspoons Cream Of Tartar
1 teaspoon Vanilla Extract
4 drops Food Coloring
¾ cups Boiling Water
description: For the marshmallow fan!

name: Cherry Almond Biscotti
ingredients:
1-¾ cup All-purpose Flour
1 cup Whole Wheat Pastry Flour
1 cup Sugar
2 teaspoons Baking Powder
½ teaspoons Salt
1-½ teaspoon Orange Zest
1 Tablespoon Orange Juice
2 Tablespoons Butter, Melted
½ teaspoons Almond Extract
3 whole Large Eggs
1 cup Dried Cherries, Roughly Chopped
1 cup Sliced Almonds, Toasted
description: Perfect for you if you think making biscotti is way out of your league! Tastes amazing and makes a very impressive gift at the holidays… or on a Tuesday

name: Chicken and Veggie Egg Rolls
ingredients:
1 teaspoon Vegetable Oil
1 Tablespoon Butter Or Margarine
2 whole Medium Onions, Chopped
1 head Green Cabbage, Shredded Or Very Finely Sliced
½ bags Shredded Carrots
1 cube Chicken Bouillon
¼ cups Water
3 teaspoons Soy Sauce
1 pound Chicken Breasts, Cooked And Cubed. (I Like To Use Store Bought Rotisserie Chicken)
1 package Soy Sauce
4 Tablespoons Egg Roll Wrappers
description: These are easy to make and incredibly delicious egg rolls.  It’s more  of a technique to make egg rolls, rather than a recipe because you can add just about any thing you want to these.

name: Blackberry Frozen Yogurt
ingredients:
1-½ cup Fresh Blackberries
¼ cups Sugar
1-½ Tablespoon Vanilla Extract
2 Tablespoons Lime Juice
2 cups Strained Greek Yogurt
description: A tart frozen yogurt flavored with lime and blackberries.

name: Triple Berry Trifle
ingredients:
3 cups Milk (or Amount Noted On Pudding Box)
1 package Instant Sugar-Free Vanilla Pudding Mix (Large Box)
1 tub Cool Whip Light (Large Tub), Thawed
3 packages Strawberries
3 packages Blackberries Or Raspberries
2 packages Blueberries
¼ cups Sugar
1 teaspoon Cornstarch
1 ounce, fluid Fresh Lemon Juice
description: Sweet layers of berries, vanilla fluff, and cake bites…YUMM!

name: Faux-tatoes (Mashed Cauliflower)
ingredients:
1 head Cauliflower
2 Tablespoons Exra Virgin Olive Oil
¼ cups Diced Onion
2 cloves Garlic, Chopped
2 Tablespoons Sour Cream
2 Tablespoons Cheddar Cheese, Grated
1 Tablespoon Butter
1 Tablespoon Milk
description: Pureed cauliflower and cheese by any other name. But you’d never know it. A great way for kids – of all ages – to get their veggies!

name: Blackberry Muffins
ingredients:
1-¾ cup All Purpose White Flour
⅓ cups Granulated Sugar
2 teaspoons Baking Powder
¼ teaspoons Salt
1 whole Egg, Beaten
¾ cups Milk
¼ cups Cooking Oil
1 cup Blackberries, Fresh Or Frozen
description: Easy morning pick-me-up. Substitute raspberries, dried cranberries, dewberries, or finely chopped apple in place of blackberries.

name: Chocolate Nut Crispies
ingredients:
1 cup Sugar
1 cup Light Corn Syrup
2 cups Chunky Peanut Butter
2 Tablespoons Butter
5 cups Rice Krispies
12 ounces, weight Package Milk Chocolate Chips
½ cups Chopped Peanuts
description: Rice Krispie Treats but with Peanut Butter and Chocolate!

name: Huge Meatballs
ingredients:
2 pounds Ground Beef Or Turkey
2 whole Medium Onions, Chopped
⅔ cups Ketchup
½ cups Seasoned Bread Crumbs
1 whole Large Egg
2 Tablespoons Brown Sugar
1 Tablespoon Mustard (i Like Spicy.. But Whatev)
1 teaspoon Black Pepper
description: These can be used as really big meatballs (kids love them) or on their own. The beauty of making these in a huge batch is that we freeze them and just take out 2 per person when we need something fast.

name: Simple Summer Salad
ingredients:
1 pound Grape Or Cherry Tomatoes
4 Tablespoons Balsamic Vinegar
6 Tablespoons Exra Virgin Olive Oil
1 clove Garlic Clove, Pressed
12 ounces, weight Pasta, Shell Shaped
½ cups Crumbled Feta Cheese
¼ cups Fresh Basil, Finely Chopped
¼ cups Fresh Parsley, Chopped
description: This is a quick and easy summer dish. It works for a main dish or a great side dish.

name: The Grinder
ingredients:
½ pounds Sliced Ham (not Honey Ham)
8 slices Provolone OR Mozzarella Cheese
1 whole Bell Pepper
1 whole Sliced Tomato
6 dashes Oregano
3 cloves Minced Garlic
1 whole French Baguette Split Lengthwise
description: A toasted ham and provolone sandwich with bell peppers, tomatoes, fresh minced garlic and a touch of oregano. Your family will thank you! I won’t post just any old recipe- I promise!

name: Sausage Balls
ingredients:
1 pound Hot Sausage
1 pound Mild Sausage
12 ounces, fluid Shredded Sharp Cheddar Cheese
12 ounces, fluid Shredded Mild Cheddar Cheese
4 cups Bisquick
description: Delicious and easy to make.  Perfect for parties- make sure to save some for yourself as I never seem to have any left over!

name: Okie Beef Stir Fry
ingredients:
1 pound Sirloin Steak, Sliced Thin
2 Tablespoons Vegetable Oil, Divided
3 whole Bell Peppers, Any Color, Chopped
2 whole Large Onion, Chopped
2 whole Zucchini, Sliced In Half Moons
2 whole Yellow Squash, Sliced In Half Moons
1 package White Mushrooms, Halved
1 can 6oz Can Tomato Sauce
1 bottle La Choy Sweet And Sour Sauce
2 Tablespoons Soy Sauce
½ cups Water
description: Yes, I just went there. I just said Okie Stir fry. Why do I call it that? Because it’s more stew-like than Asian and because I’m originally a product of Oklahoma (therefore, an Okie). This recipe is thanks to my Momma because she likes to create funky stuff like this. I like to steal her ideas, put my own spin on it, and then eat it until I’m blue in the face and never want to see a bell pepper again. Enjoy, my Okie and non-Okie friends!

name: Easy Fig Pastry
ingredients:
1 whole Puff Pastry Sheet, Thawed In Fridge For Three Hours
5 ounces, weight Goat Cheese, Room Temprature
2 Tablespoons Fig Jam
8 ounces, weight Fresh Black Mission Figs, Washed, Dried, Sliced In 1/2"-thick Rounds
¼ cups Walnuts, Roughly Chopped. More For Additional Garnish, If Desired
1 Tablespoon Butter, Melted
¼ cups Fresh Mint Leaves, Stems Removed, Roughly Chopped (optional)
description: Flaky puff pastry with fresh mission figs, goat cheese, fig jam and walnuts. A garnish of fresh mint leaves takes it to another level, but is certainly optional. Makes for a great snack, appetizer or dessert. In fact, I served it as part of brunch last weekend!

name: Tomato Cheese Tortellini Soup
ingredients:
9 ounces, weight Frozen Cheese Tortellini
2 cans (10 3/4 Oz. Size) Tomato Soup
1 pint Half-and-half
1 cup Milk
½ teaspoons Garlic Powder
½ teaspoons Italian Seasoning
½ teaspoons Dried Basil
1 pinch Salt And Pepper, to taste
description: This is a quick and easy Italian dinner. The warm and delicious soup paired with garlic bread and a salad can make a fantastic dinner.

name: Homemade Tater Tots with Spicy Mayo
ingredients:
1 cup FOR THE SPICY MAYO:
2 Tablespoons Mayonnaise
1 Tablespoon Hot Chile Paste
1 teaspoon Sriracha
4 whole Smoked Paprika
⅓ cups FOR THE TOTS:
2 Tablespoons Medium-sized Russet Potatoes, Rinsed And Dried
2 Tablespoons Whole Milk
⅓ cups Sour Cream
¼ cups Chives, Chopped
¼ cups Italian-Style Breadcrumbs
1 teaspoon Panko Bread Crumbs
½ teaspoons Parmesan Cheese, Grated
1 teaspoon Garlic Powder
1 teaspoon Cayenne Pepper
2 whole Cracked Black Pepper
1 whole Fine Sea Salt
description: Homemade tater tots are the perfect game day appetizer and will be gone in seconds!

name: Baked Ravioli with Vodka Sauce
ingredients:
¼ cups FOR THE VODKA SAUCE:
1 whole Unsalted Butter
5 cloves Medium Sized Yellow Onion, Diced
1-½ cup Garlic, Finely Minced
2 cans Vodka
1 teaspoon (28 Oz. Size) Crushed Tomatoes
1 teaspoon Salt And Black Pepper
1 teaspoon Granulated Sugar
½ teaspoons Dried Oregano
¾ cups Dried Thyme
1 Tablespoon Crushed Red Pepper
1 Tablespoon Heavy Cream
1 bag Fresh Basil, Chopped
1 cup Fresh Parsley, Chopped
¼ cups FOR THE PASTA:
description: Perfect for a busy weeknight, this baked ravioli with vodka sauce is quick and easy!

name: Easy Garlic Knots
ingredients:
1 package (16.3 Oz. Size)Refrigerated Buttermilk Biscuits
5 Tablespoons Butter, Melted
2 Tablespoons Grated Parmesan Cheese
¾ teaspoons Garlic Powder
½ teaspoons Dried Oregano
½ teaspoons Dried Parsley
¼ teaspoons Salt
description: These savory garlic knots are the perfect finger food for any occasion and take less than 30 minutes to make!

name: Smoked Whole Chicken
ingredients:
1 gallon FOR THE CHICKEN:
¾ cups Water
1 cup Salt
1 whole Sugar
1 bunch Chicken, Giblets Removed
½ cups Cherry Wood Chips, Soaked In Water
½ cups FOR THE RUB:
¼ cups Paprika
¼ cups Light Brown Sugar
1 Tablespoon Granulated Sugar
2 Tablespoons Garlic Powder
1 Tablespoon Onion Powder
1 Tablespoon Kosher Salt
1 teaspoon Cracked Black Pepper
description: A whole chicken that is brined and smoked with cherry wood. Moist, perfectly smoked and overall delicious.

name: Pumpkin Triple Chocolate Chip Cookies
ingredients:
1 cup All-purpose Flour
½ cups Bread Flour
1 Tablespoon Cornstarch
1 teaspoon Ground Cinnamon
½ teaspoons Ground Ginger
¼ teaspoons Ground Cloves
¼ teaspoons Ground Nutmeg
1 pinch Salt
1 teaspoon Baking Soda
½ teaspoons Baking Powder
¼ cups Dark Chocolate Chips
½ cups Milk Chocolate Chips
½ cups White Chocolate Chips
¾ sticks Unsalted Butter, At Room Temperature
¾ cups Light Brown Sugar
¼ cups White Sugar
1  Large Egg
½ teaspoons Vanilla Extract
¾ cups Canned Pumpkin Puree (Not Pie Filling)
description: Say goodbye to cakey pumpkin cookies! Soft, chewy, lightly spiced and with three types of chocolate, this is the only pumpkin cookie recipe you need!

name: French Toast Muffins with Blueberry Sauce
ingredients:
4 whole Eggs
¾ cups Milk - Low Fat
1 Tablespoon Honey
1 teaspoon Vanilla Extract
1 teaspoon Cinnamon, Divided
½ teaspoons Salt
8 slices Whole-grain Bread ( Or Crusty Artisan Bread) Cut Into 1 Inch Cubes
1 cup Fresh Or Frozen Blueberries
⅓ cups Pure Maple Syrup
1 teaspoon Grated Orange Zest
1 teaspoon Cornstarch
description: A healthy, easy version of classic French toast with a unique twist. Baked in a muffin tin and topped with warm blueberry sauce.

name: Zucchini Bread
ingredients:
2 cups Sugar
½ cups Oil
½ cups Applesauce
2 whole Eggs
3 cups Flour
1 teaspoon Baking Soda
¼ teaspoons Baking Powder
1 teaspoon Salt
2 teaspoons Cinnamon
2 cups Raw, Grated Zucchini
1 cup Chopped Walnuts
3 teaspoons Vanilla
description: I got this recipe from a neighbor years ago, and have adapted it slightly to suit my family. (The original called for 3 eggs and a whole cup of oil, which really seemed extreme!)

name: Zucchini Bread
ingredients:
3 cups Flour
1 teaspoon Salt
1 teaspoon Baking Powder
1 teaspoon Baking Soda
1 Tablespoon Cinnamon
3 whole Eggs
1 cup Vegetable Oil
1 Tablespoon Vanilla
2-¼ cups Sugar
2 whole Zucchini, Grated
description: The best zucchini bread ever.  Try it with cream cheese!!!

name: Ruby Red Rhubarb and Strawberry Crumble
ingredients:
4 cups FOR THE FRUIT:
4 cups Rhubarb, Chopped Into 1-inch Pieces
¾ cups Strawberries, Hulled And Cut Into Bite-sized Chunks
1 Tablespoon Sugar
1 cup Cornstarch (up To Double This, If Desired)
1 cup FOR THE TOPPING:
¾ cups Flour
1 teaspoon Rolled Oats
¾ cups Brown Sugar
description: Strawberries and rhubarb make a swell pair. They are commonly found together in pies, but I find crumbles are much easier to make. You can assemble this dish a day ahead and bake just before you want to serve it. It is wonderful hot from the oven and served with ice cream, or cold at a picnic! I bought some rhubarb and strawberries earlier this week, and threw this together to end our Father’s Day dinner.

name: Maple Pecan Chocolate Tartlets
ingredients:
½ cups FOR THE CRUST:
4 ounces, weight Unsalted Butter, melted
½ cups Cream Cheese, Softened
⅓ cups Packed Light Brown Sugar
1 cup Unsweetened Cocoa Powder
1 cup All-purpose Flour
2 Tablespoons FOR THE FILLING:
2 whole Packed Light Brown Sugar
1 teaspoon Unsalted Butter, melted
¼ cups Large Eggs
⅔ cups Vanilla Extract
description: These adorable little pecan pie tarts are made with a chocolate cookie crust and a sweet maple pecan filling.

name: Yellow Rice
ingredients:
2 cups Rice, Uncooked
¼ cups Yellow Food Coloring
1 teaspoon Sugar
7 whole Salt
7 whole Cardamom
2 sticks Cloves
¼ cups Cinnamon
2 Tablespoons Golden Raisins
4 cups Butter Or Olive Oil
⅓ cups Water
2 Tablespoons Slivered Or Chopped Almonds
description: This is a sweet rice dish, commonly eaten in Afghanistan.

name: Zucchini Arugula Salad
ingredients:
½ teaspoons Dijon Mustard
1 Tablespoon Lemon Juice
3 Tablespoons Olive Oil
1 teaspoon Lemon Zest
1 clove Garlic, Minced
¼ teaspoons Dried Oregano
¼ teaspoons Salt
7 cups Zucchini, Very Thinly Sliced Or Spiralized
3 cups Arugula
⅓ cups Red Onion Very Thinly Sliced
⅓ cups Red Pepper, Very Thinly Sliced
¼ cups Fresh Mint, Chopped
2 Tablespoons Fresh Basil, Chopped
description: Fresh, raw zucchini and arugula build the base for this refreshing, summer salad!

name: Banana Cheesecake with Mango Sauce
ingredients:
½ cups Almonds
1 cup Oats
3 Tablespoons Maple Syrup
1 package (14 To 16 Oz. Size) Silken Tofu
3  Bananas (peeled)
2 teaspoons Vanilla
1 Tablespoon Lemon Juice
¼ cups Xylitol, Coconut Sugar Or Another Natural Sweetener
1 Tablespoon Cornstarch
½  Mango, Peeled And Pitted
description: A healthy cheesecake with tropical flavors. Refined sugar-, gluten- and cholesterol-free. The crust is made of almonds, oats and maple syrup. None of the usual butter with white flour and refined sugar. And the cheesecake filling is a low-fat, high-protein mixture of silken tofu, bananas and natural sweeteners.

name: Cheddar Buttermilk Quick Bread
ingredients:
2 cups All-purpose Flour
1 Tablespoon Granulated Sugar
1-½ teaspoon Baking Powder
½ teaspoons Baking Soda
1 teaspoon Iodized Salt
2 whole Eggs, Beaten
¼ cups Lightly Salted Butter (softened)
1-¼ cup Buttermilk
¾ cups Shredded Cheddar Cheese
description: Great for breakfast, brunch or a main course meal. Add some butter on top of a slice and enjoy!

name: Creamiest Cauliflower Soup
ingredients:
1 package (16 Oz. Size) Frozen Cauliflower Florets (thawed)
1 cup Whole Milk
½ cups Light Cream
1-½ cup Low Sodium Vegetable Stock
¼ teaspoons Nutmeg
1 teaspoon Black Pepper
2 Tablespoons Sweet Cream Butter, Melted
1 teaspoon Parsley Flakes
description: Super delicious soup for the colder months ahead. Easy and quick to prepare.

name: Zucchini Bread
ingredients:
2 cups All-purpose Flour, Plus A Bit To Dust The Walnuts
1-¼ cup Whole Wheat Flour
1-½ teaspoon Salt
2 teaspoons Baking Soda
1 teaspoon Cinnamon
2 cups Sugar
1 cup Brown Sugar
1 cup Vegetable Oil
4 whole Eggs
⅓ cups Water
2 cups Shredded Zucchini
1 teaspoon Lemon Juice
½ teaspoons Vanilla Extract
1 cup Chopped Walnuts
description: Flavorful and more healthy than regular versions- this bread is fluffy and delicious!

name: Pepper Jack Beer Bread Muffins
ingredients:
1-½ cup All-purpose Flour
2 teaspoons Baking Powder
½ teaspoons Salt
¼ cups Canola Oil
¾ cups Beer (pale Ale)
¾ cups Shredded Pepper Jack
1 pinch Red Pepper Flakes (optional)
description: These pepper jack beer bread muffins are gameday ready. Beer. Carbs. Cheese. The trifecta of gameday appetizers all in one bite.

name: Strawberry Yogurt Bundt Cake
ingredients:
2-½ cups FOR THE CAKE:
½ teaspoons Whole Wheat Flour, Divided
½ teaspoons Baking Soda
½ teaspoons Baking Powder
1 whole Salt
1 cup Lemon, Zested
2 cups Butter Or Margarine, Softened
3 whole Sugar
1 teaspoon Eggs (large)
1 Tablespoon Vanilla Extract
1 cup Lemon Juice
2 cups Plain Greek Yogurt
1 cup Fresh Strawberries, Diced
2 Tablespoons FOR THE GLAZE:
description: This is a casual dessert; not fussy at all. As a kid I loved baking coffee cakes and quick breads. We always had neighbors dropping by for coffee, so there were extra mouths to feed. This is a great summertime cake. It goes great with tea or coffee.

name: Chocolate Chip and Walnut Oatmeal Cookies
ingredients:
1 cup Butter, Melted
1 cup Tightly Packed Brown Sugar
½ cups White Sugar
2 whole Eggs
2 teaspoons Pure Vanilla Extract
1-½ cup Flour
½ teaspoons Baking Soda
1 teaspoon Salt
3 cups Quick Cooking Oats
1 cup Walnuts, Chopped
2 cups Milk Chocolate Chips
description: Chocolaty and chewy. The best chocolate chip and walnut oatmeal cookies ever! Luscious!

name: Zucchini Crisp
ingredients:
8 cups FOR THE BASE:
½ cups Peeled, Seeded And Sliced Zucchini
½ cups Lemon Juice
2 teaspoons Granulated Sugar
1 teaspoon Ground Cinnamon
1 teaspoon Freshly-ground Nutmeg
1-⅓ cup Pure Vanilla Extract
1 cup FOR THE TOPPING:
1 cup Packed Light Brown Sugar
1 teaspoon Old Fashioned Oats
⅔ cups All-purpose Flour
description: Even people who hate zucchini love this dish. The oatmeal topping and cinnamon-y goodness makes you think you’re having a dish of apple crisp.

name: Zucchini Crisp
ingredients:
4 cups FOR THE CRUST:
2 cups Flour
½ teaspoons Sugar
¾ pounds Salt
8 cups Butter
⅔ cups _____
1 cup FOR THE FILLING:
½ teaspoons Zucchini, Peeled, Seeded, Sliced
1-½ teaspoon Lemon Juice
description: I have served this zucchini crisp to people & they think I’m joking when I tell them it was made from zucchini. They are just SURE it is apple crisp.  Really! It’s true!  I took it to the ice cream social at church last weekend & didn’t tell them until the next day that my “apple crisp surprise” was really zucchini crisp.  One lady said, “No way! It even looks like apples!”

name: Zucchini, Cranberry & Walnut Bread
ingredients:
2-⅔ cups Plain Flour
1 teaspoon Bicarbonate Soda
½ teaspoons Baking Powder
1 teaspoon Ground Cinnamon
¼ teaspoons Pumpkin Pie Spice Or Similar
1-⅓ cup Castor Sugar
½ cups Brown Sugar
3 whole Eggs, Lightly Beaten
13 tablespoons, 1-½ teaspoons, 1-¼ pinches Sunflower Oil
2 teaspoons Vanilla Extract
3 whole Zucchinis, Grated
¾ cups Walnuts, Roughly Chopped
⅓ cups Cranberries
1 pinch Salt
6 whole Walnuts, For Garnish
description: Perfect bread to add to your picnic basket along with a nice soft cheese!

name: Zucchini Couscous Salad
ingredients:
1 cup Whole Wheat Couscous
1 cup Boiling Water
1 whole Large Zucchini, Thickly Sliced Lengthwise
1 Tablespoon Extra Virgin Olive Oil
1 teaspoon Salt And Pepper
½ cups Oregano
3 teaspoons Fresh Corn
⅓ cups Feta Cheese
1 teaspoon Chopped Red Onions
⅓ cups Minced Green Onion
description: This zucchini couscous salad is a delicious salad that tastes even better as a leftover.

name: Zucchini Cornmeal Muffins
ingredients:
1-½ cup Quinoa Flour
1-½ cup Cornmeal
1 Tablespoon Baking Powder
1 teaspoon Salt
⅓ cups Agave Nectar (or Honey)
2 whole Eggs
¼ cups Becel Oil
¾ cups Plain Or Vanilla Yogurt
¾ cups Milk
1-½ cup Shredded Zucchini
description: I’ve been experimenting with gluten-free flours and natural sweeteners.  This was the first successful muffin recipe I had made.

name: Zucchini Corn Casserole
ingredients:
2 cups Zucchini, Chopped
2 cups Fresh Or Frozen Corn
1 cup Onion, Diced
½ cups Milk
½ cups Red Pepper  Chopped
½ cups Green Pepper, Chopped
1 teaspoon Chicken Base
½ teaspoons Cumin
⅛ teaspoons Cayenne Pepper
2 cans Green Chilies Or Jalapenos
1 cup Jack Cheese, Divided
description: Yummy cheesy zucchini corn casserole with a little kick.  Your family will be asking for zucchini.

name: Zucchini Cookies with Cream Cheese Frosting
ingredients:
3 whole FOR THE COOKIES:
1 cup Eggs
1 cup Vegetable Oil
1 cup Sugar
2 cups Brown Sugar
3 teaspoons Grated Zucchini
4 cups Vanilla
½ teaspoons Flour
1 teaspoon Baking Powder
1 teaspoon Baking Soda
1 teaspoon Cinnamon
1 cup Salt
4 Tablespoons Raisins
4 ounces, weight FOR THE FROSTING:
1 teaspoon Butter, Softened
2 cups Cream Cheese
description: Looking for ways to use up that zucchini? These cookies are amazing and it’s a great way to hide something healthy in something so delicious!

name: Zucchini Cookies
ingredients:
1 cup Butter, Room Temperature
1-½ cup Sugar
2 whole Eggs
1 Tablespoon Vanilla
2 cups Shredded Zucchini
2-¾ cups All-purpose Flour
2 teaspoons Baking Powder
1 Tablespoon Cinnamon
1 teaspoon Salt
1 cup Pecans, Chopped
1 cup Semisweet Chocolate Chips
1 cup Raisins
1 cup Sweetened, Flaked Coconut
description: These cookies are chock full of great ingredients including coconut to “hide” the zucchini.  They come out very moist and somewhat caky, but in a good way!

name: Baked Pumpkin Cream Cheese French Toast
ingredients:
1 loaf Crusty White Bread, Cut Into 1/2-inch Cubes
16 ounces, weight Cream Cheese, Softened
½ cups Butter, Softened, Plus More For Greasing
1 cup Pure Maple Syrup, Plus More For Serving
1 cup Canned Pumpkin Puree
6  Eggs
1-½ cup Half-and-half
1 teaspoon Vanilla
1 cup Cinnamon, For Dusting
description: A simple and delicious breakfast made the night before and popped into the oven in the morning. Full of pumpkin, cream cheese and syrup goodness and topped with chopped pecans!

name: Strawberry Vodka
ingredients:
575 grams Fresh Strawberries (organic Is Best)
1 bottle (750 ML Size) Plain Vodka
description: Despite the tantalizing fragrance and pretty pink hue, this strawberry vodka doesn’t have much flavour on its own. But its alluring perfume adds another dimension to mixed drinks such as a Cape Cod.

name: Beef Pot Pie Hand Pies
ingredients:
1 package (2 Count Size) Refrigerated Pie Crusts
4 cups Leftover Beef Stew (beef, Veggies, Liquid), Chopped
4 Tablespoons Butter, Melted
description: Handy dandy comfort food at its best. What’s not to love?

name: Soft and Chewy Double Chocolate Chip Cookies
ingredients:
2 sticks Unsalted Butter, Softened
1 cup Sugar
½ cups Brown, Light Brown Sugar
2  Large Eggs
1 teaspoon Pure Almond Extract
2-½ cups All-purpose Flour
2 Tablespoons Vanilla Jello Instant Pudding Mix
1 teaspoon Kosher Salt
1 teaspoon Baking Soda
1 cup White Chocolate Chips
1 cup Semi-Sweet Chocolate Chips
description: I love a good chewy cookie.

name: Cranberry Turkey Pinwheels
ingredients:
8 ounces, weight Whipped Cream Cheese
2 Tablespoons Mayonnaise
¼ cups Canned Whole-berry Cranberry Sauce
8  (10-Inch Size) Flour Tortillas
½ heads Red Or Green Leaf Lettuce, Washed, Drained And Torn Into 4-inch Pieces
16 slices Deli Turkey
16 slices Muenster Cheese
description: Why should you wait for Thanksgiving to eat this amazing flavor combination?

name: The Best Coconut Cream Pie
ingredients:
1 cup FOR THE PIE:
1 can Sweetened Flaked Coconut, Divided Use
1-⅓ cup (15 Oz. Size) Regular Coconut Milk
⅓ cups Half-and-half
¾ cups Cornstarch
3  White Sugar
¼ teaspoons Egg Yolks, Lightly Beaten
1 teaspoon Salt
1  Vanilla Extract
½ cups 9-inch Pie Shell, Baked
2 Tablespoons FOR THE WHIPPED CREAM:
½ teaspoons Heavy Whipping Cream
description: Flaky, buttery pie crust, creamy coconut custard filling, fresh whipped cream, and golden toasted coconut on top…I think I might have turned into a coconut cream pie fanatic.

name: Pumpkin Spice Latte
ingredients:
1 Tablespoon Canned Pumpkin Puree
½ teaspoons Pumpkin Spice
½ Tablespoons Maple Syrup
1 cup 2% Milk
½ cups Brewed Strong Coffee
description: There’s no need to waste a lot of money buying pumpkin spice lattes. Just make them at home! No fancy equipment required.

name: Almond Brown Sugar Pound Cake
ingredients:
1 stick Unsalted Butter, At Room Temperature
1 cup Packed Brown Sugar
2 whole Eggs
1-½ cup All-purpose Flour
½ teaspoons Kosher Salt
¼ teaspoons Baking Powder
¼ teaspoons Baking Soda
¼ cups Sour Cream
¼ cups Whole Milk
½ teaspoons Pure Vanilla Extract
¼ teaspoons Almond Extract
¼ cups Sliced Almonds
description: Buttery brown sugar sour cream pound cake topped with toasted almonds.

name: Chai Tea Ice Cream
ingredients:
2 cups Heavy Cream
2 cups Whole Milk
1 pinch Salt
½ cups Honey (divided Use)
1-½ Tablespoon Loose Chai Tea (or Enough To Make 6 Cups Of Tea According To The Tea Package), Or 6 Chai Tea Bags (I Use Herbal)
5 whole Egg Yolks
1 teaspoon Vanilla Extract
description: This ice cream is inspired by my cherished cup of Chai tea. The warm spices make it enjoyable in any season. Sweetened with honey, so there’s no refined sugar!

name: Banana Oat Muffins with Brown Sugar Streusel
ingredients:
¾ cups FOR THE STREUSEL:
¾ cups Brown Sugar, Dark Or Light
⅓ cups All-purpose Flour
1 teaspoon Old Fashioned Oats
½ teaspoons Cinnamon
6 Tablespoons Salt
2 cups Butter, Melted
4  FOR THE MUFFINS:
½ cups Oat Bran
¼ cups Large Bananas, Peeled
1 teaspoon All-purpose Flour
½ teaspoons Whole Wheat Flour
¾ teaspoons Baking Powder
1 teaspoon Baking Soda
½ teaspoons Salt
¾ cups Cinnamon
¾ cups Nutmeg
2  Plain, Unsweetened Yogurt
½ cups Brown Sugar, Dark Or Light
¼ cups Large Eggs
description: Banana oat muffins with sliced bananas and a buttery, brown sugar streusel. These taste decadent even though they’re packed with good-for-you ingredients.

name: Apple Spice Bundt Cake with Maple Glaze
ingredients:
1 cup FOR THE CAKE:
½ cups Butter, Room Temperature
1-¼ cup Canola Or Vegetable Oil
½ cups Granulated Sugar
3 whole Brown Sugar
2 teaspoons Large Eggs
3 cups Vanilla Extract
1 teaspoon All-purpose Flour
1 teaspoon Baking Powder
½ teaspoons Baking Soda
1 teaspoon Salt
½ teaspoons Ground Cinnamon
¼ teaspoons Ground Cloves
2 cups Nutmeg
2 cups Peeled And Shredded Apple
2 Tablespoons FOR THE MAPLE GLAZE:
1 teaspoon Icing (powdered) Sugar
description: A moist, spicy bundt cake made with fresh apples and glazed with a wonderful maple icing.

name: Chewy Pumpkin Peanut Butter Cookies
ingredients:
1 cup Unsalted Butter, Softened
1 cup Granulated Sugar
¾ cups Brown Sugar (lightly Packed)
½ cups Canned Pumpkin Puree
2 teaspoons Vanilla
1 cup Creamy Peanut Butter
3 cups Plus 2 Tablespoons, All-purpose Flour
1 teaspoon Baking Soda
1 teaspoon Baking Powder
½ teaspoons Kosher Salt
1 Tablespoon Cinnamon
¾ cups Semi-Sweet Chocolate Chips
description: Chewy pumpkin peanut butter cookies. Classic peanut butter cookies with the flavours of fall!

name: Faux Ice Cream
ingredients:
4 whole Bananas (peeled, Cut In 1 Inch Pieces And Frozen)
4 Tablespoons Unsweetened Cocoa Powder (more To Taste)
description: Two ingredients and a blender are all you need to make this no-cream, no-sugar, no-guilt dessert!

name: Greek Yogurt Chicken
ingredients:
1 cup Plain Greek Yogurt
2 Tablespoons Olive Oil
2 cloves Minced Garlic
½ Tablespoons Dried Oregano
½ Tablespoons Salt
1  Freshly Cracked Pepper
¼ bunches Lemon (zest And Some Of The Juice)
4 pounds Fresh Parsley
description: Discover my simple 3-step Greek yogurt chicken! Impress your friends at a barbecue or make your family drop their jaws at dinner. A guaranteed success!

name: Vegetarian Cincinnati Chili
ingredients:
1 Tablespoon Olive Oil
1 whole Medium Yellow Onion, Peeled And Quartered
2 cloves Garlic, Peeled
8 ounces, weight Tempeh
½ teaspoons Allspice
1 leaf Bay Leaf
1 Tablespoon Chili Powder
1 teaspoon Cinnamon
¼ teaspoons Cloves
⅛ teaspoons Coriander
½ teaspoons Cumin
¼ teaspoons Nutmeg
1 teaspoon Oregano
1 teaspoon Paprika
½ teaspoons Salt
8 ounces, fluid Tomato Sauce
1-½ cup Water
1 Tablespoon Apple Cider Vinegar
1 Tablespoon Worcestershire Sauce
½ Tablespoons Molasses
1 pound Whole Wheat Spaghetti
1-½ cup Shredded Mild Cheddar Cheese
3 cups Cooked Or Canned Dark Red Kidney Beans, Rinsed, Drained And Warmed (amount As Desired For Serving)
description: A tasty twist on a classic. Vegetarian Cincinnati Chili!

name: Pumpkin Hummus with Baked Cinnamon “Sugar” Tortilla Chips
ingredients:
1 cup FOR THE HUMMUS:
¾ cups Canned Reduced-sodium Chickpeas, Skin Removed (see Note)
¼ cups Canned Pumpkin
2 teaspoons Maple Syrup
2 teaspoons Pumpkin Pie Spice
1  Coconut Oil, Melted + Additional For Drizzling, If Desired.
½ Tablespoons FOR THE CHIPS:
description: Have your hummus for dessert or snacks with this healthy, sweet spin! So easy!

name: Zucchini Bread
ingredients:
3 whole Eggs
¼ cups Vegetable Oil
½ cups Applesauce (unsweetened)
2 teaspoons Vanilla Extract
1-⅔ cup Brown Sugar
2 cups Grated Zucchini
3 cups Whole Wheat Flour
1 Tablespoon Cinnamon
1-½ teaspoon Baking Powder
1 teaspoon Baking Soda
1 teaspoon Salt
½ cups Raisins
½ cups Chopped Walnuts
description: A healthy zucchini bread, using whole wheat flour, a minimal amount of oil, and brown sugar. Very easy to make—I do the measuring and my pre-schooler does the mixing! Makes 2 loaves.

name: Zucchini Bread
ingredients:
3 whole Eggs, Beaten To A Foam
1 cup Vegetable Oil
2 cups Sugar
2 cups Zucchini (peeled And Grated)
2 teaspoons Vanilla Extract
3 cups Flour
1 teaspoon Salt
1 teaspoon Baking Soda
1 Tablespoon Cinnamon
¼ teaspoons Baking Powder
description: My grandmother always had a loaf of this in her kitchen to share with any last minute or unexpected guests, and it’s the only “sweet” bread my savory taste buds still crave all these years later. Not to mention it’s the easiest loaf I’ve ever made!

name: Zucchini Bread
ingredients:
2 cups Sugar
3 whole Eggs
1 cup Vegetable Oil
1 teaspoon Vanilla
3 cups Flour
1 teaspoon Salt
3 teaspoons Cinnamon
1 teaspoon Baking Soda
¼ teaspoons Baking Powder
2 cups Grated Zucchini
½ cups Walnuts
description: This bread is so yummy, especially right out of the oven with butter. It will make your house smell amazing!

name: Zucchini Bread
ingredients:
3 cups Flour
1 teaspoon Salt
1 teaspoon Baking Soda
1 teaspoon Baking Powder
3 teaspoons Cinnamon
3 whole Eggs
1 cup Vegetable Oil
3 teaspoons Vanilla Extract
2-¼ cups Sugar
2 cups Shredded Zucchini
1 cup Chopped Nuts (optional)
description: Moist, dense and delicious.

name: Zucchini Bread
ingredients:
3 whole Eggs
2 cups Sugar
1 cup Wesson Oil (vegetable Oil)
1 Tablespoon Vanilla
2 cups Loosely Packed Grated Zucchini (do Not Peel)
2 cups Flour
1 Tablespoon Cinnamon
2 teaspoons Baking Powder
1 teaspoon Salt
½ cups Chopped Walnuts
description: This is a recipe handed down from my great grandmother. It’s moist, easy to make and just really darn good! I make batches, wrap up loaves in pretty colored Saran wrap and a bow and hand them out as gifts. Everyone loves it!

name: Zucchini Bread
ingredients:
3 whole Eggs
1 cup Brown Sugar
1 cup White Sugar
1 cup Vegetable Oil
2 teaspoons Vanilla
2 cups Zucchini (peeled And Grated)
3 cups Flour
1 teaspoon Salt
1 teaspoon Baking Soda
2 teaspoons Pumpkin Pie Spice
½ teaspoons Baking Powder
½ cups Chopped Walnuts
description: My Aunt Jannie gave me this recipe at my bridal shower back in 1987! I have made it MANY times and it ALWAYS gets compliments. It is SO easy and QUICK!

name: Zucchini Boats  (Hamburger)
ingredients:
1 whole Zucchini
2 teaspoons Olive Oil
½ cups Salt And Pepper, to taste
⅛ cups __
1-½ Tablespoon Hamburger
1 Tablespoon Diced Onion
1 whole Bread Crumbs (I Use Italian Seasoned)
¼ teaspoons Milk
1 dash Egg Yolk
¼ cups Salt
⅛ cups Black Pepper
description: Zucchini stuffed with hamburger and marinara sauce.  Topped with Parmesan cheese.  A must-make recipe for anyone with zucchini plants in their garden.

name: Zucchini Blueberry Bread Cake with Lemon Glaze
ingredients:
3-¼ cups FOR THE BATTER:
2 teaspoons Flour
½ teaspoons Cinnamon
½ teaspoons Nutmeg
1-¼ teaspoon Baking Powder
1 teaspoon Baking Soda
1 whole Salt
2 cups Lemon, Zested
2  Sugar
½ cups Eggs, Beaten
½ cups Vegetable Oil
3 cups Applesauce (unsweetened)
1 pint Zucchini, Shredded
1-½ cup Fresh Blueberries
4 Tablespoons FOR THE GLAZE:
1 Tablespoon Powdered Sugar
description: The best of both worlds. A bread and a cake with fresh, seasonal ingredients.

name: Zucchini Blossom Fritters
ingredients:
8 whole Squash Blossoms
1 clove Garlic, Sliced
1 Tablespoon Olive Oil
1 Tablespoon Chopped Fresh Basil Leaves, Plus More For Optional Garnish
3 Tablespoons Freshly Grated Parmesan Cheese
1 whole Egg
½ cups Milk
1 cup Flour
1 teaspoon Baking Powder
½ teaspoons Kosher Salt
description: Zucchini blossoms are the edible flowers that grow from a zucchini plant. In this family recipe, the flowers are lightly sauteed in garlic, then chopped and used as the base for a fritter batter, along with fresh basil and Parmesan cheese. They’re delicious!

name: Zucchini Bars
ingredients:
5 cups FOR THE ZUCCHINI FILLING:
½ cups Zucchini, Peeled, Seeded And Thinly Sliced
1 teaspoon Fresh Lemon Juice
¾ cups Nutmeg
1 teaspoon Sugar
4 cups Cinnamon
1 teaspoon FOR THE CRUST:
1-½ cup All-purpose Flour
1-½ cup Cinnamon, Plus More To Sprinkle On Top
description: I got this recipe from a friend in Oregon. She is the bomb! I dare you to try it.

name: Zucchini Banana Bread with Chocolate Chips
ingredients:
3  Eggs
⅔ cups Brown Sugar
⅔ cups Granulated Sugar
¾ cups Vegetable Oil
2 teaspoons Vanilla Extract
2 cups Grated Zucchini (for 2 Cups You'll Need About 2 Medium)
2  Ripe Bananas, Peeled And Mashed
3-½ cups Whole Wheat Flour
1 teaspoon Ground Cinnamon
1-½ teaspoon Baking Powder
1 teaspoon Baking Soda
1 teaspoon Salt
1 cup Chocolate Chips
description: This recipe is great for using overripe bananas and leftover summer zucchini. The little flecks of green might seem strange at first but after one bite of this, you’ll want to gobble it up!

name: Zucchini Bake
ingredients:
1 Tablespoon Olive Oil
1 Tablespoon Butter
1  Onion
6 whole Zucchinis, Sliced Into Bite-sized Rounds
1 teaspoon Salt
1 teaspoon Pepper
1 Tablespoon Flour
¾ cups Light Half-and-Half
¼ cups Light Buttermilk
¾ cups Shredded Sharp Cheddar Cheese
¾ cups Breadcrumbs
1 Tablespoon Butter
description: Sauteed zucchini and onions topped with a cheesy breadcrumb.

name: Zucchini Bake
ingredients:
2 pounds Zucchini, Ends Trimmed Off Then Grated
½ teaspoons Kosher Salt
1 Tablespoon Olive Oil
1 whole Large Onion, Diced
2 cloves Fresh Garlic, Minced
2 Tablespoons Chopped Fresh Parsley Or 1 Tablespoon Dried
1 teaspoon Dried Basil
½ teaspoons Black Pepper
2 whole Eggs, Beaten
⅓ cups Grated Parmesan Cheese
description: This is a delicious side dish that can be enjoyed hot or cold.  Enjoy as a vegetarian main dish as well.

name: Zucchini Bake
ingredients:
3 cups Diced Zucchini (about 4 Small)
2 cups Club Cracker Crumbs
2 Tablespoons Butter
3 whole Eggs
1 whole Onion, Small, Finely Chopped
½ cups Milk
1 cup Shredded Cheddar Cheese, Divided Use
½ teaspoons Salt
½ teaspoons Pepper
¼ cups Grated Parmesan Cheese
description: This is a yummy side dish or even a nice dish for a brunch!  Also a great way to get some veggies in for your kids!!

name: Zucchini Au Gratin
ingredients:
3 whole Medium To Large Zucchini
1 whole Vidalia Or Other Sweet Onion
1 cup Cheese (Mozzarella, Cheddar, Or Colby)
½ cups Bread Crumbs (Gluten Free Or Regular)
description: This is my favorite zucchini recipe! I can’t wait until the squash are ready in my garden each year so that I can make this yummy dish. It’s so very simple, yet so very delicious!

name: Zucchini, Asparagus, and Carrot Ribbon Salad
ingredients:
3  Carrots, Peeled
2  Zucchini
6  Asparagus Spears
½ cups Olive Oil
¼ cups Tarragon Wine Vinegar
1 whole Lemon, Juiced
1 clove Garlic, Chopped
1 pinch Salt
description: A fresh summer salad made with ribbons of zucchini, asparagus, and carrots.

name: Concord Grape Pie
ingredients:
¾ cups FOR THE CRUST:
⅓ cups Butter Or Margarine, Softened
1-⅔ cup Icing Sugar
4 cups Flour
½ cups FOR THE FILLING:
¼ cups Seedless Concord Grapes (washed And Stems Removed)
1 Tablespoon Sugar
¼ teaspoons Flour
description: I’ve seen other recipes where you have to slip the grapes out of the skins before adding them into the pie filling. Too much hassle for me. Not only is the assembly of this pie easy, the crust is really simple too. This pie uses seedless Concord grapes (and they must be seedless), but you leave them whole. People often think it’s a blueberry pie instead of grape!

name: Peanut Butter Roll
ingredients:
1 pound Powdered Sugar Plus Extra For Sprinkling
1 container (12 To 14 Oz. Size) Whipped Vanilla Frosting (must Be The Whipped Type)
3 Tablespoons Peanut Butter (just Enough To Spread Over Candy)
description: This is a quick and simple 3-ingredient recipe. A delicious sugary, peanut butter candy that requires no cooking or baking!

name: Refrigerator Pickles
ingredients:
10  Pickling (Kirby) Cucumbers, Ends Cut Off And Discarded (Leave Them Whole, Slice Into Spears, Or Cut Into Thin Coins, As Desired)
2 Tablespoons Dill Seeds
1 Tablespoon Whole Black Peppercorns
3 cloves Garlic (peeled But Still Whole)
½ cups Whole Peppers, Red Pepper Flakes, Coriander Seeds, The Possibilities Are Endless
¼ cups Distilled White Vinegar
1 Tablespoon Filtered Water
description: Homemade pickles are so easy to make and they taste so much better than store-bought. Plus you can make ‘em like you like ‘em.

name: (Better Than Starbucks) Eggnog Latte
ingredients:
⅓ cups Milk
⅔ cups Eggnog
2 Tablespoons Granulated Sugar
½ cups Freshly Brewed Unflavored Coffee At Double Concentration (or 2 Shots Espresso)
1 pinch Nutmeg, For Topping
description: A tasty (better than Starbucks) Eggnog Latte recipe.  It’s so easy to make a latte at home without using an espresso machine!

name: Chocolate Devil’s Fire Cupcakes
ingredients:
¾ cups FOR THE CUPCAKES:
1-⅔ cup Unsalted Butter,  Room Temperature
3  Granulated Sugar
1 teaspoon Eggs, Room Temperature
2 cups Pure Vanilla Extract
⅔ cups All-purpose Flour
1 teaspoon Cocoa Powder
1-¼ teaspoon Instant Espresso Granules
¼ teaspoons Baking Soda
1 teaspoon Baking Powder
1-⅓ cup Salt
½ cups Water
1 cup 5 To 6 Fresh Minced Habanero Chilies, Stems And Seeds Removed
description: Tasty, spicy fare comes under the guise of these chocolate cupcakes. Iced in chocolate ganache and decorated with royal icing flames, the exterior is a sure-fire indication of the heat exchange inside!

name: Apple Fries Fritter-Style
ingredients:
1 whole Large Apple, Peeled, Cored And Cut Into Your Preferred French Fry Thickness
1 Tablespoon Flour
1 teaspoon Cinnamon Plus, 1/2 Teaspoon
1 teaspoon Sugar
1 cup Complete Pancake Mix (such As Bisquik Or Aunt Jemima)
1 cup Water, Plus More For Thinning If Necessary
½ cups Powdered Sugar
3 teaspoons Milk
description: If you have extra apples to use up, give this recipe a go! They are warm, crisp and sweet. A perfect fall treat.

name: Zucchini Apple Muffins with Granola Topping
ingredients:
1 cup All-purpose Flour
½ cups Rolled Oats
1 teaspoon Ground Cinnamon
½ teaspoons Baking Soda
¼ teaspoons Salt
¼ teaspoons Baking Powder
⅛ teaspoons Nutmeg
1 whole Egg, Beaten
¾ cups Sugar
1 cup Zucchini, Finely Shredded
½ cups Apple (I Used Gala), Finely Shredded
¼ cups Cooking Oil
1 teaspoon Vanilla Extract
½ cups Walnuts Or Pecans, Optional
½ cups Granola (mine Had Almonds And I Added Dried Cranberries)
description: I wanted to make something with oatmeal that my kids would eat so I doctored up my zucchini bread recipe.

name: Zucchini Apple Muffins
ingredients:
1 cup Whole Wheat Flour
1 cup All-purpose Flour
1 teaspoon Cinnamon
¼ teaspoons Nutmeg
1-½ teaspoon Baking Soda
⅛ teaspoons Salt
1 whole Large Egg
1 whole Egg White
1 teaspoon Vanilla
⅓ cups Granulated Sugar
¼ cups Honey
2 cups Grated Zucchini
3 Tablespoons Canola Oil
⅓ cups Unsweetened Applesauce
1 whole Apple, Peeled And Grated
1 whole Apple, Peeled And Diced
½ cups Walnuts Or Pecans, Chopped (optional)
description: Zucchini Apple Muffins.

name: Zucchini Apple Bread
ingredients:
½ cups Canola Oil Or Melted Butter
¾ cups Sugar
2 whole Eggs
1 teaspoon Vanilla
1 cup Zucchini, Shredded
½ cups Homemade Apple Pie Filling Or Chopped Apple
1-½ cup All-purpose Flour
¾ teaspoons Baking Soda
¼ teaspoons Baking Powder
½ teaspoons Cinnamon
¼ teaspoons Ground Cloves
¼ teaspoons Nutmeg
½ teaspoons Salt
½ cups Chopped Nuts (optional)
description: A little twist to the usual zucchini bread. If you love making and canning apple pie filling or apple rings, this is another way of using your own homemade goodies.

name: Zucchini Appetizer
ingredients:
3 cups Grated Zucchini
4 whole Eggs
1 cup Bisquick
½ cups Oil
½ cups Diced Onion
½ cups Parmesan Cheese
2 Tablespoons Parsley
½ teaspoons Seasoning Salt
½ teaspoons Oregano
½ teaspoons Garlic Salt
description: Quick and a hit wherever it is served!

name: Zucchini and Yam Fritters
ingredients:
2 cups Shredded Zucchini
2 cups Shredded Yams (peeled First)
1 cup Shredded Cheddar Cheese
2 whole Eggs
¼ cups Breadcrumbs
¼ teaspoons Salt
¼ teaspoons Ground Black Pepper
¼ teaspoons Garlic Powder
¼ teaspoons Mrs Dash Original Blend
description: These veggie and cheese fritters make perfect toddler finger food, and you’ll enjoy them, too.

name: Zucchini and White Bean Dip
ingredients:
1 can (15 Oz. Size) Cannelli Beans
1 cup Zucchini, Grated
½ teaspoons Fresh Rosemary, Chopped
1 teaspoon Lemon Zest
½ teaspoons Red Pepper Flakes
1 pinch Sea Salt
description: Spread on slices of fresh baguette, this zucchini and white bean dip makes a perfect, simple appetizer.

name: Zucchini and Tomato Tian
ingredients:
2 whole Onions
½ Tablespoons Extra Virgin Olive Oil
2 cloves Garlic, Minced
3 whole Medium Zucchini
3 whole Tomatoes
description: Wondering what to do with all of those zucchinis and red-ripe tomatoes from your garden? This is a quick and delicious side.

name: Zucchini and Tomato Gratin
ingredients:
¼ cups Panko Bread Crumbs
1 Tablespoon Extra Virgin Olive Oil, Plus 1 Teaspoon, Divided Use
1-¼ teaspoon Fresh Rosemary Or Thyme, Finely Chopped, Divided Use
2 whole Salt And Pepper, to taste
1 whole Small Zucchinis Cut Into Rounds, About 1/8 Inch Thick
¼ cups Medium Sized Ripe Tomato, Sliced
description: Simple and scrumptious, this zucchini and tomato gratin is a sure way to get them to eat their veggies!

name: Zucchini and Tomato Bake
ingredients:
2 whole Medium-sized Zucchini, Sliced To 1/4-inch Thickness
5 whole Tomatoes, Slized To 1/4-inch Thickness
2-½ cups Kosher Salt To Taste
1 cup Black Pepper To Taste
2 cloves Shredded Monterey Jack Cheese, Divided
1 teaspoon Plain Breadcrumbs
3 Tablespoons Garlic, Minced
description: Layers of zucchini and tomatoes topped with a garlicky breacrumb mixture and cheese.

name: Grape Salad
ingredients:
8 ounces, fluid Cream Cheese, Softened
8 ounces, fluid Sour Cream
1 teaspoon Vanilla Extract
⅓ cups Granulated Sugar
10 cups Red and/or Green Grapes
½ cups Packed Brown Sugar
½ cups Finely Chopped Nuts (if Desired)
description: A nice easy grape salad.

name: Spicy Roasted Chicken Legs
ingredients:
24 whole Chicken Legs
2 sticks Butter
1 Tablespoon Hot Salt (or You Favorite Seasonings)
½ cups Lemon Juice (or To Taste)
description: One of my favorite things to cook up in big batches are these spicy, roasted chicken legs, which I coat in a mixture of butter, lemon juice, and seasonings, then roast in the oven. They’re great hot, they’re great cold, and they’re nice and portable, which can come in handy when people around you often have to grab something to eat when they’re headed out the door.

name: Quesadillas
ingredients:
2 whole Red Onions
1 whole To 2 Whole Green And Red Bell Peppers
3 whole Zucchini
10 whole White Mushrooms
1 dash Red Wine
5 Tablespoons Or More Of Butter
2 cups (more Or Less) Shredded Monterey Jack Cheese
1 package Flour Tortillas
description: I love to whip up a bunch of different quesadilla ingredients, then let everyone construct their own unique quesadilla. And while chicken, beef, or shrimp are all delicious in quesadillas, simple cheese and veggie quesadillas are just so dadgum delicious.

name: Family Secret Potato Salad
ingredients:
5 pounds Russet Potatoes, Peeled Cubed And Boiled
8 whole Hard Boiled Eggs, Chopped
8 ounces, weight Dill Relish
4-¼ ounces, weight Chopped Black Olives
1 whole Medium Red Onion, Diced
1 cup Mayonnaise, Plus More If Wanted
1 Tablespoon Yellow Mustard
8 ounces, weight Sour Cream
description: This potato salad is somewhat of a family secret. At least I am convinced it MUST be my family secret because I always get talked or conned into making it. Just me … So, now I’m spreading it to the masses so everyone can enjoy some of my homemade family secret potato salad.

name: Butter Syrup
ingredients:
1 cup Butter
1 cup Granulated White Sugar, Turbinado, Or Brown Sugar
1 can Evaporated Milk
description: Delicious syrup perfect for pouring over pancakes, waffles and french toast.

name: Ginger Chocolate Cookies
ingredients:
1 cup Butter Or Margarine
½ cups Brown Sugar
½ cups Granulated Sugar
1 teaspoon Pure Vanilla Extract
1 Tablespoon Molasses
¼ cups Natural Applesauce
2-½ cups All Purpose White Flour
1 teaspoon Salt
1 teaspoon Baking Soda
½ cups Crystallized Ginger (chopped Up Small)
1 cup Chocolate Chips
description: Spicy and sweet, these are a great summer cookie. You’ll need to give some to the neighbors to avoid eating them all yourself. So therefore, they also build community.

name: Veselka-Style Ukrainian Borscht
ingredients:
3 whole Medium To Large Beets
1 teaspoon Butter
1 teaspoon Vegetable Oil
½ pounds Beef Stew Meat In 1/2 Inch Cubes
1 clove Garlic, Minced
1 whole Large Onion, Coarsely Chopped
3 stalks Celery, Coarsely Chopped
3 whole Medium Carrots, Coarsely Chopped
4 cups Beef Stock
2 cups Water
1 cup Canned Diced Tomato And Liquid
½ heads Cabbage (small)
1 can Large Lima Beans/Butter Beans (15 Oz), Rinsed And Drained
⅓ cups White Vinegar, Or To Taste
2 teaspoons Salt, Or To Taste
1 teaspoon Freshly Ground Black Pepper, To Taste
½ teaspoons Worcestershire Sauce, Or To Taste
description: This is a savory, meaty, hot borscht with lima beans.

name: Strawberry Rhubarb Pie
ingredients:
3 cups All-purpose Flour
2-½ teaspoons White Sugar
1 teaspoon Salt, Divided
⅔ cups Shortening, Chilled
1-¼ stick Unsalted Butter, Chilled
3 cups Ice Water
3 cups Rhubarb, In 1/2" Slices
½ cups Strawberries, Hulled And Halved
½ cups White Sugar
¼ cups Light Brown Sugar
1 teaspoon Cornstarch
description: A beautiful way to present the rhubarb and strawberries of spring, this pie balances sweetness, tartness, and spice.

name: Taco Soup
ingredients:
1 pound Ground Beef
1 whole Medium/small Onion
2 cans Pinto Or Ranch Style Beans (Ranch Style Recommended - If You Have Them In Your Part Of The Country)
1 can Corn Or Hominy
2 cans Ro-Tel Tomatoes
1 package Dry Taco Seasoning
1 package Dry Ranch Dressing Mix
description: The easiest, hearty soup you’ll ever make, that will leave you wondering how something soooo easy could really taste that good!

name: Chocolate Peanut Butter Banana Granola
ingredients:
¼ cups Brown Sugar (lightly Packed)
4 cups Rolled Oats
1 cup Coconut Chips (or Flaked Coconut)
1 cup Pecans, Roughly Chopped
¼ cups Unsweetened Cocoa Powder
¼ cups Mashed Banana
3 Tablespoons Canola Oil (I've Also Used Coconut Oil)
3 Tablespoons Maple Syrup
½ teaspoons Salt
½ cups Peanut Butter Chips
description: Healthy chocolate peanut butter banana granola. Utterly delicious. I could not stop eating it!

name: Chicken Pot Pie Turnovers
ingredients:
2 Tablespoons Butter
½ whole Onion, Chopped
1 whole Carrot, Chopped
1 stalk Celery, Chopped
2 cloves Kosher Salt And Freshly Ground Pepper
2 teaspoons Garlic, Minced
1 Tablespoon Dried Thyme
½ cups Flour
1 cup White Wine
1 teaspoon Chicken Stock
2 Tablespoons Dijon Mustard
½ cups Parmesan Cheese
2 cups Frozen Peas
2 whole Cubed Or Shredded Cooked Chicken
description: Portable pot pies!

name: Mac and Mushrooms in Lager Cheese Sauce
ingredients:
3 cups Shell Pasta (the Larger Shells)
2 Tablespoons Olive Oil
2 cups Cremini Or Baby Bella Mushrooms, Sliced
1 Tablespoon Sea Salt And Ground Black Pepper To Taste
1 Tablespoon Butter (heaping Tablespoon)
1 cup All-purpose Flour
8 ounces, weight Milk
8 ounces, weight Smoked Gouda, Grated
⅓ cups Creamy Havarti, Grated
description: I thought my mac and cheese couldn’t get any better…and then I added beer.

name: Classic Meatloaf
ingredients:
1-½ pound FOR THE MEATLOAF:
1  Ground Beef
1  Egg
1 cup Onion, Chopped
1 cup Milk
⅓ cups Italian Bread Crumbs
2 Tablespoons Sea Salt And Ground Black Pepper To Taste
2 Tablespoons Butter, For Greasing Pan
description: Comfort food is widely recognized as a meal that takes us back to our youth; back when we were cared for and had no concerns whatsoever. Though, I’m pretty sure as kids we all moaned and groaned when we learned that the family was having meatloaf for dinner. I know I did, albeit I’m not sure why. Sure, meatloaf isn’t exactly pretty, but it tastes good!

name: Cream Puffs with Pumpkin Spice Whipped Cream
ingredients:
1 stick FOR THE PASTRY:
1 cup Unsalted Butter
½ teaspoons Water
1 teaspoon Salt
1 cup Sugar
4 whole All-purpose Flour
1 cup Eggs
¼ cups FOR THE WHIPPED CREAM:
1 teaspoon Cold Heavy Cream
2 Tablespoons Powdered Sugar
1 pinch Vanilla Extract
1 pinch Canned Pumpkin Puree
description: Flaky pastry filled with pumpkin-spiced whipped cream!

name: Caramel Apple-Pecan Streusel Pie
ingredients:
1-¼ cup FOR THE CRUST:
½ teaspoons All-purpose Flour
2 Tablespoons Salt
⅓ cups Granulated Sugar
4 Tablespoons Unsalted Butter, melted
6 Tablespoons Ice Water
1 cup FOR THE CARAMEL SAUCE:
⅓ cups Unsalted Butter
1 teaspoon Packed Light Brown Sugar
7 cups Evaporated Milk
1 teaspoon Vanilla Extract
¾ cups FOR THE FILLING:
½ cups Tart Baking Apples, Peeled, Cored, And Sliced Thin (for 7 Cups You'll Need About 4 Medium Apples)
3 teaspoons Lemon Juice
1 Tablespoon Chopped Pecans
¼ cups Packed Light Brown Sugar
2 Tablespoons Ground Cinnamon
¾ cups Cornstarch
⅔ cups Caramel Sauce
¼ cups Unsalted Butter, melted
6 Tablespoons FOR THE TOPPING:
¼ cups All-purpose Flour
description: A spin on the classic apple pie with gooey caramel, cinnamon apples and crunchy pecans.

name: Butternut Squash Penne with Pistachio Pesto
ingredients:
6 cups FOR THE PASTA:
2 Tablespoons Butternut Squash, Diced Into About1/2 Inch Cubes (1 Small Squash)
1 teaspoon Olive Oil
½ teaspoons Fresh Rosemary, Thyme, Or Sage, Finely Chopped
¼ teaspoons Dried Italian Seasoning Or Herbes De Provence
12 ounces, weight Pepper
1 cup Salt To Taste
⅔ cups Penne Pasta
⅓ cups Reserved Pasta  Cooking Water
⅓ cups FOR THE PISTACHIO PESTO:
¼ cups Roasted Unsalted Pistachios, Shelled And The Skins Removed
½ cloves Hulled Hemp Seeds
2 Tablespoons Grated Parmesan Cheese
⅛ teaspoons Extra Virgin Olive Oil
1 pinch (Small) Garlic, Minced
description: This pasta is not only delicious and sure to be a family favorite, but it’s also so packed with nutrients that you’ll feel as if you have the power to save the world!

name: Sweet Fruit Tarts
ingredients:
2 sticks Softened Butter (1 Cups)
1-½ cup Powdered Sugar
1 teaspoon Vanilla Extract
2-½ cups All-purpose Flour
1 teaspoon Baking Soda
1 teaspoon Cream Of Tartar
description: Delicious sugar cookies coated with a cream cheese and sugar mixture, topped with fresh fruit, mini chocolate chips and drizzled with rich chocolate.

name: Dipped Gingersnaps
ingredients:
2 cups Granulated Sugar
1-½ cup Vegetable Oil
2 whole Large Eggs
½ cups Molasses
4 cups All-purpose Flour
1 teaspoon Ground Ginger
2 teaspoons Ground Cinnamon
4 teaspoons Baking Soda
1 teaspoon Salt
2 packages Granulated Sugar, For Rolling The Dough In
¼ cups Vanilla Chips (12 Ounce Packages)
description: Soft, chewy gingersnaps with the sweetness of white chocolate.

name: Cheeseburger Soup
ingredients:
1 Tablespoon Butter
¾ cups Diced Onion
¾ cups Carrots, Peeled And Diced
¾ cups Celery, Diced
¾ pounds Ground Beef
4 cups Cubed Potatoes
½ teaspoons Dried Crushed Basil
1 teaspoon Parsley, Dried
4 cups Beef Broth
3 Tablespoons Butter
¼ cups All-purpose Flour
1-½ cup Milk
2 cups Shredded Cheddar Cheese
½ teaspoons Salt
½ teaspoons Black Pepper
¼ cups Sour Cream
description: A rich cheesy soup that your family will love.

name: Super Easy Cake Mix Cookies
ingredients:
1 box Yellow Cake Mix
1 teaspoon Baking Powder
2 whole Eggs
½ cups Vegetable Oil
1 cup Chocolate Chips
description: These are ridiculously easy and a hit everywhere. The greatest thing is the recipe’s flexibility – change out the cake mix, add in any tasty morsels you want, and they still come out great!

name: Easy Breakfast Muffins
ingredients:
2 cups FOR THE MUFFIN BASE:
1 cup All-purpose Flour
1 Tablespoon Granulated Sugar
1 teaspoon Baking Powder
1 whole Salt
½ cups Egg
1 cup Canola Oil
2 teaspoons Milk
1-½ cup Vanilla Extract
description: Very quick, very easy and very good.

name: S’more Cupcakes
ingredients:
½ cups Butter, Softened
1 cup Granulated Sugar
3 whole Eggs
1 cup All-purpose Flour
1-½ cup Graham Cracker Crumbs, Finely Crushed
1 teaspoon Baking Powder
1 teaspoon Baking Soda
¼ teaspoons Salt
1 cup Milk
1 bag Mini Milk Chocolate Chips (12 Oz Bag)
1-¾ cup Granulated Sugar
⅛ teaspoons Salt
½ cups Water
3 whole Egg Whites
12 whole Marshmallows Cut Up
description: Bring out the (camp)fire in your loved one with a graham cracker cupcake studded with mini chocolate chips and topped with a toasted marshmallow frosting.  Roughing it was never so easy or fattening.

name: Lavender Mascarpone Mini Cheesecakes
ingredients:
12 whole FOR THE CRUST:
2 Tablespoons Ginger Snap Cookies
¼ teaspoons Dark Brown Sugar
¼ teaspoons Cinnamon
2 Tablespoons Nutmeg
½ pounds Butter, Melted
¼ cups FOR THE CHEESECAKE:
⅓ cups Cream Cheese, At Room Temperature
1 Tablespoon Mascarpone Cheese
1 teaspoon Granulated Sugar
½ teaspoons Lavender Vanilla Bean Sugar (found In Spice Shops)
¼ teaspoons Lavender Extract
¼ teaspoons Ground Lavender
¼ teaspoons Salt
1 whole Cinnamon
1  Nutmeg
1 Tablespoon Egg
description: These lavender mascarpone mini cheesecakes are such an elegant dessert. A floral, rich cheesecake filling on a gorgeous spiced gingersnap crust!

name: Zucchini and Thyme
ingredients:
2 Tablespoons Olive Oil
1 Tablespoon Unsalted Butter
¼ cups Diced Onion
¼ cups Chopped Parsley
1 pound Fresh Zucchini, Cut Into 3-by-1/2-inch Sticks
1 teaspoon Better Than Bouillon, Beef Flavored
1 teaspoon Dried Thyme
description: A great side dish for this summer vegetable. Enjoy!

name: Zucchini and Summer Squash with Parmesan
ingredients:
1 whole Zucchini
½ whole Yellow Onion
1 whole Summer Squash
1 Tablespoon Olive Oil
1 pinch Salt
1 pinch Pepper
1 pinch Red Pepper Flakes
¼ cups Freshly Grated Parmesan Cheese
description: A super simple side dish.

name: Zucchini and Summer Squash with Ginger and Garlic
ingredients:
3 Tablespoons Olive Oil, Or Enough To Lightly Coat Bottom Of Pan
½ whole Red Onion, Sliced Thin
2 Tablespoons Ginger, Grated Or To Taste
3 cloves Garlic, Minced
4 whole Medium Zucchini Chopped
4 whole Summer Squash, Chopped
1 whole Red Or Orange Bell Pepper, Chopped Into Strips
½ teaspoons Salt To Taste
1 teaspoon Pepper To Taste
1 teaspoon Dried Thyme
description: A tasty blend of zucchini, summer squash, ginger and garlic. A true staple this time of year in our house and a great way to use the abundance of zucchini from the garden. Also great to marinate together and grill.

name: Zucchini and Summer Squash Ribbons on Pasta with Creamy Goat Cheese Sauce
ingredients:
6 slices Pancetta
2 Tablespoons Olive Oil
8 ounces, weight Dry Spaghetti Or Linguine
2 cups Zucchini Ribbons (for 2 Cups You'll Need 3-4 Zucchini)
1 pinch Salt And Pepper
1 clove Garlic, Peeled And Finely Chopped
2 teaspoons Chopped Fresh Thyme
1 teaspoon Chopped Fresh Oregano
½ cups White Wine
5 ounces, weight Goat Cheese
¼ cups 35% Cream
½ cups (approximately) Reserved Pasta Cooking Water
description: Zucchini ribbons on pasta with a creamy goat cheese sauce. Perfect for when you have an excess of zucchini and summer squash.

name: Zucchini and Squash Ribbon Salad
ingredients:
1 whole Zucchini
1 whole Summer Squash
2 whole Green Onions
½ cups Crumbled Or Cubed Feta Cheese
½ cups Golden Raisins
description: At first I was a little hesitant to use something other than lettuce as a base for my salad, but I found this to be a wonderfully crisp and delicious summer salad. And a great way to eat zucchini and summer squash fresh.

name: Zucchini and Sausage Brunch Cupcakes
ingredients:
2 cups Grated Zucchini
1 cup Cubed Smoked Sausage
1 whole Grated Sweet Onion
1 cup All-purpose Flour
½ cups Grated Parmesan Cheese
½ cups Grated Gouda Cheese
3 whole Eggs
¼ cups Vegetable Oil
1 Tablespoon Chopped Fresh Parsley
1 Tablespoon Fresh Dill
1 teaspoon Baking Power
1 teaspoon Kosher Salt
½ teaspoons Ground Pepper
description: Quick, easy and delicious, these little cakes make a perfect breakfast or brunch treat!

name: Zucchini and Quinoa Muffins
ingredients:
2 whole Small Zucchini (peeled And Shredded)
1 cup Cooked Quinoa (drained)
¾ cups All-purpose Flour
¼ teaspoons Baking Powder
2 whole Large Eggs, Beaten
3 Tablespoons Sweet Cream Butter, Melted
¼ teaspoons Onion Powder
¼ teaspoons Salt
½ teaspoons Black Pepper
¼ cups Grated Parmesan Or Pecorino Cheese (for Garnishing Top Of Muffins)
description: These are super flavorful savory muffins that are easy to make and enjoyed by the entire family!

name: Zucchini and Potato Gratin
ingredients:
1 whole Zucchini, Thinly Sliced
½ pounds Yukon Gold Potatoes, Washed And Thinly Sliced
2 teaspoons Salt
1 teaspoon Pepper
¾ cups Kerrygold Dubliner Cheese Or Aged Gruyere
1 teaspoon Thyme
1 cup Milk
description: Zucchini is the perfect blank slate for summer—you can put it in almost any recipe and it will turn out fabulous. Tender zucchini layered with creamy yukon gold potatoes, baked with milk and cheese until soft in the middle and crispy on the top? Not a bad idea at all.

name: Meringue-Topped Chocolate Fudge Cake with Salted Caramel Sauce
ingredients:
¼ cups FOR THE CAKE:
2  Vegetable Oil
1 teaspoon Large Eggs
¾ cups Vanilla Extract
¾ cups White Sugar
1-¾ cup Light Brown Sugar
¼ cups All-purpose Flour
1 teaspoon Cocoa Powder
½ teaspoons Baking Powder
1 pinch Baking Soda
3 ounces, weight Salt
1 cup Dark Chocolate, Melted And Slightly Cooled
3  Sour Cream
1 cup Homemade Or Shop Bought Salted Caramel Sauce
3 Tablespoons FOR THE MERINGUE:
1 pinch Large Egg Whites
description: This is no ordinary chocolate fudge cake. It’s a showstopper! A rich, soft cake is perfectly complemented by sweet, glossy peaks of meringue and drizzled with gooey salted caramel sauce.

name: Sweet Potato & Pumpkin Soup
ingredients:
2 Tablespoons Butter
2  Onions, Chopped
2 cloves Garlic, Pressed
36 grams Fresh Ginger, Grated
2  Large Sweet Potatoes, Peeled, Cut Into Pieces
360 grams Pumpkin, Peeled And Cut Into Pieces
1 dash Vermouth
½ liters Chicken Or Vegetable Stock
5 Tablespoons Cream
description: A hint of curry and a spicy chorizo garnish take this soup to the next level.

name: Margarita Chicken
ingredients:
8 whole FOR THE MARINADE:
16 ounces, fluid Chicken Drumsticks
4 cloves Bud Light Lime-A-Rita
¼ cups Garlic, Minced
2 whole Cilantro, Chopped
1 whole Limes, Juiced
1 teaspoon Jalapeno, Chopped
1 teaspoon FOR THE CHICKEN:
1 teaspoon Pepper
1 teaspoon Salt
1 teaspoon Paprika
¼ cups Chili Powder
1 whole Garlic Powder
description: Moist drumsticks marinated in a Bud Light Lime-a-Rita, lime, jalapeno, cilantro and garlic. Throw them on the grill for a wonderful quick meal.

name: Weeknight Homemade Whole Wheat Pizza Crust
ingredients:
1-¼ cup Warm Water (100 To 110 F)
4-½ teaspoons Dry Active Yeast
3 Tablespoons Extra Virgin Olive Oil
1 Tablespoon Honey
2 cups White Whole Wheat Flour
