2 cups All Purpose Flour (plus Additional For Kneading)
3 Tablespoons Vital Wheat Gluten (optional—will Yield A Fluffier Dough)
1-½ teaspoon Kosher Salt
description: Never buy pre-made pizza dough again! This easy homemade whole wheat pizza crust is healthy and quick enough to make on a weeknight. It yields enough crust for two large pizzas and can be refrigerated for 3 days. With only one batch, you’ll have multiple dinners at the ready.

name: Bloody Mary Potatoes
ingredients:
1-½ pound FOR THE POTATOES:
1 Tablespoon Baby Potatoes, Quartered
½ teaspoons Extra Virgin Olive Oil
½ teaspoons Garlic Powder
½ teaspoons Onion Powder
¼ teaspoons Kosher Salt
2 teaspoons Ground Black Pepper
1 clove FOR THE REDUCTION:
2 Tablespoons Extra Virgin Olive Oil
2 cups Garlic, Minced
1 teaspoon Diced Onion
1-½ teaspoon V8 Juice
1 Tablespoon Cornstarch
¼ teaspoons Horseradish
¼ teaspoons Ketchup
1 Tablespoon Celery Seed
5 dashes Smoked Paprika
¼ cups Lemon Juice
description: Oven-roasted potatoes drizzled with a spicy Bloody Mary reduction.

name: Salted Caramel Sauce
ingredients:
2 cups Sugar
12 Tablespoons Butter, Cut Into 12 Slices (I Use Salted, But Unsalted Works Too)
1 cup Heavy Cream
1 Tablespoon Sea Salt
description: Learn to make your own salted caramel sauce to add to your favorite desserts or snacks. This sauce is super easy to make with only four simple ingredients you probably already have in your kitchen!

name: Pork and Apple Shish Kabobs
ingredients:
¼ cups FOR THE MARINADE:
2 Tablespoons Balsamic Vinegar
1 teaspoon Olive Oil
2 Tablespoons Dijon Mustard
1 pound Maple Syrup
1-½ whole FOR THE KABOBS:
1 whole Pork Loin, Cut Into 1" Pieces
description: Tender, juicy, grilled pork with apples and onions and topped with a sweet and savory maple syrup glaze.

name: Amazingly Simple Bean Dip
ingredients:
1-½ pound Ground Beef
1 pinch Onion Powder
1 can Refried Beans
1 can Chili, No Beans
1 pound Velveeta Cheese
1 jar Salsa (mild Or Medium As Preferred)
description: A yummy dip that is sure to become a party favorite. Very simple to make, and can be made on the stove top or in the crock pot for convenience.

name: Jalapeno Mexican Cornbread
ingredients:
1 cup Cornmeal
½ cups Flour
½ teaspoons Baking Soda
1 teaspoon Salt
2 whole Eggs
1 whole Jalapeno Peppper, Chopped, Not De-seeded
1 cup Milk
1 cup Grated Cheddar Cheese
½ cups Melted Butter
1 can Small Diced Green Chilies
1 can Cream Style Corn 14.75 Oz
description: This is my own delish creation, because none of the other jalapeno corn breads had just what I was looking for.  All of my friends beg for me to make this at get togethers.

name: Easiest Devonshire Cream Ever
ingredients:
1 package Cream Cheese 3 Ounce
1 Tablespoon White Sugar
1 pinch Salt
1 cup Heavy Cream
description: This is the best Devonshire cream ever.  Wonderful on scones.  Easy.

name: Easy Cherry Puff Pastry Tart
ingredients:
2 cups Cherries, Pitted
½ cups Granulated Sugar
½ cups Water
1 Tablespoon Cornstarch
1 Tablespoon Water
1 piece (6x10 Inch Size) Thawed Puff Pastry
1 whole Egg, Lightly Beaten
description: This tart is a quick weekday dessert you can easily put together. It could also be a weekend party food. It really looks and tastes more impressive than the amount of effort required to make it. Who doesn’t love puff pastry?

name: Roasted Pumpkin Seeds
ingredients:
1 whole Pumpkin, Seeds Only
1 Tablespoon Salt
description: Using a salt water bath to keep the seeds plump and salty while roasting makes these nice and crunchy.

name: Zucchini & Leek Fritters
ingredients:
6 cloves FOR THE FRITTERS:
2 whole Garlic, Skin On
1 whole Zucchini (medium Sized)
½ teaspoons Leek (small Sized)
1 whole Salt
½ cups Egg
3 Tablespoons Shredded Cheddar Cheese
½ cups Whole Wheat Flour
12 leaves FOR THE MINT YOGURT SAUCE:
½ teaspoons Plain Yogurt
¼ teaspoons Fresh Mint, Finely Chopped
description: Fritters made with zucchini and leeks. Drizzle minty yogurt sauce on top and we’re talking delicious appetizer!

name: Zucchini & Eggplant Sticks with Marinara Sauce
ingredients:
1 whole Zucchini
1 whole Eggplant
1 whole Egg White
½ cups Cracker Crumbs (I Used Vegetable Flavored Crackers)
½ cups Parmesan Cheese
1 teaspoon Paprika
½ cups Marinara Sauce
description: Baked, easy, delicious and healthy! Good as an appetizer, side dish, snack, or lunch.

name: Zucchini & Banana Bundt Cake
ingredients:
1 cup Zucchini, Shredded
1 cup Mashed Bananas
3 whole Eggs
1 cup Vegetable Oil
1-½ cup Sugar
2 cups All-purpose Flour
¼ teaspoons Baking Powder
1 teaspoon Baking Soda
1 Tablespoon Vanilla
½ cups Chopped Pecans
description: Zucchini & Banana Bundt cake. Moist and delicious, the best of both worlds! A great summer treat!

name: Zucchini Almond Bread
ingredients:
1 cup Greek Yogurt, Plain
½ cups Applesauce (unsweetened)
¾ cups Granulated Sugar Or 1 Cup NuNaturals Presweet Tagatose
3 whole Egg Whites
1 teaspoon Vanilla Extract
1 cup Zucchini, Grated, Squeezed, Drained ( Medium Zucchini)
1 cup Whole Wheat White Flour
½ cups All-purpose Flour
½ teaspoons Baking Powder
½ teaspoons Baking Soda
½ teaspoons Salt
½ teaspoons Cinnamon
½ teaspoons Nutmeg
½ cups Slivered Almonds
description: A sweet, moist, healthy quick bread made with yogurt, zucchini and almonds.

name: Lime Gelatin Sherbet
ingredients:
1 package (4-serving Size, 3 Oz. Box) Lime Gelatin (or Any Other Flavor)
1 cup Boiling Water
¾ cups Sugar
2 cups Milk
4 ounces, weight Cool Whip
description: You can make this any flavor you want!

name: Zucchini and Onion Lasagna
ingredients:
1 whole Zucchini
1 whole Sweet Onion
1 jar (1lb 10 Oz) Jar Ragu Traditional Spaghetti Sauce
3 cups Mozzarella Cheese
2 Tablespoons Oregano
1 cup Bread Crumbs
½ cups Grated Parmesan Cheese
4 Tablespoons Margarine
description: Layers of Zucchini and Onion with Mozzarella Cheese! This dish makes a perfect side or add a salad and enjoy as a meal!

name: Zucchini and Nutella Swirl Muffins
ingredients:
1-½ cup All-purpose Flour
½ teaspoons Salt
½ teaspoons Baking Soda
1 teaspoon Baking Powder
½ teaspoons Cinnamon
1 stick Unsalted Butter, Softened
¾ cups Sugar
1 whole Extra Large Egg
1 cup Shredded Zucchini
1 teaspoon Fresh Lemon Zest
½ cups Nutella
description: A light, moist and earthy muffin with a decadent chocolatey top! A great way to use up a garden full of zucchini.

name: Zucchini and Meatballs
ingredients:
2 pounds Ground Chuck
½ packages Saltines, Crushed
1 whole Egg
½ cups Tomato Sauce
2 cans Salt, Pepper, & Garlic Powder To Taste
2 whole Beef Consomme, Undiluted
2 whole Large Zucchini
¼ cups Onions, Chopped
¼ cups Butter Or Margarine
1 package Vegetable Oil
description: Baked meatballs and caramelized zucchini and onions served over egg noodles – a favorite way to use up all those club-sized zucchini from the garden. Real man food with zucchini!

name: Zucchini and Eggplant Chips
ingredients:
2  Japanese Eggplants
2  Zucchinis
¾ cups Cornstarch
¼ cups Flour
1 teaspoon Baking Powder
1-½ teaspoon Salt
½ teaspoons Black Pepper
½ teaspoons Garlic Powder
½ teaspoons Italian Seasoning
½ cups Water
1  Egg
1 cup Oil, For Frying
1 cup FOR THE GARLIC AIOLI:
¼ cups Mayonnaise
½ teaspoons Olive Oil With Roasted Garlic
½ teaspoons Pepper
1 Tablespoon Salt
description: Italian eggplant and zucchini chips with garlic aioli.

name: Zucchini and Corn with Basil
ingredients:
1 whole Leek
1 whole Zucchini
½ cups Basil, Fresh
2 Tablespoons Butter
1 cup Corn, Frozen
¼ cups Heavy Cream
1 whole Lemon
description: Tasty side dish or zucchini and corn with basil.

name: Zucchini and Cheese Stuffed Mushrooms
ingredients:
20 pieces Large Mushrooms
4 whole Medium Sized Zucchini, Shredded
1 carton Alouette Garlic And Herb Cheese (6.5 Ounce Carton)
¼ cups Parmesan Cheese, Shredded, 2-3 Tablespoons Reserved
3 drops Tabasco Or Other Hot Sauce, To Taste Really
1 Tablespoon Mayonnaise
¼ teaspoons Worcestershire Sauce
⅛ teaspoons Salt
1 dash Black Pepper
2 Tablespoons Bread Crumbs
description: Mushroom caps stuffed with a rich mix of Alouette cheese and shredded zucchini.  These are so good they’ll never think they’re vegetarian… Although I occasionally mix in a can of crab meat for a different twist.  So good!  I always get asked for the recipe.

name: Zucchini and Carrot Ribbon Pasta
ingredients:
7 ounces, weight Fettuccine
3 Tablespoons Olive Oil, Divided
1 Tablespoon Lemon Juice
1 teaspoon Lemon Zest
¼ cups Ricotta Cheese
¼ teaspoons Salt
¼ teaspoons Freshly Ground Pepper
3 whole Carrots, Peeled In Long Ribbons
2 whole Zucchini, Peeled In Long Ribbons
description: Ribbons of vegetables paired with pasta, creamy ricotta, and lemon! You won’t even notice you are eating vegetables!

name: Zucchini and Banana Muffins
ingredients:
1 cup FOR THE MUFFINS:
1 cup Zucchini, Grated
3 whole Mashed Ripe Bananas
1 cup Eggs
1 cup Vegatable Oil
2 cups Sugar
1 teaspoon Whole Wheat Flour
¼ teaspoons Baking Soda
2 teaspoons Baking Powder
2 teaspoons Ground Cinnamon
¼ cups Vanilla
½ cups FOR THE FROSTING:
3 cups Butter, Softened
description: Zucchini and Banana Muffins with cream cheese frosting. Delicous and moist, great way to use up your zucchini!

name: Zucchini and Banana Bundt Cake with Maple Cream Cheese Frosting
ingredients:
2 cups FOR THE CAKE:
½ teaspoons All-purpose Flour
1 teaspoon Baking Soda
½ teaspoons Baking Powder
2 teaspoons Salt
1 cup Ground Cinnamon
2 whole Sugar
1 cup Eggs
2 teaspoons Canola Oil
2 whole Pure Vanilla Extract
2 cups Ripe Bananas, Peeled And Mashed
4 ounces, weight Shredded Zucchini (for 2 Cups You'll Need About 1 Small Zucchini)
½ cups FOR THE FROSTING:
2 Tablespoons Cream Cheese, Softened
description: This is a moist, sweet and slightly spicy Bundt cake made with zucchini and bananas, then topped with a maple cream cheese frosting.

name: Zucchini & Squash Salad
ingredients:
2 bags Hearts Of Romaine Lettuce
2 whole Zucchinis, Chopped Into Slices Then Quarters
2 whole Yellow Squashes, Chopped Into Slices Then Quarters
1 tub Cherry Or Grape Tomatoes, Sliced
1 package Green Onion, Chopped
1 jar Tomato Basil Feta Cheese
description: This is a delicious salad for when you have all those extra zucchini and yellow squash laying around. Yum yum.

name: Swiss Chard and Onion
ingredients:
1 pound Swiss Chard Leaves And Stems
3 Tablespoons Butter
2 cups Onion, Sliced
2 cloves Garlic, Pressed
8 slices Cooked Bacon, Chopped
6 Tablespoons White Vinegar
description: Swiss chard pan fried with onions and bacon – yum!

name: Daddy’s Cheesecake
ingredients:
2 Tablespoons 15 Graham Crackers, Crumbed (Finely Crushed)
32 ounces, weight Butter, Melted
1-½ cup Cream Cheese (4 Packages Of 8 Ounces Each)
¾ cups White Sugar
4 whole Milk
1 cup Egg
1 Tablespoon Sour Cream
¼ cups Vanilla
description: My Dad loves cheesecake so much that I usually make this recipe for his birthday, instead of both birthday cake AND a birthday present!

name: Jenn
ingredients:
1 cup Chopped Pecans, Lightly Toasted
2 cups Grated Zucchini
3 cups All-Purpose Bread Flour
2 teaspoons Cinnamon, Ground
1 teaspoon Baking Soda
1 teaspoon Salt
½ teaspoons Baking Powder
½ teaspoons Nutmeg, Ground
1 teaspoon Ground Ginger
2 cups White Sugar
2 whole Eggs, Beaten
½ cups Canola Oil
description: A tasty way to use up summer’s bounty of zucchini!

name: Chorizo & Mushroom Pizza
ingredients:
1 whole Pizza Base/Crust (store Bought Is OK)
1 bag Tomato Paste
1 dash Olive Oil
2 whole Chorizo Sausages
2 whole Onions, Sliced
1 pinch Dried Chili Flakes (optional)
1 bunch Parsley, Chopped
1 whole Lemon
description: A very quick but flavorsome pizza that is perfect for Friday night dinner.

name: Peppermint Patty Poke Cake
ingredients:
1 box Chocolate Cake Mix
2 cups Skim Milk
1 package Instand Vanilla Or While Chocolate Pudding
½ teaspoons Peppermint Extract
1 can White Frosting
8 bars Miniature Peppermint Patties
¼ cups Semi-Sweet Chocolate Chips
description: A cake perfect for any occasion!  The perfect creamy blend of chocolate and mint!

name: Cream Cheese Bars
ingredients:
2 packages Cream Cheese (8 Oz.)
1 cup Granulated Sugar
1 whole Egg, Separated
2 packages Refrigerator Crescent Rolls
1 teaspoon Cinnamon
½ cups Granulated Sugar
description: A yummy and easier recipe for a dessert that mimics cheesecake.

name: Australian Potato Scallops
ingredients:
4 whole Large Potatoes
2 cups Self Raising Flour
1 teaspoon Salt
¼ teaspoons Pepper
1-¾ cup Water
½ gallons Vegetable Oil
description: Here is the wonderful, totally delicious and completely BAD for you, Potato Scallop recipe.

name: Frank’s Famous Creole Seasoning
ingredients:
2 teaspoons Salt
1-½ teaspoon Paprika
1 teaspoon Dried Crushed Basil
1 teaspoon Garlic Powder
1 teaspoon Onion Powder
1 teaspoon Black Pepper
1 teaspoon White Pepper
1 teaspoon Cayenne Pepper
½ teaspoons Dried Oregano
½ teaspoons Dried Thyme
½ teaspoons Dried Parsley
description: This type of seasoning base is used in many New Orleans restaurants, from Emeril’s to Commander’s Palace to K-Paul’s. This is particularly good on grilled chicken or duck.

name: Herb Roasted Chicken
ingredients:
1 whole Chicken
1 stick Butter Or Margarine, Softened
1 Tablespoon Fresh Rosemary
1 Tablespoon Fresh Parsley
1 Tablespoon Fresh Oregano
description: A delicious herb roasted chicken with a wonderful crispy skin.

name: Slow Cooker Swiss Steak
ingredients:
1-½ pound Round Steak
6 whole Red Potatoes, Quartered
1-½ cup Baby Carrots
1 whole Medium Onion, Cut In Wedges
1 can Diced Tomatoes With Italian Herbs
12 ounces, fluid Brown Gravy
description: Satisfying and delicious, this meal is hearty in winter and keeps the kitchen cool in the summer.  The meat is so tender I couldn’t even keep it together with my fork!

name: Quick Turtles aka Rolo Addictions
ingredients:
30 whole Mini-pretzel Twists
1 bag Rolo Candies
30 whole Melting Chocolate (or Almond Bark)
description: Super easy, quick but addictive little sweet & salty numbers!  Quick (and EASY) to make – a great recipe for kids too!

name: Chinese Pork Ribs
ingredients:
1 cup Hoisin Sauce (I Prefer Soy Vay)
½ cups Soy Sauce
3 Tablespoons Ginger, Peeled And Finely Grated
3 Tablespoons Honey
2 cloves Garlic, Pressed
3 Tablespoons Vegetable Oil
2 racks Baby Back Pork Ribs (approx. 4 Lbs.)
description: These flavorful and tender ribs are quick to prepare.  They are perfect for company as they spend several hours in the oven, leaving you plenty of time to get ready for your guests.

name: Easy Peach Cobbler
ingredients:
1 stick Butter
1 cup Sugar
1 cup Milk
1 can Peaches (large Can)
1 cup Self-Rising Flour
description: Very Easy and Delicious Peach Cobbler

name: Chicken or Turkey Burritos
ingredients:
2 cups Mixture 1
2 whole Cooked, Cooled And Cubed Chicken Breasts Or Turkey
½ cups Avocados, Diced
⅓ cups Sliced Black Olives
2 whole Plain Yogurt
1 whole Mixture 2
1 whole Tomatoes, Chopped
2 Tablespoons Green Bell Peppers, Chopped
2 dashes Medium Chopped Onion
2 cups Small Diced Green Chilies
6 whole Tabasco, Or To Taste
description: A nice summer time meal. Use leftover, cold chicken or turkey. Cool, creamy, crunchy and full  of a variety of tastes.

name: Basic Cream Cheese Frosting
ingredients:
½ cups Butter, Softened
8 ounces, fluid Cream Cheese (8 Oz. Softened)
4 cups Powdered Sugar
2 teaspoons Pure Vanilla Extract
description: This is a quick and easy basic cream cheese frosting that hits the spot with cakes and cookies.

name: Italian Sausage Pasta Potpourri
ingredients:
1 pound Rigatoni
1 pound Sweet Italian Sausage, Cut Into 1/2 Inch Pieces
10-½ ounces, fluid Can Of Whole Button Mushrooms
1 teaspoon Dried Basil
½ teaspoons Salt
½ teaspoons Garlic Powder
4 whole Eggs
¼ cups Milk
1 cup Grated Parmesan Cheese
½ teaspoons Parsley, Dried
½ teaspoons Minced Onion
½ cups Olive Oil
12 ounces, fluid Frozen Broccoli Florets, Thawed And Drained
description: Italian sausage, button mushrooms and broccoli florets come together with traditional Italian seasonings in this fresh and colorful pasta dish.

name: BBQ Chicken Nachos
ingredients:
1 whole Boneless, Skinless Chicken Breasts
1 bag Nacho Chips
1-½ cup Mexican Cheese, Shredded
1 cup BBQ Sauce
½ cups Diced Tomatoes, Drained (or Dice Up 2-3 Fresh Tomatoes)
¼ cups Diced Jalapeno Peppers
description: BBQ Chicken smothered in cheese over nachos.

name: Zucchini Al Forno
ingredients:
8 whole Zucchini, Peeled And Thinly Sliced Lengthwise
1-½ cup Mozzarella, Sliced Or Shredde
8 slices Prosciutto, Bacon Or Turkey
¾ cups Parmesan
½ cups Bread Crumbs
¾ cups Olive Oil
description: Thinly sliced zucchini are layered with mozzarella, parmesan and prosciutto, then baked to golden-crusty perfection!!

name: Zucchini Absorption Pasta
ingredients:
¼ cups Toasted Pine Nuts
4 teaspoons Extra Virgin Olive Oil
6 cloves Garlic, Minced
1 pound Penne Pasta
6 cups Chicken Stock
4 whole Small Zucchini, Cut Into Thin Sticks
2 teaspoons Salt And Pepper, Or To Taste
½ cups Grated Parmesan
description: Zucchini Absorption Pasta: a yummy, no boil method for making yummy pasta.

name: Zucchini & Walnut Bread
ingredients:
1 Tablespoon FOR THE STREUSEL TOPPING:
1 Tablespoon Sugar In The Raw
½ teaspoons Oat Flour
2 teaspoons Cinnamon
¾ cups Butter
1-½ cup FOR THE BREAD:
2 teaspoons Walnuts (** Toasted, Optional)
1 teaspoon Almond Flour
¾ teaspoons Cinnamon
½ teaspoons Baking Soda
3 whole Nutmeg
¼ cups Salt
1 whole Eggs
1-¼ cup Honey
description: You’ll love this version of a classic, made with almond flour and all-natural sweeteners. It’s moist, fluffy, and absolutely delicious!

name: Swordfish with Blue Pesto
ingredients:
3 cups FOR THE BLUE CHEESE PESTO:
1 clove Basil Leaves, Loosely Packed
¼ cups Garlic, Chopped
¼ teaspoons Shelled, Roasted And Salted Pumpkin Seeds
⅛ teaspoons Salt
⅓ cups Black Pepper
1 Tablespoon Extra Virgin Olive Oil
¼ cups Lemon Juice
4 pieces Blue Cheese Crumbles
1-½ teaspoon FOR THE SWORDFISH:
½ teaspoons (about 10 Oz. Size) Swordfish Steaks
1 Tablespoon Kosher Salt
1 Tablespoon Black Pepper
description: Pan-seared swordfish steak served with blue cheese pesto made with basil, pumpkin seeds, and a touch of lemon.

name: Individual Pumpkin Granola Skillet Cookie
ingredients:
⅓ cups Brown Sugar
2 Tablespoons Vegetable Oil
1 Tablespoon Unsalted Butter, melted
½ teaspoons Vanilla Extract
1 whole Egg White
2 Tablespoons Pumpkin Puree
½ cups All-purpose Flour
¼ teaspoons Kosher Salt
¼ teaspoons Baking Soda
¼ teaspoons Nutmeg
½ cups Pinch Of Cinnamon
¼ cups Oats
2 Tablespoons Chopped Walnuts
description: A fall snack or dessert filled with chocolate and spice!

name: Apple Pie Cake
ingredients:
1 box FOR THE CAKE:
5 whole (about 18 Oz. Size) Yellow Cake Mix
2 teaspoons Apples, Peeled And Sliced In Slices
1 Tablespoon Brown Sugar
1 cup Ground Cinnamon
½ cups Lemon Juice
1 teaspoon FOR THE TOPPING:
½ cups All-purpose Flour
description: A ridiculously easy recipe for Apple Pie Cake, using store-bought cake mix and a homemade topping!

name: Spicy Red Pepper & Tomato Pasta
ingredients:
1 pound Pasta Shells
1 teaspoon Butter
2 Tablespoons Olive Oil
1 whole Medium Onion, Chopped
1 can (28 Oz. Size) Crushed Tomatoes
1 can (28 Oz. Size) Diced Tomatoes
4 cloves Garlic, Smashed
2 whole Red Chili Peppers, Sliced And Diced
2 Tablespoons Crush Red Pepper Flakes (less Or More Depending On Your Heat Tolerance)
1 cup Fresh Basil, Loosely Packed
1 Tablespoon Olive Oil
1 whole Red Bell Pepper, Stem And Seeds Removed And Diced
description: This pasta dish will spice up your life in no time!

name: Spicy Garlic Chicken Pizza
ingredients:
12 ounces, weight Chicken Breast, Boneless, Skinless
½ cups Sliced Green Onions
2 cloves Garlic, Minced
2 Tablespoons White Vinegar
2 Tablespoons Soy Sauce
1 Tablespoon Olive Oil
½ teaspoons Crushed Red Pepper
¼ teaspoons Black Pepper
1 Tablespoon Olive Oil
1 Tablespoon Cornstarch
16 ounces, weight Italian Bread Crust
½ cups Monterey Jack Cheese, Shredded
½ cups Mozzarella Cheese, Whole Milk, Shredded
2 Tablespoons Sliced Almonds, Toasted
description: This is a great recipe for the family, a girls’ night or just because you are craving something yummy.  Everyone I’ve made this for loves it!

name: Holy Guacamole
ingredients:
4 whole Avocados, Ripe
4 whole Plum Tomatoes, Roughly Chopped
1 bunch Cilantro, Chopped (stems Removed)
1 whole Jalapeno, Seeds And Membranes Removed, Finely Diced
⅓ whole Red Onion, Diced
2 pinches Sea Salt, to taste
1 whole Limes, Juiced
description: My grandmother is Mexican and she has inspired me to perfect my guacamole, which I have been working on for years.

name: BBQ Cornbread Chicken with Pineapple
ingredients:
2 Tablespoons Extra Virgin Olive Oil
1 whole Small Yellow Onion Or 1/2 Vidalia Onion
1 package Nature's Seasons Seasoning Blend (or An Equivalent)
½ bottles Boneless, Skinless Chicken Breasts
1 cup Hot Sauce, to taste
1 Tablespoon BBQ Sauce
1 can Chicken Broth
description: My husband’s favorite chicken meal.  It can probably feed 4 if your husband doesn’t get seconds.

name: Blueberries and Peaches in Balsamic Vinegar
ingredients:
3 Tablespoons Granulated Sugar
2 Tablespoons Balsamic Vinegar
1 pound Peaches Sliced
3 cups Fresh Blueberries
¼ teaspoons Fresh Ground Black Pepper
description: Great summer dessert using fresh fruit, awesome on vanilla ice cream.

name: Baked Oatmeal
ingredients:
6 cups Oatmeal (quick Or Rolled Oats)
2 cups Brown Sugar
1 cup Oil
2 cups Milk
1 Tablespoon Baking Powder
2 teaspoons Salt
description: More like an oatmeal “cake,” this breakfast dish is wholesome (yes, I consider large amounts of brown sugar wholesome), moist and very versatile. You can add fruit to the batter before baking or lay it on after, you can douse your portion of baked oatmeal in milk and slurp it up with a spoon, or you can skip the milk and eat it with a fork. Any way you try it, it is sure to please. Personally, my favorite way to eat it is covered in fresh strawberries and milk.

name: Baked Oatmeal
ingredients:
6 cups Oatmeal (quick Or Rolled Oats)
2 cups Brown Sugar
2 cups Milk
1 cup Oil
4 whole Eggs, Lightly Beaten
1 Tablespoon Baking Powder
2 teaspoons Salt
description: More like an oatmeal “cake,” this breakfast dish is wholesome (yes, I consider large amounts of brown sugar wholesome), moist and very versatile. You can add fruit to the batter before baking or lay it on after, you can douse your portion of baked oatmeal in milk and slurp it up with a spoon, or you can skip the milk and eat it with a fork. Any way you try it, it is sure to please. Personally, my favorite way to eat it is covered in fresh strawberries and milk.

name: Crock Pot Lasagna
ingredients:
1 pound Lean Ground Beef
1 jar Spaghetti Sauce
2 cups Cottage Cheese
2 cups Shredded Mozzarella Cheese
½ cups Parmesan Cheese, Shredded
6 whole Lasagna Noodles, Regular, Uncooked
¼ cups Water
description: Real Lasagna, real simple.  Let your slow cooker do all the work, even cook the noodles!

name: Corny Cornbread
ingredients:
1 can Whole Kernel Corn, Drained
1 can Cream Style Corn
2 whole Eggs
1 cup Sour Cream
1 box Jiffy Cornbread Mix
description: yummy corn-based side dish.

name: Creamy Potato Soup
ingredients:
1 package Refrigerated Mashed Potatoes (Butter)
1 package Refrigerated Mashed Potatoes (Garlic)
4 cups Chicken Broth
2 packages Shredded Cheddar Cheese
1 package Bacon, cooked and crumbled
1 bunch Green Onions, Chopped
2 dashes Salt And Pepper, to taste
description: The easiest and quickest way to make a tasty potato soup.

name: Sea Foam Punch
ingredients:
1 gallon Hawaiian Punch
1 quart Rainbow Sherbet
description: This is always a crowd pleaser and my family never gets tired of it!

name: Weeknight Roast Chicken
ingredients:
1 whole (3 To 4 Lb. Size) Roasting Chicken, Giblets Removed
1 teaspoon Sea Salt
1 teaspoon Freshly Ground Black Pepper
description: Three ingredients, one pan, less than one hour. It’s one tasty bird!

name: Mashed Potato Grave
ingredients:
2 pounds Large Russet Potatoes, Peeled, Diced
1 Tablespoon Butter
¼ cups Non-fat Milk
1 whole Brown Food Coloring
6 whole Thin Slice Of Raw Potato (for Tombstone)
description: Easy, scary Halloween mashed potatoes that look like a grave site with two tiny mashed potato ghosts.

name: Sweet Corn Croquettes
ingredients:
2 ears Fresh Sweet Corn
½ whole Medium Onion
2 Tablespoons Unsalted Butter
2 Tablespoons All-purpose Flour
½ cups Milk
½ cups Chicken Stock
½ teaspoons Freshly Ground Black Pepper
1 whole Egg
2 cups Panko Crumbs
3 cups Vegetable Oil
description: Fresh sweet corn suspended in a creamy filling, deep-fried to crispy, golden-brown perfection. Warning: highly addictive!

name: Smoked Egg Salad Sandwich
ingredients:
2 whole Smoked Eggs, Chopped (see My TastyKitchen Recipe Box)
½ stalks Celery, Chopped
1 Tablespoon Diced Shallot
2 Tablespoons Flat-leaf Parsley, Chopped
3 Tablespoons Mayonnaise
¼ teaspoons Cracked Black Pepper
1 whole Sandwich Roll, Split In Half
description: By using smoked eggs, you turn a classic sandwich into something amazing.

name: Chicken Gruyere Casserole with Spinach and Mushrooms
ingredients:
5  Large Eggs
¾ cups Milk
½ teaspoons Salt
¼ teaspoons Pepper
2  Boneless, Skinless Chicken Breasts
½  Onion, Finely Diced
1-½ cup Mushrooms, Sliced
1-½ cup Spinach, Lightly Packed
1 cup Gruyere Cheese, Grated
description: Busy doesn’t have to mean drive-through! This one-pot meal comes together in minutes, making it a perfect weeknight dinner!

name: Roasted Asparagus
ingredients: 1 bunch Fresh Asparagus
description: Easy Asparagus!

name: Man Dip
ingredients:
2 cups Prepared Ranch Dip
1 cup Cheddar Cheese, Shredded
3 strips Cooked Bacon, Chopped
1-½ teaspoon Hot Salt
1 can Chopped Green Chiles
description: We think this is supposed to be made by a woman to attract a man, sort of like Blueberry Boy Bait (google it.) Anyway, it worked for us.

name: Zesty Stuffed Bell Peppers
ingredients:
2 bags Boil-in-a-Bag Rice (Each Bag Makes 2 Cups)
6 whole Bell Peppers, Red Or Green
1 pound Italian Sausage
1 can Rotel Tomatoes (10 Oz)
2 cups Monterey Jack Cheese, Shredded
1 jar Marinara Sauce (24 Oz.)
description: This is a delicious way to enjoy bell peppers.  Stuffed with sausage, rice, Rotel and cheese – covered in marinara… It’s heaven on a plate!

name: Zesty Slow Cooker BBQ Chicken
ingredients:
6 pieces Frozen Skinless, Boneless Chicken Breast Halves
1 bottle (12 Oz) Bottle Barbeque Sauce (Try Different Types Of BBQ Sauce To Add Variety To The Flavor)
½ cups Italian Salad Dressing
¼ cups Brown Sugar
2 Tablespoons Worcestershire Sauce
description: This is a very quick and easy chicken recipe. You can change up the taste with different types of BBQ sauce.

name: Zesty Shake and Bake Potatoes
ingredients:
12 whole Medium Red Potatoes
¼ cups Olive Oil
¾ cups Italian Style Bread Crumbs
1 package (about 1 Oz. Packet) Zesty Italian Salad Dressing Mix (See Note Below)
1 teaspoon Paprika
½ teaspoons Minced Garlic
¼ teaspoons Ground Pepper
¼ teaspoons Salt
description: Seasoned and baked potato wedges.

name: Zesty Ranch Chicken Drumsticks with Homemade Ranch Dipping Sauce
ingredients:
1 cup FOR THE RANCH DIPPING SAUCE:
½ cups Mayonnaise
½ cups Plain Greek Yogurt
¼ teaspoons Buttermilk
¼ cups Salt To Taste
2 Tablespoons Parsley, Chopped
2 Tablespoons Fresh Oregano, Chopped
2 Tablespoons Fresh Chives, Chopped
1 teaspoon Fresh Dill, Chopped
½ teaspoons Worcestershire Sauce
¼ teaspoons Paprika
16 whole Cayenne Pepper (Optional)
1 bottle FOR THE CHICKEN:
1 package Chicken Drumsticks
description: A healthy yet delicious alternative to fried chicken drumsticks. They’re marinated in a super flavorful, zesty ranch marinade and broiled in the oven in order to get a little smoky flavor.

name: Zucchini & Summer Squash Ribbon Salad
ingredients:
¼ cups FOR THE DRESSING:
3 Tablespoons Olive Oil
½ whole White Vinegar
1 Tablespoon Lemon Juice
2 cloves Honey
1 teaspoon Garlic, Pressed
1 whole Dijon Mustard
1 whole Salt And Pepper, to taste
1 ear FOR THE SALAD:
½ cups Zucchini
¼ cups Yellow Squash
4 leaves Corn
description: I love the freshness and lightness of this salad. The ribbons stay crisp, giving it a bit of crunch and texture. Perfect to have with a protein or alone.

name: Zucchini & Squash Pasta with Balsamic Roasted Tomaotes
ingredients:
3 cups Cherry Tomatoes
2 teaspoons Olive Oil, Divided
1 Tablespoon Balsamic Vinegar
1 whole Large Zucchini
1 whole Large Yellow Squash
½ teaspoons Garlic, Minced
1 pinch Red Pepper Flakes
description: Looking for a healthier alternative to pasta?  Try this zucchini and squash “pasta” with balsamic roasted tomatoes.

name: Zucchini  Brownies
ingredients:
1-½ cup White Sugar
½ cups Vegetable Oil
2 teaspoons Vanilla
1 whole Egg
2 cups Flour
½ cups Cocoa
1-½ teaspoon Baking Soda
1 teaspoon Salt
2 cups Zucchini Shredded With Peel On
½ cups Semi-sweet Mini Chocolate Chips
2 cups _____
¼ cups For Icing
¼ cups Powder Sugar
6 Tablespoons Butter
½ teaspoons Milk
description: Moist super-chocolate brownies.

name: Zombie Eyeball Cookies
ingredients:
½ cups FOR THE COOKIES:
2 whole Unsalted Butter,  Room Temperature
2 Tablespoons Eggs
1 teaspoon Vegetable Oil
1 box Vanilla Extract
1 drop White Cake Mix, 18 To 20 Ounce Size
1 drop Yellow Food Coloring, More If Needed
1 cup Green Food Coloring, More If Needed
20 whole Granutaled White Sugar
1 whole FOR THE DECORATIONS:
1 whole Yogurt Covered Raisins Or Peanuts
1 whole Red Edible Food Marker
description: Just in time for Halloween, a scary, spooky zombie eyeball cookie easily made from a packaged cake mix and candies.

name: Ziti al Prezzemolo (Ziti with Parsley Sauce)
ingredients:
1 box (16 Oz. Box) Ziti
4 Tablespoons Unsalted Butter
2 cloves Garlic, Crushed
1 bunch Fresh Flat Leaf Italian Parsley, Stems Removed And Roughly Chopped
2 Tablespoons Salt And Pepper
1 Tablespoon Parmigiano Reggiano - Shaved Or Grated

name: Ziti agli Asparagi
ingredients:
1 bunch Fresh Asparagus - Trimmed
2 Tablespoons Unsalted Butter
2 cloves Garlic, Minced
1 whole Leek, Thinly Sliced (The White Part Only)
1 cup Chicken Broth
½ cups Dry White Wine
1 pound Salt And Pepper, to taste
¼ cups Ziti Pasta
description: Ziti agli Asparagi (ziti with a creamy asparagus sauce).

name: Ziti
ingredients:
3 ounces, weight Chopped Prosciutto
½ boxes Ziti, Cooked Til Al Dente, 16 Ounce Box
1 jar Your Favorite Sauce (tomato/spaghetti), 24 Ounce Jar
4-½ ounces, weight Parmesan Cheese, Shredded
8 ounces, weight Ball Of Fresh Mozzarella
description: Great weeknight dinner.

name: Zippy Nippy Mushrooms
ingredients:
⅔ cups Tarragon Vinegar
½ cups Salad Oil OR Olive Oil
1 clove Garlic Minced (I Use Jarred)
1 Tablespoon Table Sugar
1 Tablespoon Water
1 teaspoon Table Salt
1 pinch Black Pepper
3 drops Hot Pepper Sauce
1 whole Medium Onion, Thinly Sliced
2 cans (6 Oz. Ea.) Whole Mushrooms, Drained
description: This is a good appetizer to have on hand over the holidays. It keeps well in the fridge, so you can make it ahead.

name: Zippy Clam Dip
ingredients:
1 can 6 -1/2 Oz Minced Clams
1 package (8 Oz.) Cream Cheese, Softened
2 Tablespoons Finely Minced Fresh Parsley
2 teaspoons Lemon Juice
2 teaspoons Prepared Horseradish
1 Tablespoon Minced Onion
1 teaspoon Seasoning Salt
description: Always a popular dip at parties.  Never any leftovers which is  a good thing cuz I could eat this all by myself, then I’d have to deal with all that guilt.

name: Zippy Chicken
ingredients:
⅓ cups Butter
½ cups Honey
¼ cups Yellow Mustard
4 teaspoons Yellow Curry Powder
3 pounds Meaty Chicken Pieces
description: I got this recipe from a good friend and it’s a sure hit with my kids!

name: Zesty Quinoa Cakes
ingredients:
1-⅓ cup Cooked Quinoa
½  Onion, finely chopped
1 clove Garlic, Minced
1  Egg
½ cups Freshly Grated Parmesan Cheese
1 Tablespoon Capers
1 whole Lemon, Zest And Half The Juice
2 Tablespoons Fresh Parsley, Chopped
2 Tablespoons All-purpose Flour
½ teaspoons Salt
¼ teaspoons Pepper
⅛ teaspoons Cayenne Pepper (Optional)
4 Tablespoons Extra Virgin Olive Oil For Frying
description: Like a crab cake but with a superfood! And, no crab.

name: Zesty Pork Chop Bake
ingredients:
1 cup Elbow Macaroni
4 pieces Pork Loin Or Rib Chops
2 teaspoons Salt
¼ teaspoons Pepper
¼ cups Onion, finely chopped
2 Tablespoons Green Pepper, Minced
2 Tablespoons All-purpose Flour
1 Tablespoon Brown Sugar
½ cups Water
½ cups Chili Sauce
1 Tablespoon White Vinegar
1 can Cream Style Corn (14 Oz)
description: This is one of those recipes that has been around a long time.  You can tell by the ingredients and preparation technique.  It was a favorite in my mom’s kitchen and now my family loves it!

name: Zesty Pizza Sauce
ingredients:
15 ounces, fluid Tomato Sauce
3 Tablespoons Tomato Paste
2 Tablespoons Parmesan Cheese
1 Tablespoon Red Wine Vinegar
2 teaspoons Sugar
1 teaspoon Italian Seasoning
1 teaspoon Minced Onion
½ teaspoons Worcestershire Sauce
¼ Tablespoons Garlic Powder
¼ teaspoons Seasoned Salt
description: Here’s an easy homemade pizza sauce our family loves.

name: Zesty Pizza Sauce
ingredients:
1 cup Onion, Chopped
2 cloves Garlic, Minced
¼ cups White Wine
4 Tablespoons Tomato Paste
4 teaspoons Dried Oregano
2 teaspoons Crushed Red Pepper
½ teaspoons Pepper
2 cans (28 Oz. Each) Crushed Tomatoes, Undrained
1 teaspoon Sugar
2 teaspoons Balsamic Vinegar (optional)
description: A simple, yet zesty pizza sauce perfect for those homemade pizza nights! Be sure to put this sauce on PW’s pizza dough crust. This makes for a delicious pizza. We like to top ours with either crumbled sausage and cheese or pepperoni and cheese! ENJOY!

name: Zesty Pasta Salad
ingredients:
¼ cups Extra Virgin Olive Oil
¼ cups Red Wine Vinegar
2 Tablespoons Sugar
1 Tablespoon Finely Chopped Fresh Basil
1 Tablespoon Lemon Juice
1 Tablespoon Dijon Mustard
1 clove Garlic, Minced
½ teaspoons Black Pepper
1 cup Broccoli Florets
6 ounces, weight Uncooked Rotini Pasta
15 ounces, weight Can Kidney Beans, Rinsed And Drained
1 cup Carrots, Sliced
1 whole Small Red Onion, Cut Into Halves And Thinly Sliced
6 cups Torn Lettuce Leaves
½ cups Parmesan Cheese, Grated
description: We love this pasta recipe every time I make it. We make a complete meal out of the salad and with summer coming up, it makes for a great meal on a hot night. But don’t wait till then because it is delicious anytime.

name: Zesty Orzo Pasta Salad
ingredients:
3 cups Cooked Orzo Pasta
1 whole Red Pepper
1 whole Yellow Pepper
½ cups Diced Purple Onion
1 whole Seeded And Diced Large Tomato
½ cups Chopped Fresh Parsley
3 Tablespoons Italian Salad Dressing
½ cups Extra Virgin Olive Oil
½ cups Red Wine Vinegar
1 Tablespoon Lemon Juice, Freshly Squeezed
description: This is not your boring, flavorless pasta salad!

name: Parmesan Red Potatoes
ingredients:
1 pound Red Potatoes, Cut Into 1 Inch Pieces
¼ cups Olive Oil (or Any Other Oil Will Also Work)
2 cloves Cloves Garlic, Chopped
½ teaspoons Onion Powder
½ cups Parmesan Cheese, Shredded
1 pinch Salt And Pepper (I Do This To Taste)
description: Just threw these together and they were too good not to share!

name: Stir-Fried Brussels Sprouts
ingredients:
2 pounds Brussels Sprouts, Rinsed And Trimmed
1-½ teaspoon Olive Oil (or Any Other Oil Will Also Work)
2 teaspoons Minced Garlic
1 Tablespoon Soy Sauce
2 Tablespoons Crushed Red Pepper (optional)
¼ teaspoons Sugar (more To Taste)
1 Tablespoon Black And White Sesame Seeds
2 teaspoons Fresh Lime Juice
description: Nutty, complex flavor makes  these sprouts something unexpected.

name: Honey Mustard Nut Crusted Salmon
ingredients:
4 ounces, weight 4 Boneless Salmon
¼ cups Butter, Melted
3 Tablespoons Mustard
2 Tablespoons Honey
¼ cups Breadcrumbs
⅛ cups Walnuts Smashed
⅛ cups Pecans Smashed
1 Tablespoon Parsley, Dried
description: This recipe is fairly easy but yet elegant enough to wow the family.  I love salmon, I could live on salmon…I might just die from salmon overload.

name: Stuffed Turkey & Swiss Pita Pockets
ingredients:
6 whole Pita Pockets, With Top Trimmed Off
6 slices Swiss Cheese
1 package White Mushrooms, Sliced
1 stick Butter Or Margarine
½ pounds Turkey Deli Cuts
description: A quick and easy dinner that doesn’t heat up your kitchen in the steamy summer months.  Plus, you can fill your pita with whatever your tummy desires.

name: Espresso Crunch Muffins
ingredients:
1-¼ cup Fresh Whole Ground Flour (use Soft White Wheat)
½ cups Rapadura Brand Unrefined Sugar
1 Tablespoon Baking Powder
1 pinch Salt
2 Tablespoons Instant Espresso Powder
2 whole Shots Of Espresso
2 whole Eggs
¾ cups Buttermilk
6 Tablespoons Coconut Oil
1 cup Chopped Hazelnuts
1 cup Rapunzel Brand Chocolate Chips
description: Like a chocolate covered espresso bean… in muffin form.  I made these extra healthy, but feel free to substitute white flour, regular sugar, canola oil and regular chocolate chips.  I won’t be offended!

name: Peach & Blackberry Cobbler
ingredients:
16 whole Black Berries
1 whole Peaches Sliced
1 whole Orange, Juiced
2 Tablespoons Lemon, Juiced
1 cup Southern Comfort (Optional)
5 Tablespoons Sugar
3 teaspoons Cornstarch
3-½ cups Cinnamon, Ground
5 teaspoons _____
1-½ teaspoon FOR THE BISCUIT TOPPING:
2 Tablespoons Flour
1 teaspoon Baking Powder
1-½ cup Baking Soda
1-½ cup Sugar
¼ cups Salt
1-½ cup Chopped Pecans
½ cups Shortening
½ cups Unsalted Butter
1 cup Buttermilk
⅓ cups Brown Sugar And Cinnamon Mix, For Sprinkling
description: I took things I liked from various cobbler recipes and “cobbled” them together to create this. I highly recommend using a LARGE dutch oven to cook this in.

name: Flour Tortillas
ingredients:
3 cups All-purpose Flour
2 teaspoons Baking Powder
1 teaspoon Salt
5 Tablespoons Butter, Softened
1-¼ cup Warm Water
description: The best homemade Flour Tortillas around!

name: BLT Pasta Salad (minus the L)
ingredients:
1 cup Mayonnaise
¼ cups Lemon Juice
2 teaspoons Sugar
2 teaspoons Chicken Bouillon
7 ounces, weight Pasta (choose Your Favorite Shape), Cooked And Cooled
8 slices Bacon, cooked and crumbled
1 quart Grape Or Cherry Tomatoes, Halved
1 can Black Olives, Halved
¼ cups Green Onions, Sliced
description: I’ve adapted a pasta salad recipe I found online many moons ago to my liking!

name: Strawberry Slush Punch
ingredients:
1 bottle Ginger Ale
1 can Pineapple Juice
2 quarts Water
2 cups Sugar
2 packages Frozen Strawberries
2 packages Strawberry Kool-Aid
description: A delicious, frozen, slushy hit at any party!

name: Mint Julep Cake
ingredients:
1 box White Cake Mix
1 box Dry Vanilla Pudding Mix
5 whole Egg Whites
½ cups Cold Water
½ cups Canola Oil
½ teaspoons Peppermint Extract
½ cups Bourbon
1-½ stick Butter
¼ cups Cold Water
1-½ cup White Sugar
¼ cups Bourbon
description: I took P-dub’s recipe for Christmas Rum Cake and swapped the rum for bourbon, yellow cake for white cake, 5 egg white for the 4 whole eggs and added some mintyness. Bake it in a rose-shaped bundt pan, take it to a derby party, lose a bunch of money because you bet on horses based on how pretty they were instead of actually stats, and a fun evening shall be had by all.

name: Oriental Noodle Bowl
ingredients:
8 cups Boiling Water
16 ounces, weight Linguine
1 pound Sirloin Steak, Sliced Thin
1 Tablespoon Vegetable Oil Or More As Needed
1 head Salt And Pepper, to taste
1 cup Broccoli, Chopped
¾ bottles Carrots, Sliced Thin
¼ cups 16 Oz. Italian Dressing
½ teaspoons Teriyaki Sauce
description: This is a yummy meal that I lost the original recipe for. So, we have just adjusted it to our tastes. It’s quick and easy. Also, it gets some good veggies into the kiddos.

name: Bourbon Chicken
ingredients:
3 cups Cooked Rice
4 pieces Boneless, Skinless Chicken Breasts
1 Tablespoon Exra Virgin Olive Oil
¼ cups Water
⅓ cups Soy Sauce
¼ cups Apple Juice
¼ cups Brown Sugar
1 Tablespoon Cider Vinegar
2 Tablespoons Ketchup
1 clove Garlic (or 1/2 T Minced Garlic In A Bottle)
¼ teaspoons Ginger
¼ teaspoons Crushed Red Pepper Flakes (1/2 Tsp= Mild 3/4 Tsp=hot)
description: This can be adjusted from mild to spicy.  I will give the mild version because that is how I prepare this dish…my child will revolt if I make it any hotter.

name: No Fear Pie Crust by Cooks Illustrated
ingredients:
1-¼ cup All Purpose White Flour
2 Tablespoons Sugar
¼ teaspoons Salt
8 Tablespoons Unsalted Butter, Softened
2 ounces, fluid Cream Cheese, Softened But Still Cool
description: I was 50 years old before I made a pie crust that I could trust every time. There really is no fear!!

name: Seasoned Pretzels
ingredients:
1 bottle Orville Redenbacher Popcorn Oil
2 Tablespoons Lemon Pepper (Spice Supreme Is What I Use)
1 package Hidden Valley Ranch Mix (the Dressing Kind)
2 bags Pretzel Twists (1# Each)
description: The ingredients may seem odd, but the combo is delicious.

name: Zesty Mexican Rice
ingredients:
1 cup White Rice
2 cups Chicken Broth
1 Tablespoon Butter
½ whole Onion, Diced
1 Tablespoon Vegetable Oil
3 cloves Garlic, Minced
¼ cups Tomato Paste
½ teaspoons Cumin
2 teaspoons Lime Juice
¼ cups Cilantro, Chopped
description: Cheap, easy, and delicious: what’s not to love?

name: Zesty Mexican Quinoa Salad
ingredients:
1 cup FOR THE SALAD:
2 cups Uncooked Quinoa
1 Tablespoon Vegetable Broth
15 ounces, weight Olive Oil
15 ounces, weight Canned Black Beans, Drained
1 whole Canned Corn, Drained
1 cup Avocado, Peeled, Pitted, And Diced
½ cups Grape Tomatoes, Diced
½ whole Red Onion, Diced
1 dash Lime, Zested
1 dash Salt
½ cups Pepper
2 Tablespoons Fresh Cilantro, For Garnish (optional)
3 Tablespoons FOR THE DRESSING:
½ teaspoons Olive Oil
¼ teaspoons Cilantro, Chopped
½ Tablespoons White Wine Vingear
description: Light and healthy keen-whaa salad!

name: Zesty Meatloaf
ingredients:
¼ cups Finely Diced Mushrooms
¼ cups Finely Diced Onion
¼ cups Finely Diced Red Bell Pepper
1 pound Ground Beef
½ cups Cracker Crumbs Or Plain Bread Crumbs
1 whole Egg
1 teaspoon Salt
¼ teaspoons Ground Black Pepper
⅓ cups Ketchup
1 Tablespoon Balsamic Vinegar
description: A traditional meatloaf with a zesty twist!

name: Zesty Marinade
ingredients:
¼ cups Vinegar
½ cups Oil
1 teaspoon Salt
1 teaspoon Red Pepper Flakes
1 teaspoon Dry Mustard
½ teaspoons Celery Salt
¼ teaspoons Garlic Powder
1 pinch Oregano
¼ teaspoons Pepper
2 whole Steak Cuts Of Choice (can Up To Double This Amount With This Amount Of Marinade)
description: A great marinade for steak, with zip.

name: Zesty Mango Salsa with Pita Chips
ingredients:
1 whole Mango, Peeled, Sliced Into Small Chunks
1 Tablespoon Jalapeno Pepper, Seeds And Stems Removed
2 Tablespoons Red Pepper, Chopped In Small Pieces
2 Tablespoons Green Onion Chopped In Small Pieces
2 Tablespoons Cucumber Chopped Into Small Pieces
1 whole Lime, Zested And Juiced
description: This is the perfect “backyard” picnic food. Now don’t get me wrong, I am all for packing up and taking food somewhere fun for a picnic, but this is a really wonderful, easy, zesty recipe that is just perfect for that “deck” picnic.

name: Zesty Lime Salsa
ingredients:
4 whole Tomatoes (medium Size)
½  Large Onion, Diced
1 whole Lime
1  Jalapeno Pepper, Minced, Divided
description: An excellent super easy recipe to rid your kitchen of all those garden tomatoes this time of year!  Tangy, refreshing and delish!

name: Zesty Lemon Bundt Cake with Streusel Layer
ingredients:
1 cup FOR THE STREUSEL:
¼ cups All-purpose Flour
¼ cups Light Brown Sugar
1 pinch Sugar
1 dash Salt
1 stick Cinnamon
2 cups Unsalted Butter, Chilled And Cut Into 1" Pieces
1 teaspoon FOR THE CAKE:
1 teaspoon All-purpose Flour
1 teaspoon Baking Powder
1 stick Baking Soda
1 cup Salt
4 Tablespoons Unsalted Butter, At Room Temperature
2 whole Sugar
1 teaspoon Lemon Zest (for 4 Tablespoons You'll Need About 5-6 Lemons)
1 teaspoon Eggs
1 cup Vanilla
description: Delicious bundt cake with a crunchy streusel layer and lots of lemon flavor from fresh zest.

name: Zesty Lemon Bars
ingredients:
¾ cups FOR THE CRUST:
¾ cups Powdered Sugar, Plus More For Sprinkling On Finished Bars
1 dash Softened Butter
2 cups Salt
4 whole Flour
¼ cups FOR THE FILLING:
1-¼ cup Eggs
1 Tablespoon Flour
¾ cups White Sugar
description: These lemon bars are extra special because the crust is like shortbread!

name: Zesty Lemon and Coconut Cupcakes
ingredients:
1-½ cup FOR CUPCAKES
½ cups Self Raising Flour
1 Tablespoon Shredded Coconut, Plus Extra For Topping
¾ cups Grated Lemon Rind
4-¼ ounces, weight Caster Sugar
2 whole Butter, Melted
¾ cups Eggs
4-¼ ounces, weight Milk
2 Tablespoons FOR FROSTING:
1 Tablespoon Cream Cheese, Softened
½ teaspoons Butter
¼ teaspoons Grated Lemon Rind
3 cups Lemon Juice
description: A delightfully fresh and zesty lemon coconut cupcake topped with a lemon cream cheese frosting.

name: Ricotta Gnocchi w/ Roasted Red Pepper Pesto
ingredients:
2 whole Roasted Red Peppers
2 cups Fresh Basil
3 Tablespoons Pine Nuts
½ cups Grated Parmesan Cheese, Divided
½ cups Exra Virgin Olive Oil
1 cup Ricotta Cheese
1 cup Flour
1 whole Egg Yolk
¼ teaspoons Fine Sea Salt
1 pinch Salt and Pepper, to taste
description: Who said gnocchi has to be labor intensive.  Have a flavorful gnocchi dinner ready in 20 mins. They are light, fluffy and easy to make.

name: Toffee Cheesecake Bars
ingredients:
1 cup FOR THE BASE:
½ cups Flour
⅓ cups Granola (I Used Trader Joe's Maple Praline Pecan), Or Quick Oats
½ teaspoons Brown Sugar (see Note If Using Oats)
½ cups Kosher Salt
6 ounces, weight Butter, Softened
⅓ cups FOR THE FILLING:
1  Cream Cheese, Softened
1 teaspoon Sugar
1 pinch Egg
¾ cups Vanilla
description: Decadent cheesecake bars with a little bite from granola in the crust and the delectable flavors of toffee on top.  Surprisingly easy to make!

name: Breakfast Biscuits
ingredients:
2-½ cups Whole Wheat Flour
2 teaspoons Baking Powder
¼ teaspoons Baking Soda
½ teaspoons Salt
½ cups Unsalted Butter, Frozen
1 cup Buttermilk
½ cups Sharp Cheddar, Grated
3 slices Cooked Bacon, Chopped
½ cups Scrambled Eggs, Chopped (1/2 Cup Is About 2 Eggs)
½ cups Fresh Spinach, Chopped
description: Quick and easy whole wheat breakfast biscuits filled with eggs, cheese, bacon and spinach. A complete meal on the go!

name: Shrimp Caesar Endive Boats
ingredients:
¼ cups FOR THE DRESSING:
¼ cups Olive Oil
½  Heavy Cream
1 teaspoon Lemon, Juiced
1 Tablespoon Anchovy Paste
½ teaspoons Dijon Mustard
1 clove Worcestershire Sauce
3 Tablespoons Garlic
1 Tablespoon Grated Parmesan Cheese
½ pounds Pepper To Taste
1 Tablespoon FOR THE ENDIVE BOATS
1  Olive Oil
1 head Shrimp, Any Size, Peeled, Deveined, And Roughly Chopped
description: These are gorgeous and very simple.  I love using shrimp in appetizers because they cook so quickly. You can make the dressing a few days in advance to save even more time.

name: Zesty Coconut Shrimp
ingredients:
1 cup Light Coconut Milk
1 whole Lime, Juice And Zest
1 cup Rough Chopped Cilantro
1 Tablespoon Hot Sauce (Sriracha)
½ pounds Shrimp (uncooked And Deveined)
1 cup Panko Breadcrumbs
1 Tablespoon Coarse Salt
½ cups Shredded Coconut
1 Tablespoon Coconut Oil, Or More As Needed
description: Pan-fried citrus coconut shrimp.
